title: một khách sạn phong nha với giá cả hợp lý
text: Đây có lẽ là khách sạn tốt nhất trong khu vực, không nói nhiều. Phòng rộng và giường khá thoải mái. AC là một trong những đơn vị quạt gắn trên tường, qua lại, vì vậy phải mất một thời gian để làm mát căn phòng, nhưng nó hoạt động. Chỉ cần cho nó thời gian. AC rất quan trọng khi mức cao hàng ngày là 95. Có hai ghế ngồi và một bàn nhỏ nơi bạn có thể ăn bữa ăn phục vụ phòng của bạn. Có khoảng 20 mặt hàng phục vụ phòng, tất cả người Việt Nam trừ mì spaghetti với sốt thịt. Có bàn và ghế làm việc, không thoải mái chút nào. Đây không thực sự là một khách sạn kinh doanh, mặc dù wifi khá tốt. Không có cửa hàng quốc tế (Hoa Kỳ), vì vậy hãy mang theo một bộ chuyển đổi. Khách sạn không có bất kỳ. Vòi hoa sen hoạt động đủ tốt. Đó là một phòng tắm hiện đại, tiêu chuẩn phương Tây. Các nhân viên hầu như không thể nói tiếng Anh. Họ lịch sự và cố gắng giúp đỡ, nhưng ngôn ngữ là một rào cản thực sự. Bữa sáng tự chọn hoàn toàn là của người Việt Nam, không có thức ăn kiểu phương Tây, ngoại trừ một ít phô mai và thịt. Nó nằm ở trung tâm thành phố, nhưng thực sự không có nhiều thứ để xem xung quanh thành phố này. Nếu bạn định ở lại thành phố này, tôi muốn giới thiệu nó, nhưng tại sao bạn lại muốn ở lại thành phố này?

title: Big construction site next door rather spoils the ambience!
text: The resort itself is basically fine - the staff try their best. BUT if you want peace and quiet, go somewhere else. It's in short supply here. There are actually 2 building sites next to it and many noisy trucks going to and fro. Leave it at least a few months and maybe there'll be finished. Then again, this is Vietnam so who knows.
en_review: The resort itself is basically fine - the staff try their best. BUT if you want peace and quiet, go somewhere else. It's in short supply here. There are actually 2 building sites next to it and many noisy trucks going to and fro. Leave it at least a few months and maybe there'll be finished. Then again, this is Vietnam so who knows.

title: Beautiful place but lacking a good vibe....
text: This place is beautifully set out amongst the trees on the beach and the rooms are very comfortable and the salt water pool in particular is gorgeous. It is a big place with lots of rooms spread out over a large area, which we found a bit challenging with our family - it was easy to lose people and spend a lot of time walking around trying to find them...! And also the largeness of the place made it feel a bit impersonal and didn't help to create a relaxed vibe. The beach itself is miles of golden sand and the area in front of the hotel is kept mostly free from rubbish, however, further up the beach and when you swim, there is plenty of plastic. The sea itself is quite wavy and so fun for splashing but not great for long distance swimming and also isn't turquoise blue, probably due to silt from the Mekong. There are plenty of facilities at the hotel, pool table, tennis, fishing, yoga class. We found the staff to be generally friendly but not very engaged, it seemed like they were gong through the motions which created a slightly disappointing vibe around the place. The restaurant served good food and the value wasn't too bad but the restaurant is far away from the beach and the atmosphere seemed a little bland so we ended up going out to the nearby town a couple of the nights and eating in a very lively local restaurant. We also had an issue whereby on booking our preferred room option was not available but we were promised that our room would be changed should our cheaper option become available. We then found out before arriving that our preferred option had been available but our booking had not been amended. When we brought this up on check in, there didn't seem to be much understanding of the issue and we were not offered any discounted price to compensate for them not fulfilling their promise to amend our booking. Overall we enjoyed our stay and were certainly very comfortable but we weren't mad on the vibe....

title: Still a long way before an efficient resort
text: We purchased our stay at VinOasis through Luxury Escapes for a really great deal. However what they don’t tell you is that more than half of the hotel is not open. There is only one restaurant to eat from for breakfast, lunch and dinner even though the website offers a number of different ones and cuisines. While the food is relatively nice you get very sick of buffet food for all three meals of the day. Not a complaint but more of an observation, there is very little English spoken which makes communication very hard, again not a complaint as it is a foreign country. The hotel itself is very unorganised, let’s start with check in. When you arrive you are asked to sit down in the foyer while they check you in with out you. So you sit there and wait for an hour to be finally called up to see that they have checked you in incorrectly. We had two families travelling together and my daughter was checked in with the other family so we had to go through check in again. The bar services are slow and you when you think you have paid in full at end of day you get a knock on your door to pay more, very hard to keep track of. Also the Casino was not open. There are only two ATMs on site and you can only draw out 2000000 dong per day which is about $120 aud. The pool and pool bar was really lovely and the staff were great just unorganised as above mentioned. The kids water park is not very good unless your child is over 140cm. Anything under that and they are restricted to the kids park which is fine but adults can’t go on that, so I never once got to go down a slide or enjoy any of the park with my 5 yo. The lifeguards love their whistles and whistle at you for everything and I mean everything. They also have control issues over beach towels, it’s just a towel and it’s not leaving the resort, jeez. They have electric cars to take you around the place such as the spa (which you cannot walk to even though there are signs) and places like vin safari and vinpearl land. There isn’t really much to do as you are also quite far from town and the airport so you are restricted to hotel at night, but they will order a cab for you. The vin safari was freaking amazing and would highly recommend this. Vinpearlland was nice, on the day we went most of it was closed, only two rides available for kids under 140cm. Aquarium there is really good also. The waterpark at Vinpearlland was bloody excellent for the kids and had a lot more slides than the resort. Don’t get me wrong this is a nice place and in couple of years could be a well established resort but right now they have teething issues and they could relax a little. When we were there there was only 500 guests but they can cater up to 1200, they will struggle with service if they don’t get more organised and simplify there processes.

title: Welcoming
text: Chez Carole provides a relaxing atmosphere and welcoming staff. The resort is naturally located close to the beach (maybe 50 meters) from the restaurant. Which also provides top class food and service. This hotel is perfect both for couples, families, and lone travelers. Staff is very good in English so don't hesitate to contact them, they will help you out.
en_review: Chez Carole provides a relaxing atmosphere and welcoming staff. The resort is naturally located close to the beach (maybe 50 meters) from the restaurant. Which also provides top class food and service. This hotel is perfect both for couples, families, and lone travelers. Staff is very good in English so don't hesitate to contact them, they will help you out.

title: Nơi khủng khiếp
text: Đừng nhìn ảnh! Đây không phải là khách sạn! Rất xa và họ không có dịch vụ nào. Bạn có đồ ăn và đồ uống riêng vì mọi nơi sẽ đóng cửa sớm như vậy. Họ không thể thiếu tiếng Anh. Tôi đã đến từ châu Á và đó là lần đầu tiên khi loại này xảy ra
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng và Spa Wild Beachs

title: Given up on greatness?
text: Beautiful, quiet spot. A place you could really sit back and relax, unless your mind was concerned with things it shouldn't be concerned with, such as: - why the fridge isn't working - why the tv isn't working - what is and isn't included in the package because it's not all that clear and it takes a while for the staff to get on the same page as well - why it takes so long to get a drink - where all the other people are? I appreciate the solitude but it's a bit of a ghost town here on this, our first day - how to explain to all these sweet and friendly people that you just want things to be easy but so far they haven't been The staff have made plenty of lovely gestures towards us but unfortunately it's not enough to shake the vibe of this resort as a bit of a washed-up has-been. We will enjoy our time, no doubt, as we really only came here to swim and laze about. But it lacks the polish of other hotels and is therefore not what i expected. We will contact guest services in the morning regarding the maintenance issues. Room 3210.

title: Khach san hoang gia ca mau bỏ bom khách
text: Tôi đã đặt phòng ở khách sạn Hoàng Gia trước khi đến Cà Mau.1h sáng đến nơi thì báo hết phòng.Lễ tân đêm đổ lỗi lễ tân ngày ko bàn giao?????Quá không chuyên nghiêp, ko quan tâm lợi ích của k.hàng.quá tệ hại

title: Direkt am Mekong
text: Schöne gemütliche Anlage, mit kleinen Häusern, eher einfacher eingerichtet, mit offenen Bad, sehr angenehm. Das Essen war auch in Ordnung, und wurde auf der Terrasse mit Aussicht direkt auf den Mekong, Sonnenuntergang und Schiffen angeboten. Das Personal war ausgesprochen bemüht und freundlich.
en_review: Schöne gemütliche Anlage, mit kleinen Häusern, eher einfacher eingerichtet, mit offenen Bad, sehr angenehm. Das Essen war auch in Ordnung, und wurde auf der Terrasse mit Aussicht direkt auf den Mekong, Sonnenuntergang und Schiffen angeboten. Das Personal war ausgesprochen bemüht und freundlich.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Se trata de un magnífico hotel de habitaciones-Villas muy separadas con vistas en general al mar. El jardín es precioso y muy bien mantenido por lo 85 jardineros que tiene el hotel La playa enorme y las piscinas en cascada enormes y preciosas El servicio tremendamente agradable Ideal para pasar unos días de descanso Muy completos los desayunos Sin duda uno de los mejores resorts del mundo
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An
en_review: Se trata de un magnífico hotel de habitaciones-Villas muy separadas con vistas en general al mar. El jardín es precioso y muy bien mantenido por lo 85 jardineros que tiene el hotel La playa enorme y las piscinas en cascada enormes y preciosas El servicio tremendamente agradable Ideal para pasar unos días de descanso Muy completos los desayunos Sin duda uno de los mejores resorts del mundo

title: 5* view, 3* hotel
text: We stayed here 2 nights and was looking forward to it for weeks. The view definitely didn't disappoint but unfortunately the hotel did. its lacking a lot of maintenance. This was specially noticed since we came from its sister pilgrimage village which is very well maintained and so attentive to every detail. The good things about Vedana were the lovely staff, the amazing location, good breakfast, pool and good size villas. We just felt that the whole place needs a general make over in terms of infrastructure of the buildings and were quite disappointed to learn they are building 30 more villas, instead of investing on the maintenance what they already have. The possibility of this place is enormous, please do something to reach it! PS. Never stayed in a so called 5* hotel where you have to pay for sauna+jacuzzi
en_review: We stayed here 2 nights and was looking forward to it for weeks. The view definitely didn't disappoint but unfortunately the hotel did. its lacking a lot of maintenance. title: Der Glanz von gestern und die Sauberkeit von vorgestern!
text: WIr planten nach einem 3-Wöchigen Backpackertrip einen entspannenden Abschluss in einem "besseren" Hotel in Vietnam. Wir reisten Mitte Oktober an, einen Tag früher als das Hotel gebucht war. An der Rezeption wurde uns gesagt wir sollen uns eine dreiviertel Stunde zeit nehmen, dass das housekeeping das Zimmer vorbereiten kann. In dieser Zeit entschieden wir uns dazu die öffentlichen Teile der Anlage zu begutachten. Was wir zu Gesicht bekamen hat uns schon nicht so gefallen (Wobei die Idee und die grundsätzliche Gestaltung echt hübsch sind). Der Strand ist sehr klein, der Pool ist schön, allerdings sind die Hölzer des Bodens außen herum am Ende ihrer Lebenszeit. Die Farbe blättert ab, teilweise fehlen auf den Wegen die Latten mit denen diese gemacht sind ganz. Als wir in das Zimmer durften kam die große Enttäuschung. Wir hatten uns für eine Villa mit Whirlpool entschieden. Wir kamen in das Zimmer und alles roch extrem modrig. Wir brachten das bei der Dame von der Rezeption gleich zur Ansprache, diese tat allerdings so als wenn nichts wäre (Sie war allgemein sehr desinteressiert und hatte nur Zeit für russische Gäste die wohl an diesem Tag ankommen sollten, alles andere war zweit- und drittrangig)!!! Als diese das Zimmer verlies schauten wir uns unser neues Heim nochmal an. Auf einer Liege neben dem Bett waren lauter braune Flecken auf dem Bezug, genauso im Außenbereich auf den Sofas. Ein neuer Bezug (ähnlich einem Bettbezug) hätte dieses Problem behoben. Auf dem Bett war ein Vogelschiss, die Toilette hatte lauter braune Flecken und Dreck, der beim drüber wischen weg ging und in der Dusche waren ein Bündel Schwarze Haare von den Vorwohnern. Wir informierten die Rezeption über diese Probleme. Woraufhin diese uns eine weitere dreiviertel Stunde aus dem Zimmer schickten um dieses erneut zu reinigen. Während dieser Zeit bekamen wir eine 15 minütige Nacken Massage im Spa Bereich, welche wirklich toll war. Zurück im Zimmer empfing uns eine Duftkerze gegen den Muff und der Vogelschiss war entfernt worden. Alle anderen Beschwerden wurden nicht wahr genommen. Wir entschieden uns nicht in diesem Hotel zu bleiben und zogen noch am gleichen Tag aus. Für diesen Preis ist es eine Unverschämtheit eine solche Unterkunft anzubieten! Fazit: Wir sind der Meinung das das Personal bemüht und nett ist, jedoch das Management klaglich gescheitert ist! Man bekommt das Gefühl das das ganze Geld eingesteckt wird und nichts zur Modernisierung und Pflege der Anlage verwendet wird.

title: Not recommend for Tourists
text: . We booked there because Flamingo Dai lai was fully booked . I totally agreed with Enric C. It's only the lake side , the sunset . Please don't go but if you have no choice , you have to practice how to use google trasnslate . The restaurant is very expensive compare with Flamingo Dai lai . Don't do any laundry . They simply don't know how to do the laundry . They return our laundry on the hanger and the shirts are still wet . But they charged the international price. We booked there for 8 nights but after the first 3 nights , we can't stand anymore and we moved to the Flamingo Dai Lai Hotel.
en_review: . We booked there because Flamingo Dai lai was fully booked . I totally agreed with Enric C. It's only the lake side , the sunset . Please don't go but if you have no choice , you have to practice how to use google trasnslate . The restaurant is very expensive compare with Flamingo Dai lai . Don't do any laundry . They simply don't know how to do the laundry . They return our laundry on the hanger and the shirts are still wet . But they charged the international price. We booked there for 8 nights but after the first 3 nights , we can't stand anymore and we moved to the Flamingo Dai Lai Hotel.

title: good but not a five stars
text: Plus : nice and quiet place Minus : mosquitos, little mouse in the bathroom, wc equipment well cleaned but still some traces due to limescale ( a five stars should have every thing perfect or near perfect), noisy neighbors coming from a group of people from the same company. I like nature and having an opened sky view is a good idea but not with a mouse running around ...

title: Cadre enchanteur, mais services chers et flairant l'arnaque
text: L'accueil digne d'un gérant de vendeur de bibelots à Fès au Maroc. Marchandage utile si nécessaire (location moto au double du prix habituel au Vietnam quand même !). Taxi retour à la gare de NInh Binh cher. Prix repas affichés en dollars, petits déjeuners médiocres, service minimum, froid. Seul le cadre est majestueux. Balades à vélo (à dispo, gratuit) très agréable, mais loin de tout.

Taxi retour à la gare de NInh Binh cher. Prix repas affichés en dollars, petits déjeuners médiocres, service minimum, froid. Seul le cadre est majestueux. Balades à vélo (à dispo, gratuit) très agréable, mais loin de tout.

title: WARM, FRIENDLY AND PROFESSIONAL
text: I travel right after Covid wave low down so the resort atmosphere is very fresh, calm and not crowded people. They have a small cute organic farm that suitable to families with small kids. Staffs is very nice, warm, supportive and well care to my family. Food is great especially seafood is totally fresh it seem not like frozen as some other resort. Cocktail is avarage not impressive. I experienced both ocean villa and garden villa so I prefer garden villa for family with kids. Facilitates is a little bit old and some soap liquid bottle has oxidized metal when pump out. I think because they was locked down for long time. Pool water is quite healivy chemical smelling. Beach is private and clean. Strongly recommend and will return Fusion again.

title: Khách sạn giá rẻ
text: Ở lại trong 4 đêm vì vậy chúng tôi có thể tận hưởng công viên quốc gia. Các phòng đều rất sạch sẽ và có kích thước tốt. Phòng tắm to lớn đẫm máu và vòi sen rất đẹp, với mức giá mà nơi này cung cấp cho bạn sẽ không tốt hơn nhiều. Chỉ có nhược điểm nhỏ là bạn đang ngay bên cạnh lỗ địa ngục ba lô đó là Easy Tiger, có nhạc sống mỗi đêm. Rất may nó dừng lại vào lúc 11 giờ tối nên chúng tôi có thể ngủ ngon sau đó. Phần tốt nhất của khách sạn này là các nhân viên, người đàn ông và người phụ nữ có người quản lý quầy lễ tân chạy một con tàu thực sự chặt chẽ và vô cùng hữu ích ở tất cả các lần. Họ đặt tour du lịch của chúng tôi và đặt chuyến đi của chúng tôi trở đi, chúng tôi cũng thuê một chiếc xe đạp chất lượng tốt từ họ với một mức giá thực sự tốt. Ăn sáng khá cơ bản nhưng đã được bao gồm trong tỷ lệ. Về cơ bản đây là một khách sạn sạch thực sự giá rẻ với đội ngũ nhân viên tuyệt vời. Rat khuyen khich

title: Pas cher mais pas très propre
text: Hôtel situé loin du centre de la ville. La chambre était grande mais pas très propre, en plus de sentir mauvais. Les draps sont vieux. Je ne recommande pas cet endroit. Seul point positif, l'accueil et le service reçus par la réceptionniste, Nhy.
en_review: Hôtel situé loin du centre de la ville. La chambre était grande mais pas très propre, en plus de sentir mauvais. Les draps sont vieux. Je ne recommande pas cet endroit. Seul point positif, l'accueil et le service reçus par la réceptionniste, Nhy.

title: Feel Sorry fo Angsana
text: Service was horrible in general. We stayed at Angsana for 3 nights and 4 days. We did a late check-in on our first night (we checked in after midnight), so our first room cleaning service occurred on our second day. After the cleaning service ladies "cleaned" our room, I found a BIG BALL of HAIR literally rolling around on our floor. The hair ball was so obvious because the floor is white! I could not understand how they did not spot the hair ball. It was so disgusting. Our bathroom floor was all wet. Why couldn't they simply wipe the water for us? Our amenities were not refilled. We left a tip of $2 on our bed. It is not like we were being rude. Thus, I went downstairs to talk to a person at the concierge desk. I told the lady at the concierge desk that it is not acceptable if this happens tomorrow. The next day, the room cleaning service was still not great. This time, the cleaning service people left some trash which looked like small pieces of white paper on our floor and on the bathroom counter. I asked them to clean our room but they left us their trash? What is this? Is this a joke? Or are they blind? At this point I gave up and decided not to stay here at Angsana from the next time. This is not our first time staying at Angsana. We came here with my other families two years ago. Back then, you guys would refill the fruit basket everyday. But this time, you guys did not. My sister asked and why the fruit basket is not refilled, the service lady told her it is a welcoming fruit basket which is only provided on the first day. Furthermore, at Moomba, my sister and I had a quick dinner and shared a bottle of beer. It is not that we were spending a long time there. But, when the waitress brought us a receipt to sign, I check the bill and signed. Guess what she said. She said "is this it" as if I need to give her more tip. Why do I need to give her more tip when they already charge me the service fee? Angsana is disgracing Banyan Tree. What a shame.

title: Bạn có cho một thách thức?
text: Tôi thừa nhận rằng nói rất ít tiếng Việt, vì vậy bất kỳ vấn đề nào là một phần của việc tôi làm. Nhưng đối với các nhân viên của quán bar không nhận ra tên Heineken nên gây ra mối quan tâm. Và nó đã xuống dốc từ đó. Công nhân đã dừng lại để hawk tôi với miệng của họ treo mở. Được thông báo rằng nhà hàng bắt đầu phục vụ bữa tối lúc 9 giờ tối (Nếu bạn ở Việt Nam, bạn sẽ biết điều này là không đúng). Và tất cả bắt đầu với bellhop người không thể tìm thấy phòng của tôi. Tin vui: Hồ bơi mới, sạch, đẹp. Nhưng ai đó hãy đào tạo nhân viên.

title: Cung điện mới
text: Tôi đi du lịch rất nhiều để kinh doanh và New Palace Hotel là khách sạn sạch nhất tôi đã tìm thấy ở Bạc Liêu nhưng nó vẫn còn nhiều điều mong muốn! ! Nhưng ít nhất tôi không chia sẻ phòng của mình với côn trùng và sinh vật như những khách sạn khác mà tôi đã thử ở Bạc Liêu! ! Nó được cho là 5 * nhưng không bao giờ có nước nóng để tắm vào ban đêm hoặc vào buổi sáng! ! Mỗi lần tôi đăng ký tôi hỏi có nước nóng để tắm họ luôn hứa là có nhưng điều đó không đúng! ! Nước nóng không phải là một thứ xa xỉ! ! Những chiếc gối cứng nên không thể ngủ ngon. Nhà hàng không bao giờ nhiều đồ ăn, tôi không biết tại sao họ có thực đơn vì họ không bao giờ có thứ bạn muốn. Bạn cuối cùng hỏi ok cho tôi biết những gì bạn có! !

title: Enttäuscht
text: Nach all den positiven Bewertungen hatte ich mich sehr auf meinen Aufenthalt im Kiki Coconut gefreut. Leider wurden meine Erwartungen nicht erfüllt. Die Anlage ist ohne Einschränkungen sehr schön und ich habe hier einen der schönsten Sonnenaufgänge meines Lebens gesehen. Vom Service war ich allerdings sehr enttäuscht. Ich kam mir wie ein Störenfried der Familie vor und das bin ich von Vietnam nicht gewöhnt. Was mich richtig geärgert hat war, dass die ausgeschriebene xe om tour mal eben von 8 auf 5 Stunden zum gleichen Preis reduziert wurde und nach weniger als 3 Stunden vorbei war, was mich dann doch über den Preis verhandeln ließ. Es wäre schön, wenn in den Bungalows ein Kühlschrank vorhanden wäre. Was mich nicht wirklich gestört hat, aber erwähnt sein sollte: nebenan wird gerade eine neue Anlage gebaut, mit den entsprechenden Geräuschen sollte man rechnen.

title: A fuir comme les rats...
text: Le plus cher de nos hébergements et le moins recommandable. Chambre d'une propreté médiocre, eau chaude pendant 2 minutes puis devient froide. Le lit est les draps malgré un séjour de 3 jours ne sont pas changé et la poubelle jamais vidée. Il a fallut demander tous les jours nos bouteilles d'eau inclus dans le prix. Petit déjeuner gras. Le dernier soir nous avons eu la cerise sur gâteau, la visite d'un rat passé sous la porte et qui sautait sur nos oreillers, être réveillé comme ça nous donne pas envie de revenir. D'ailleurs l'endroit pour se rendre en ville en est infesté.

title: Quarantine
text: Nhân viên dọn phòng nhiệt tình, vui vẻ , chăm sóc khách tốt. Phòng ở đây rất sạch Sẽ , nội thất sang trọng, view đẹp !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ! . Xứng đáng với tiêu chuẩn dịch vụ 5 sao.
en_review: Nhân viên dọn phòng nhiệt tình, vui vẻ , chăm sóc khách tốt. Phòng ở đây rất sạch Sẽ , nội thất sang trọng, view đẹp !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ! . Xứng đáng với tiêu chuẩn dịch vụ 5 sao.

title: Oorplugjes graag
text: Covid-19 heeft wel invloed op het 1 en ander, de restaurants waren gesloten, weinig gasten maar toch maakte men het gezellig en was het hotel helemaal in Kerstsfeer. Ik had een kamer op de 11de verdieping. De kamer is zeer ruim en van alle gemakken voorzien, ruime badkamer, voldoende kastruimte en een goed bruikbaar bureau met een stopcontact. Echter de 11de verdieping heeft zo zijn ongemakken, de wind giert om het hotel. Verder ligt het hotel aan een T-kruising van de doorgaande provinciale weg en een aanvoer weg naar het industrieterrein.Tot ca. 11 uur 's avonds gaat het vrachtverkeer door en begint weer om een uur of 5 in de morgen. En die mensen gebruiken zo graag hun claxon. Het ontbijt is hoofdzakelijk op de regio gericht maar er zijn voor westerlingen genoeg alternatieven in gekookte en gebakken eieren, worstwaren, kaas, cornflaxes en yoghurt. Alleen de broodrooster is wat traag, na ca. 20 keer was het brood eindelijk een beetje verkleurd. Al en al een goed hotel maar oorplugjes zijn een vereiste.

title: Enjoyed the stay and would recommend, but a bit too pricey
text: Lovely staff and owners are also very nice to have a chat with. Negatives : The rooms were clean and nice but I didnt like the toilets/showers. It was fairly cold outside so the shower was very cold all the time. The food was ok but not worth the price, unfortunately you do not have any other choices since there are no shops/food places around. Not much to do in the evening besides spend money at their bar ( there is a movie almost every night but I didnt come to Vietnam to watch movies ). I would suggest the management makes a volleyball court or something so the people have something to do. It can also be loud from the dogs barking and the water pumps. Positives: Like I said the staff was very nice They have two lovely dogs which love to play around with guests The whole "farm" looks amazing and there is a great view outside In general very clean Conclusion : I think that we would have enjoyed it much more if it wasnt cold. Our showers would be better and we could maybe use the little pool that they have. Grab some of your own food/drinks before you come here and come on sunny days. You will have a great time

title: Disappointed...
text: The room, was really dirty, full of mouse droppings. The room service come every morning a 8.30 AM, "sorry we want just sleep, we're in holiday!". The staff don't speak english, and the service is definitely crapy... The swimming pool was dirty, anyway isn't a good choice, and really expensive for the service. Maximum price for this resort is 20/25 bucks a night...

Maximum price for this resort is 20/25 bucks a night...

title: アットホームな小さなホテル
text: グーグルマップのホテルの位置が違うので、見つけるのに一苦労しました。家族で経営している感じの小さなホテルです。２階の窓ありの部屋にしましたが、窓は浴室にしかないので、部屋から外の様子がわかりません。１階の窓無しの部屋を見ましたが、真っ暗ですので、窓ありをオススメします。この値段でエアコンもテレビもwifiもあるので、滞在は快適です。廊下の音が結構聞こえてきますが、隣の部屋からはほとんど聞こえてこないので静かですが、オーナーの演奏と思われるピアノの音が遠くから聞こえてきました。色々と世話をしてくれて、いつも個人的に利用しているマッサージ師を呼んでくれたりもして、とても快適に過ごせました。

title: Hotel not good, pool great
text: My husband and I stayed 2 nights at Heritage By Night hotel and would not stay again. The bed sheets were clean but the room wasn't and one of the towels smelled of what I think was cat pee. The TV didn't work. The only reason we gave it a 2 instead of a 1 star rating was the lovely staff and the beautiful pool.

The bed sheets were clean but the room wasn't and one of the towels smelled of what I think was cat pee. The TV didn't work. The only reason we gave it a 2 instead of a 1 star rating was the lovely staff and the beautiful pool.

title: Trang trại homestay rất đẹp
text: Thực sự rất thích thời gian của tôi tại nhà nghỉ này. Tài sản rất đẹp và những người điều hành nó cũng vậy. Đồ ăn ở nhà hàng rất ngon. Tôi hy vọng rằng bất cứ ai ghé thăm ở đây đều có thể đối xử với doanh nghiệp này với sự tôn trọng như tôi dành cho bầu không khí thoải mái và mời gọi này. Cảm ơn bạn Tiến

title: Remember where you are!
text: This hotel was booked for us as part of a tour of the region and we were warned in advance that accommodation in the area is basic. The room was clean, had working air con and was comfortable. It was quirky in its decor and basic in facilities but not nearly as bad as the reviews below make out- it's important to remember where in the world you are and immerse yourself in it rather than getting hung up on the mod cons of your hotel room. We were in town for the Bac Ha Sunday market like most people and it was good to stay the night before so we got to see it in full swing before those on the overnight train from Hanoi arrived. I'd recommend this as a simple place to stay for one night while visiting the market.

I'd recommend this as a simple place to stay for one night while visiting the market.

title: Fabulous
text: Despite the weather not being as we had expected, cold and rainy, we had 5 wonderful nights at this hotel. The excellent free shuttle into Hoi An was brilliant and very reliable. The staff were very helpful at all times. Our room was wonderful looking out over the beach to the sea.
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An

title: Bad experience
text: Thien Thanh hotel is very noisy (you should have ear plugs) and owners are trying to trick you. When they say breakfast included, in fact it is only fried rice, you have to pay for drinks and eggs. Moreover, the owner kept the bus receipt we booked with her until the end to force us to pay 60000 vnd more for the breakfast that was normally included. Well, I think you Can find a better place in Phong Nha (so many hotels) for the Price we paid. We are still waiting for a smile or consideration from the owners...

When they say breakfast included, in fact it is only fried rice, you have to pay for drinks and eggs. Well, I think you Can find a better place in Phong Nha (so many hotels) for the Price we paid. We are still waiting for a smile or consideration from the owners...

title: 一般的なベトナムの地方都市ホテル
text: 外国人が宿泊するのに適しているホテルがまだ少ないチャーヴィン市では、一番マシなホテルでしょう。ただし、レベルはベトナム地方都市にある一般的なものですから、過大な期待はできません。ブッフェの朝食は品数も多くまずまずの内容ですが、それ以外に特筆することはありませんでした。ただ驚いたのは、自転車でカンボジアを目指す英国人の団体が宿泊されていたこともあり、宿泊客の半数以上が多国籍の外国人というくらいの国際色がありました。

title: Great location. Good value
text: Hotel is in great location, near restaurants, Easy Tiger for information and the boat wharf for Phong Nha cave. Our room had a balcony overlooking the street which was very nice. Hotel is very modern and clean. Bathroom has no shower curtain or place to rest soap/shampoo handy. Room has Aircon, but it is a little weak, but our room also had a fan which was very useful. WiFi is good. Breakfast is limited, but you can choose and they cook it for you. Don't recommend the orange juice, it is like Tang. They try to sell you tours which we declined but did use their driver to take us to Paradise Cave and the botanical gardens and he was good with a modern car. 800k for the 2 stops. We paid $24 aud per night and consider it great value.

title: Khi bạn chỉ trả 200.000 VMD, đừng mong đợi ...
text: Kết thúc với Meo Vac lúc 5 giờ chiều và muốn ăn một miếng (Meo Vac không phải là trung tâm ẩm thực của thế giới), tắm và gục đầu xuống, chúng tôi thấy mình ở đây tại Mr Hung. Cơ bản sẽ là từ, nhưng chấp nhận được nhất đối với tiền. . .

title: Je ne rejoindrai pas le chœur des louanges ...même si
text: C'est un bel hôtel assurément ,avec des bémols malgré tout . Notre chambre sur le golfe , spacieuse et joliment décoré ce qui me semble normal vus les tarifs pratiqués . Donc j'ai le droit d'être pointilleuse . La plage balayée, nettoyée des ordures de la mer Surtout près du restaurant et du bar ..mais plastiques , chasse d'eau ( oui oui ) , bouteilles flottent à la surface de l'eau au demeurant d'une température divine . C'est très pollué hélas ! Le Spa est divin avec une jeune femme qui sort du lot , efficace et sympathique , Khunza . Les tarifs sont exhorbitants pour le pays . La cuisine n'est pas top, le personnel ne parle ni l'anglais, ni le français et on ne comprenait pas toujours ce qui était proposé . J'avais cru comprendre que le manager était français pourtant ...mais on ne l'a pas vu .... Une petite boutique proposant produits solaires et produits locaux serait la bienvenue . Oubliez toute escapade sur l'île , le marche de nuit et le village ne présentent aucun intérêt .donc la piscine est belle le personnel aimable , le Spa bien et cher et le boss absent ...À vous de voir .

title: Nothing positive to say about thishotel
text: I suppose our room was clean, but old furniture, even though we were in the new wing. Reception dark, scruffy and dining room poor. breakfast was dreadful and a glimpse of the kitchen from the stairs to our room did not fillus with confidence. Flasks and cups were left out for more than 24 hours in a second dining room. we had not hot water, despite complaints and the massage I organized took place in a very cold dark room, witht he masseur chatting to a member of staff until I complained. We went to the 'Cong Fu?' for dinner and that was excellent, hot and delicious and guests reported rooms there good.

title: rộng rãi, thoải mái
text: theo như mình thấy thì các dịch vụ và nhân viên ở đây thiếu sự chuyên nghiệp và đào tạo, còn thái độ phục vụ tốt, luôn niềm nở với khách. Khi mình tới lưu trú tại khách sạn, có chương trình phục vụ ăn buffet buổi tối, hay và ý nghĩa. Nên kéo dài thời gian buffet sáng vì khi 8 giờ mình ra thì đồ ăn cũng gần hết nên cảm thây khó chịu, Dù lưu trú chỉ có 1 đêm duy nhất, nhưng chắc chắn mình sẽ không đến lần nữa.

title: Beautiful veiw, but basic accommodation for the price.
text: After looking at this homestay's website we booked it to stay at for 4 nights in January 2015. However after arriving we found it wasn't for us. It is a long way from town and the facilities were extremely basic for the $30 they charge. The rooms are all adjoined, but separated by wooden partitions. The bathroom is located outside which is unexpected when you are paying $30 per night. We were welcomed on arrival and given cold drinks when we were shown our room. However there was no tourist information available, other than a book that was produced by a Hostel in town. It was really hard to tell who was a staff member as no one seemed willing to provide any assistance. We decided in the end it would be best to find other accommodation in town, that was close to restaurants and was better suited to our needs.

title: Trong khoảng cách đi bộ dễ dàng đến Trung tâm Thông tin Phong Nha
text: Với một chút mỡ khuỷu tay, nơi này sẽ tạo ấn tượng tốt hơn nhiều. Các phòng lớn, tôi đã đủ thoải mái trên giường. Điều hòa không khí hoạt động tốt. Tôi đã có nước nóng khi tôi muốn nó (phải bật một công tắc điện đặc biệt). Nhưng có, một số hướng dẫn trong việc làm sạch chi tiết sẽ đi xa. Các quan điểm tốt nhất (như được thấy trong ảnh) là các cửa sổ phòng tắm, có vẻ ngược lại với tôi. Một tình huống giặt ủi tốt hơn cũng sẽ hữu ích. Tôi nghi ngờ nước cục bộ có hàm lượng khoáng chất cao, làm cho nó khó khăn để đạt được khăn trắng, và khăn có vẻ như họ là dòng khô, vì vậy họ là một chút cứng. Các nội dung khoáng sản cũng có thể chiếm màu sắc kỳ lạ của nước hồ bơi. Chúng tôi bơi, chúng tôi ổn. Cách bố trí của khách sạn dường như khuếch đại và cộng hưởng mọi tiếng ồn từ bên ngoài, nút tai là hữu ích nếu bạn là một người ngủ nhẹ. Nếu bạn treo xung quanh các căn cứ đủ lâu, bạn có thể sẽ thấy những con chuột rùng rợn trong những người trồng cây. Điều đó không làm phiền chúng tôi quá nhiều, vì mặt sau của khách sạn là phải lên chống lại rừng rậm, nó có thể rất khó để giữ cho những con chuột đi. Các nhân viên, đặc biệt là tiếp nhận, rất tử tế và hữu ích cho chúng tôi.

title: Peaceful getaway from the city
text: I absolutely love this spot. Situated on the Dong Nai River, Green Bamboo Lodge is a clean, quiet, comfortable set of bungalows accommodating solo travelers, couples or big groups like mine (group of 9 people). This is our second time coming to Cat Tien. There is always plenty of nature to take in here, from just chilling out on the bamboo balconies facing the river, to taking boat rides, to hiking 10km to Crocodile Lake, to learning new facts about the wildlife and ecology at Dao Tien Endagered Primate Species Center (Gibbon island)....there is plenty to do and participate in at Cat Tien. Green Bamboo Lodge is always so accommodating with our needs, and given that we always come in a big group, it's not such an easy task for hosts.....but GBL provided us with everything we asked for, with smiles. They can help you out with any of the tours and keep you informed on all the things you can do at the park. They are super friendly and their bungalows are kept very clean. We love this place and will be coming back! Also, don't forget to book a tour at Dao Tien (Gibbon island)...100% of the entrance fee goes to conservation efforts of the gibbons....and it's suuuuuuupppppper informative, plus you get to see gibbons "monkeying" around. =)

title: Big room, cheap service.
text: Positive: The double room was very big with 2 rooms (one bed room and one living room), had a real bathroom and its "central location" was convenient. Negative: The rooms are not very clean. Every morning, I would be woken up at 5:30 from the disco next door that would open all doors (or turn up the volume) before closing. Some receptionists were respectful and some receptionists were very rude. Same with the security guards for the motorcycles. Some of these guards would collect 5k for the parking, even though they knew that we were guests and some wouldn't. I had an argument with one receptionist and with one security guard during my stay. I tried to discuss the matter with the hotel manager and attempted to contact the manager 4 times, but without success... My suggestion: don't stay there if you don't need the extra living room

I tried to discuss the matter with the hotel manager and attempted to contact the manager 4 times, but without success... My suggestion: don't stay there if you don't need the extra living room

title: Ультра все включено
text: Что то на пять звезд не тянет.на территории сходить даже погулять негде между первым и вторым корпусом постоянный запах канализации,причем до рвоты,в номере пахло канализацией,не смотря на то что отель почти новый.вообщем кроме баров и пойти то некуда

title: Relaxing Trip from Ho Chi Minh City
text: We spent a relaxing night at the Mekong Lodge as a break from the hectic pace of Ho Chi Minh City during May 2011. It was certainly one of the best choices we made on what was an altogether a great visit to Vietnam. We had a room right on the river which had a great view of the passing parade of boats traveling up and down. While we really enjoyed this, I would warn light sleepers that it can be quite noisy late at night so you might consider a room further back. Apart from the boat tour of the floating market we also took two bicycle tours which were one on the highlights of our trip. This is certainly the way to see the local villages and get a feel for what life is really like for the residents of the Delta. Our guide spoke good English and was very informative. The food was consistently excellent which is important as there are no other options than eating at the Lodge and it is included in the package cost. The cooking class in the evening also gave some insight into the great flavors and beautiful presentation that we were experiencing. All in all, I can highly recommend the Lodge if you want to see a little about local life, yet still live in luxury.

title: More than we expected
text: 3 star hotel but the room was quite large clean, with aircon, minibar and LCD TV. The hotel have no food and nor westen food is available on the town but we bought some in the supermarket infront the hotel.

title: Dont bother with this place
text: Proximity to the airport does not make thís place attractive. The rooms are tired soviet-era style, hot showers are hit-and-miss, the shower and sink drains run all over the bathroom floor, and the electricity connection ís random. Worse ís the attitude òf the staff - the place seems like a noisy holiday camp for the staff and it's as ìf guests were an inconvenience they barely tolerate. They have a functions room with a kitchen, but there ís no breakfast or dinner offered for foreign guests, and town ís a 2 km walk away. (You can get a meal at the local places about 500m towards town but set the meal price BEFORE you eat or they'll rip you off). Asean also runs a 'masage parlour', which seems to be where their business really lies. And by the way, karaoke stars up at bedtime.... I'd suggest ìf you want somewhere half decent for the same money, you try the big place (Muong Thahn) on the other side of town instead,

title: Aufenthalt 11.04.-12.04.2013
text: Hotel für Zwischenstopp geeignet. Die Zimmer waren gross, aber nicht unbedingt gemütlich eingerichtet. Schlechter Geruch von den Abwasserleitungen. Ruhige Umgebung. Angrenzender Freizeitpark ist wahrscheinlich nur saisonal in Betrieb.

title: special place
text: PRO The hotel is beautiful with a magnificent garden. I stayed in room 106 overlooking the river. The room is small but delicately decorated. Great shower . It is equipped with everything we need, including mosquito repellent There is also a balcony with a great view. The restaurant is also beautiful, with a delicious and fresh food (most of the products come from the garden ). The pool is very nice and relaxing. we did a tour with excellent guide Nguyen Truong Giang- who speaks good English, very professional and friendly. I also went on the welcome tour on the hotel garden. It was lovely to know more details about the herbs, vegetables and fruits planted there. The staff are really helpful and speaks good English. Con - There are some small remarks: The room don´t have space for two suitcases - one of our suitcases need to be on the sofa. The wall between the bedroom and the bathroom is made by glass, although is not translucent, it would be nice to have a curtain to provide more privacy. wifi is not stable at the room , it is much better at restaurant or at the lobby In general : I loved my stay at Mekong Delta Boutique . It is a special place in the Mekong Delta, and I definitivelyrecommended it .

title: Superficiel !
text: Localisation: à 10-15 min en moto du ferry, dans un endroit perdu au bord d'une branche du mekong. Comme nous ne savions pas à quelle heure exactement nous allions arriver, une fois sur An binh, nous avons pris la moto pour nous rendre au homestay (25 000 dg par pers). Ok soit. Mais le homestay a osé nous faire payer 20 000 dg par personne pr nous déposer au ferry à la fin du séjour. Ils croient qu on va aller à pied au ferry ou quoi? Alors que la plupart des autres homestay propose le transfert gratuit.... Par ailleurs an binh n offre rien d'exceptionnel, à part faire un tour en vélo, il ne faut s'attendre à rien d'autre Chambre: c'est joli mais bon, typiquement construit pr le touriste et ils sont encore en train de construire. Trop business tue le business. Les sanitaires sont communs à toutes les chambres. Pas très propres mais à la rigueur c'est un détail. Personnel: relationnel très commercial, pas d authenticité, peut être juste dans les sourires de la cuisinière Repas: bon petit déjeuner et dîner Pour ce dernier nous avons aidé à le préparer mais bon il ne faut pas s'attendre à un grand partage avec les maîtres des lieux. Il s'agit souvent d'éplucher ou de couper les légumes et de simplement rouler les nems. Divers: attention lors du dîner vous risquez d'être attaqués par de gros grillons qui n'y vont pas de main morte. Aveuglés par la lumière il font des cabrioles qui les font directement se jeter contre nous ou dans les plats. Par ailleurs ils font un boucan d'enfer, rien à voir avec ceux du Sud de la France

title: Bien, sin lujos.
text: Estuvimos una noche para visitar las cuevas del parque natural. Es un pequeño hostel situado en la ribera de un precioso río, el sitio es muy bonito y simplemente por ese encanto y el precio, es un buen sitio donde alojarse si tu estancia es corta. Lo demás, sin lujos, una habitación y un baño correctos y limpios. El desayuno a la carta es variado aunque no era ninguna maravilla. El trato del personal fue agradable y voluntarioso. Para pasar una o dos noches es una elección buena y económica.

title: Quantity over quality
text: This resort is spot-on for the Vietnamese market. On a weekend it is extremely popular for large multi-generational family groups. Most of the property is covered by 1 - 4 bedroom villas. It has everything that you would expect from a resort and has plenty of "stuff" to keep people occupied. However, this is the most high-density resort I have ever stayed. You can pack alot of people into a villa in Vietnam, so every facility in the resort is over-flowing with people. The resort is noisy, busy and 50/50 adults to children. It was impossible to find a quiet place in the resort to relax. The resort was noticeably under-staffed and therefore the restaurants were even more chaotic. The resort tractor cleaning the beach from 10am - 3pm on a Saturday was a nice touch. Definitely not a 5-star experience. Was great to return to HCMC for some quiet.

title: Bungalows standards, moustiques et entretien moyen
text: Bungalows avec Sdb extérieur, beaucoup de moustiques sur la terrasse et autour. L’hotel mériterait des rénovations. L’entretien général laisse à désirer dans les chambres et autour de la piscine. Le petit déjeuner est vraiment moyen. Il y a d´autres hotels autour qui paraissent mieux entretenus et de meilleure qualité. La piscine est à proximité de la route avec le va et vient incessant de camions bennes. Et des travaux ont lieu sur le site (nouveau bâtiment en construction). Le coin est sympa avec des restaurants et des commerces autour et la plage de Mango Bay.

title: Une arnaque à éviter à tout prix
text: Non seulement les chambres sont hors de prix en comparaison des autres homestay de Bo Lu, les matelas sont très durs, les moustiquaires trop petites et la nourriture 2 à 3 fois plus chère qu'ailleurs; Mais en plus, les tours organisés sont une belle escroquerie : un unique trek à 100$ pour deux jours (qui soit disant aide les locaux à vivre alors que ce n'est pas vrai), les tours en bateau coûtent 60$/pers alors que vous paierez au maximum 20$ pour tout un bateau (qui peut contenir jusqu'à 10 personnes...) directement au port, ou aux autres hôtels. Si vous voulez louer un vélo, c'est 8$ la journée (Au Vietnam, c'est un prix scandaleux!). Et malgré toute la marge que se fait ce cher Mister Linh sur les activités, il ne ratera pas une occasion pour vous prendre encore plus d'argent. Nous avons attendu notre guide pas moins de 2 heures, jusqu'à ce qu'on décide d'annuler notre trek (le guide n'est jamais venu...), et ils n'ont pas voulu nous rembourser l'intégralité de la somme versée alors que nous 'y étions pour rien. N'hésitez pas à aller dans l'une des nombreuses petites homestay sur la route de Bo Lu, l'accueil sera bien plus convivial, les prix décents, la nourriture meilleure et elles ont tout autant de services à vous proposer. Pour information, nous avons rencontré sur place d'autres voyageurs dans le même cas que nous, qui ont changé de guesthouse après s'être fait arnaqué par M. Linh... Nous avons fort heureusement apprécié toutes les richesses du lac Ba Bé par nous même et avec les locaux, et il faut malgré tout, ne pas passer à côté de ces paysages.

title: Slechte service, slecht ontbijt maar schone kamers en een fijne douche.
text: Mijn vriendin en ik hebben hier 1 overnachting gehad tijdens onze reis door Vietnam. Er zou een zwembad aanwezig zijn maar deze was niet toegankelijk door de storm van 10 dagen eerder. Daarnaast spreekt het personeel geen Engels en is de service slecht. Ook was het ontbijt niet goed. De kamer zag er echter wel keurig uit.

title: Not great
text: Backpacking around southeast asia and this is the first place we have been unhappy with. Its not awful, but rooms/beds are are quite grubby and dirty feeling. The window was broken and no mosquito net so not ideal. Breakfast was only noodles and rice which is not of interest to us so had to pay elsewhere. We stayed one night with a view to possibly staying longer but we moved across the road to gecko hostel and we are so impressed. We got a twin room for €7 as they were sold out of doubles but doubles are only €6 (cheaper than central) and dorms €2. Great food and atmosphere here. Maybe we got unlucky with room in central but for any backpackers looking I would highly reccomed gecko!

title: Terrible breakfast!!!!
text: Came there in a raining day and everything was under my expectation. Paid 60$ per nite for the room with 3 bowls of Pho for the breakfast. The lady who took our order seemed not happy when we had some special requests cause of my 5 years old son couldn’t eat much. After almost 20 minutes waiting for the breakfast, she came with wrong orders without any apologies for her mistake or offering to change others and asked us to eat them. No minibar in the room....

title: Really nice and relaxing place BUT...
text: Came here for a 2day getaway with my relatives. For a 4star resort, it needs to works a bit harder -the place is really beautiful, well decorated. If you’re thirsty for a amazing social media post, this place won’t disappoint you. -but the pool is pretty dangerous. The quality of the tiles being used to lay the entire pool area is not good. Because of its glass nature, you might get cut. My aunt did get a cut on a knee while walking in the pool. Even the staffs there warned us about this. So BE CAREFUL. -we got a 3bedroom villa. Overall, it’s perfect and very spacious. But the furnitures are a bit old (check the photos)

title: Quan Lan Island
text: Would recommended to anyone who is in Halong bay to visit Quan Lan island. Its a real taste of proper vietnamese life without the hassel of the more touristy spots. The beaches are unbelievable and we found ourselves to be the only ones on them! You can bicycle up and down the island easily bit would recommend staying in the town. We stayed in Ann hotel which was gorgeous, got our own balcony with a great view. Definitely one of our favourite destinations on the trip!

We stayed in Ann hotel which was gorgeous, got our own balcony with a great view. Definitely one of our favourite destinations on the trip!

title: Không sống theo mong đợi
text: Địa điểm này hầu như không thể truy cập vào ban đêm và không có nhiều dịch vụ taxi ở Tam Cốc muốn đưa bạn đến đó (chúng tôi không tìm thấy bất kỳ, ngay cả Grab), và con đường dẫn đến homestay tốt nhất nên tránh vào ban đêm; Trời tối và khá nguy hiểm. Khía cạnh duy nhất của nơi này là vẻ đẹp tuyệt vời của nó nhưng tôi không khuyên bạn nên ở lại đây nếu bạn muốn ở ngoài muộn hơn vào ban đêm (21/22 h +) Các phòng rất lớn, gọn gàng và sạch sẽ, nhưng chúng tôi không có nước nóng, thật không may. Về mặt tích cực, các nhân viên rất hữu ích và có sức chứa. Thành thật mà nói, toàn bộ thời gian của bạn đều xoay quanh thời tiết, nếu trời lạnh và mưa bên ngoài, nó có thể rất lạnh trong phòng vì các ký túc xá / phòng đều ở bên ngoài. Chúng tôi đã đi khi trời rất mưa và lạnh nên trải nghiệm của chúng tôi cũng bị vấy bẩn. Wifi của chúng tôi không hoạt động do mưa. thực sự tôi chỉ giới thiệu nơi này cho bạn nếu bạn muốn ở lại nơi này nhiều ngày để thư giãn và ngắm cảnh, với thời tiết thuận lợi.

Về mặt tích cực, các nhân viên rất hữu ích và có sức chứa. Thành thật mà nói, toàn bộ thời gian của bạn đều xoay quanh thời tiết, nếu trời lạnh và mưa bên ngoài, nó có thể rất lạnh trong phòng vì các ký túc xá / phòng đều ở bên ngoài. Chúng tôi đã đi khi trời rất mưa và lạnh nên trải nghiệm của chúng tôi cũng bị vấy bẩn. Wifi của chúng tôi không hoạt động do mưa. thực sự tôi chỉ giới thiệu nơi này cho bạn nếu bạn muốn ở lại nơi này nhiều ngày để thư giãn và ngắm cảnh, với thời tiết thuận lợi.

title: Nice but couldn’t stay more than 1 night
text: We originally booked for 4 nights, not knowing that the resort was still in its “soft opening” stage. That means that much was still under construction, there was little to do and the place wasn’t fully staffed. The spa was still being built, the main bars, too. The pool was nice (big) but lacked a “resort” feel to it. There was no poolside service either. The room was brand new and huge. Very good quality accommodation. But with so little to do, we asked for a refund for the remaining 3 nights. The staff were helpful and accommodating. I spoke personally to the Manager. He was also very understanding and I suggested that their website needed to reflect that the resort was not yet complete and in soft opening stage to avoid customers like us being disappointed. In time, I’m sure this will be a lovely place and I’d potentially stay there again, but only after it’s complete and established.

title: Average Resort
text: Okay bungalows in a Lakeview setting. On Booking.com this looks like the dream resort. A part from the rainy weather it was all not how it should be. You are locked in far from everything and obliged to spend your money on overpriced regular food, drinks and tours & extra’s (i.e bottle of cheap and regular red wine from Chile = 40 USD). The kitchen and food options for lunch and dinner are far below standard. Food you find in the morning in the shaving dices with heater you later see for lunch and even for dinner (i.e. chicken curry). Transport and tours are 3x more expense than regular options you would find outside the resort with travel agencies or hotels, but while you are so far from everything there is no other option. I cannot image being locked up for more than 2 days in this resort for away while the region has so great hotel options to offer with great price/value and also are close to cultural activities and some urban life and beach.

title: Grande surprise
text: Je suis venu a cet hotel le mois janvier avec mes amis . L'hotel est assez beau avec une couleur blanche et bleue tres agreable a voir . Par contre le service est trop nul .J'ai commande une biere dans la chambre , et plus 30 mins pour arriver a ma chambre , sans acune explication . Pareil pour le restaurant , il m'a fallu d'attendre 1 heurepour avoir des plats sur la table , et impossible a manger , hamburger et la viande etait trop cuit , tellement decu pour un resort 5 etoiles . Je reviens plus jamais dans cet hotel .
hotelName: Fleur de Lys Resort & Spa Long Hai

Par contre le service est trop nul .J'ai commande une biere dans la chambre , et plus 30 mins pour arriver a ma chambre , sans acune explication . Pareil pour le restaurant , il m'a fallu d'attendre 1 heurepour avoir des plats sur la table , et impossible a manger , hamburger et la viande etait trop cuit , tellement decu pour un resort 5 etoiles . Je reviens plus jamais dans cet hotel .

title: Vakantie
text: Hotel heeft een goed uitzicht op de stad. De kamers hebben grote ramen en zijn prima. Er is wel heel veel lawaai van de Karaoke die in het gebouw aanwezig is. Het is het hoogste hotel in de stad en duidelijk zichtbaar. De bedden zijn prima, minibar, airco en een bad.

title: Khu nghỉ mát tuyệt vời
text: Tôi đã mua một gói Luxury Escape có giá trị tuyệt vời. Bao gồm rất nhiều tính năng bổ sung. Resort là một môi trường thư giãn Phòng lớn & phòng tắm. 3 hồ bơi, bãi biển riêng. Massage tuyệt vời Trường dạy nấu ăn cũng đáng giá. Chúng tôi nấu 3 món. Các nhân viên là đáng kinh ngạc, không có gì là một vấn đề. Tất cả rất lịch sự và tôn trọng. Ở lại của chúng tôi bao gồm được đáp ứng tại sân bay và hướng đến khu nghỉ mát + tương tự ngược lại. Chúng tôi thậm chí còn được đưa đến nhận phòng. Tôi đánh giá nó 4 vì chúng tôi đã có một số bữa ăn ngon nhưng cũng có một số rất trung bình. Tất cả mọi thứ đã mua tại khu nghỉ mát đều có thuế 10% và phí dịch vụ 5%. Họ có một chiếc xe buýt miễn phí đi vào Nah Trang một vài lần một ngày mà là giá trị để mua vật tư tại một trong các cửa hàng địa phương hoặc siêu thị (mà là tốn kém hơn) đó là khoảng 40 phút đi xe. Chúng tôi có một chiếc taxi từ nơi xe buýt đưa chúng tôi đến thị trường địa phương với giá khoảng 3 NZD. Nơi thú vị. . . tất cả rất khôn ngoan nhưng có một số mua tốt.

title: A decent place in Ben Tre
text: A nice enough place to stay but could do with a little TLC. Quite expensive for Vietnam and I expected more than we actually got. Good how water and reasonably comfortable bed. Decor was a little drab and could do with a make over. On arrival there was no one around that spoke English. Tried to explain that we had a reservation but were shown to a tiny room at the back of ten property behing what appeared to be a laundry area. Seemed more like staff quarters. Refused the room and were shown to another which was fine. A mix up I am sure and quickly resolved. Later when the manageress, Hong arrived she was SO helpful. Despite rarely using guides or tours we booked a tour with her for the following day. She really is excellent and we had great time. A mine of information and the communication skills to put things across in an entertaining way. Well worth the money. Hong is a star - I hope they pay her well! Breakfast was very good and quickly served. Beer was cheap and cold. The rest of the staff, although speaking little English, were really friendly and helpful. Location was quiet, but quite a walk into the town market area. Only one restaurant close to the hotel and Not too many eating places that we could find accross teh river apart from an excellent noodle place at the far end of the night market road.

title: Kinh ngạc
text: Chúng tôi ở lại đây vào tháng 11 và thật tuyệt vời. Sự chào đón thân thiện, khách sạn xinh đẹp với một hồ bơi tuyệt vời, và các phòng vô cùng rộng lớn. Toàn bộ nơi được làm bằng gỗ và cảm thấy rất sang trọng, trong khi các phòng tắm riêng là lớn với các phụ kiện rất đẹp. Mọi thứ đều rất riêng tư. Bữa sáng ngon, đặc biệt là món ăn Việt Nam thay đổi mỗi ngày. Khách sạn cách xa sự nhộn nhịp của thành phố nhưng có một xe buýt đưa đón mỗi ngày nếu bạn cần phải đi. Cuối cùng, nó là gần bãi biển đẹp nhất của hòn đảo, trong khi có một nhà hàng wee tuyệt vời, nhà thảo dược, ở cuối đường phố. Sẽ không đáng để viết bài đánh giá nếu tôi không đề cập đến gia đình đáng yêu đang điều hành nơi này, thực sự là một số người thân thiện và tốt bụng nhất chúng tôi gặp ở đất nước, luôn sẵn sàng giúp bạn và chia sẻ một tách trà với nhau tìm hiểu về khách hàng của họ và nói về các nền văn hóa khác nhau của chúng tôi. Cảm ơn bạn rất nhiều Phú Quốc Green Land cho một kỳ nghỉ khó quên!

title: Superb Resort for Relaxing
text: We got the Villa with ocean view for 3 days 2 nights. Good: -Spacious room with nice view & atmosphere -Huge resort area covered with greens -Very kind & helpful staffs. What can do better: -More food assortments
hotelName: Green Bay Phu Quoc Resort & Spa
en_review: We got the Villa with ocean view for 3 days 2 nights. Good: -Spacious room with nice view & atmosphere -Huge resort area covered with greens -Very kind & helpful staffs. What can do better: -More food assortments

title: Chất lượng giấc ngủ quá tệ
text: Nếu bạn muốn trải nghiệm cảm giác ngủ trên sàn nhà, đây là nơi bạn ở. Các tấm nệm rất cứng, chúng dường như chỉ là một mảnh gỗ với một tấm phủ nó. Tiếng còi báo động từ một tòa nhà quân sự gần đó sẽ đánh thức bạn dậy vào lúc bình minh. Bữa sáng chỉ phục vụ cà phê hoặc trà cực ngọt và Phở. Không có gì khác, Các nhân viên không nói tiếng Anh và không phải là rất khách hàng theo định hướng.

Không có gì khác, Các nhân viên không nói tiếng Anh và không phải là rất khách hàng theo định hướng.

title: Beautiful Farmstay
text: One of our favorite stays on our trip around the world. The food was excellent, and the hotel was a great value for the money. It was nice to learn about the local farms on the morning tour. The staff provided great customer service and was welcoming, and even helped our older son learn how to ride a bicycle. We will definitely return the next time we are in the area.
en_review: One of our favorite stays on our trip around the world. The food was excellent, and the hotel was a great value for the money. It was nice to learn about the local farms on the morning tour. The staff provided great customer service and was welcoming, and even helped our older son learn how to ride a bicycle. We will definitely return the next time we are in the area.

title: Đêm tồi tệ nhất tôi từng trải qua tại một khách sạn
text: Chồng tôi và tôi đã được đặt chỗ trong một đêm tại khách sạn này bởi công ty du lịch của chúng tôi trong một thông báo ngắn vì kế hoạch phải được thay đổi vì cuộc đua marathon Đồng Văn. Chúng tôi không biết những gì mong đợi và lúc đầu có ấn tượng tích cực. Các phòng nhìn đẹp và được trang bị tốt. Tuy nhiên, ngay sau đó chúng tôi phát hiện ra rằng TV và điều hòa không hoạt động, các món trà bị bẩn, internet bị hỏng và bỏ lỡ và không có nước nóng. Nhiều giờ sau khi tắm nước lạnh, điều hòa bắt đầu hoạt động và nước nóng xuất hiện cùng với những vị khách khác. Mặc dù có ấn tượng ban đầu khá tốt, nhưng nơi này hóa ra là nhà nghỉ ba lô tồi tệ nhất và ồn ào nhất mà tôi từng thấy. Về cơ bản, chúng tôi không thể ngủ được cả đêm. Những vị khách khác trên sàn của chúng tôi liên tục (!) La hét trong ít nhất ba giờ. Họ say đến mức điên cuồng đến nỗi không có ý nghĩa gì khi thử nói chuyện với họ. Sau khi họ dừng lại, suốt đêm còn lại, chúng tôi được 'giải trí' bởi quán karaoke ở tầng dưới + mọi người la hét bên ngoài khách sạn. Đó thực sự là đêm tồi tệ nhất tôi từng trải qua tại một khách sạn trong suốt cuộc đời. Một ghi chú bên cạnh, cũng có một con mèo la hét suốt đêm bên trong tòa nhà. Nó bị kẹt ở tầng dưới gần quầy lễ tân. Các nhân viên dường như không quan tâm chút nào, cả về sức khỏe của con mèo - cũng như về những vị khách phải nghe nó suốt đêm và sáng.

title: dịch vụ tốt
text: nhân viên hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình, hồ bơi rộng, nước ấm, đồ ăn khá ngon, nhưng chưa có nhiều món đặc sắc, phòng view hồ bơi và biển rất đẹp, sạch sẽ , các bạn nhân viên phục vụ tại phòng rất nhẹ nhàng, chu đáo

en_review: nhân viên hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình, hồ bơi rộng, nước ấm, đồ ăn khá ngon, nhưng chưa có nhiều món đặc sắc, phòng view hồ bơi và biển rất đẹp, sạch sẽ , các bạn nhân viên phục vụ tại phòng rất nhẹ nhàng, chu đáo

title: Pour un 3*, à éviter si possible
text: Moquette tachée, murs sales et abîmés, wifi disponible dans le couloir sous le routeur mais le signal n'est pas assez puissant à l'intérieur des chambres, joints des carreaux de salle de bain moisis, salle du petit-déjeuner trop petite et tables dressées jusque devant les portes de l'ascenceur, mauvaise isolation phonique... En bref, cet hôtel ne vaut ses 3* même au Viêt Nam.
en_review: Moquette tachée, murs sales et abîmés, wifi disponible dans le couloir sous le routeur mais le signal n'est pas assez puissant à l'intérieur des chambres, joints des carreaux de salle de bain moisis, salle du petit-déjeuner trop petite et tables dressées jusque devant les portes de l'ascenceur, mauvaise isolation phonique... En bref, cet hôtel ne vaut ses 3* même au Viêt Nam.

title: Overpriced, not authentic but still pleasent
text: Pros - good location when doing the loop - interesting interior design attempting to use the local materials creating cosy atmosphere - good breakfast Cons - completely overpriced - very poor dinner (we ended up going to a local restaurant to eat) - European feeling - separate bathroom and toilet outside unacceptable for the price you pay (almost 100$ with dinner) - private room is not really private since it has an open roof so you hear others snoring at night We would not recommend the place considering other options in the area
hotelName: Auberge de Meo Vac - Mountain Lodge
en_review: Pros - good location when doing the loop - interesting interior design attempting to use the local materials creating cosy atmosphere - good breakfast Cons - completely overpriced - very poor dinner (we ended up going to a local restaurant to eat) - European feeling - separate bathroom and toilet outside unacceptable for the price you pay (almost 100$ with dinner) - private room is not really private since it has an open roof so you hear others snoring at night We would not recommend the place considering other options in the area

title: Wunderschöne Lage... Aber auch nicht mehr
text: Achtung, nicht verwechseln mit dem Lang Co BEACH Resort!!! Die Hotelanlage hat sehr viel Potenzial, das aber nicht ausgenutzt wird. Die Zimmer waren ganz nett eingerichtet, beim genaueren Hinsehen bemängelt man die Bauqualität. Das angegebene WLAN hat weder im Zimmer noch in der Lobby richtig funktioniert. Gebucht haben wir die Zimmer mit Frühstücksbüffet, da wir aber die einzigen Gäste der riesigen Anlage waren, haben wir ein A La Karte Frühstück gekriegt, wobei die Auswahl sehr spärlich war. Der Pool war in Ordnung, und ab 18.00/19.00 Uhr - wenns dunkel wird - herrscht dort absolute Ruhe. Die Hotelangestellten waren auch alle weg.
en_review: Achtung, nicht verwechseln mit dem Lang Co BEACH Resort!!! Die Hotelanlage hat sehr viel Potenzial, das aber nicht ausgenutzt wird. Die Zimmer waren ganz nett eingerichtet, beim genaueren Hinsehen bemängelt man die Bauqualität. Das angegebene WLAN hat weder im Zimmer noch in der Lobby richtig funktioniert. Gebucht haben wir die Zimmer mit Frühstücksbüffet, da wir aber die einzigen Gäste der riesigen Anlage waren, haben wir ein A La Karte Frühstück gekriegt, wobei die Auswahl sehr spärlich war. Der Pool war in Ordnung, und ab 18.00/19.00 Uhr - wenns dunkel wird - herrscht dort absolute Ruhe. Die Hotelangestellten waren auch alle weg.

title: Sleep surrounded by the nature!
text: Amazing scenario, surrounded by the nature, a very peaceful and relaxing option for one night with a great views from your bedroom and many options to spend the following day, kayaking or visiting natural park.
en_review: Amazing scenario, surrounded by the nature, a very peaceful and relaxing option for one night with a great views from your bedroom and many options to spend the following day, kayaking or visiting natural park.

title: Perfect retreat but...
text: A tranquil retreat, clean with beautiful setting. Stayed for 2nights and the hotel was quiet and peaceful. Service is excellent and staff very friendly. However, we ate in the restaurant on the first night and my wife was ill some 30 mins later. We reported it and the staff were sympathetic but my wife had to miss a full day tour on th following day. It would have been nice if the hotel had at least refunded the cost of the meal! The location is quite a way from Hue city and you cannot walk to any nearby restaurants. The hotel does offer a shuttle service but we didn’t pick this up from their web site. The web site offers tours but no prices and it proved impossible to find the prices prior to arrival to compare with Viator for example.
en_review: A tranquil retreat, clean with beautiful setting. Stayed for 2nights and the hotel was quiet and peaceful. Service is excellent and staff very friendly. However, we ate in the restaurant on the first night and my wife was ill some 30 mins later. We reported it and the staff were sympathetic but my wife had to miss a full day tour on th following day. It would have been nice if the hotel had at least refunded the cost of the meal! The location is quite a way from Hue city and you cannot walk to any nearby restaurants. The hotel does offer a shuttle service but we didn’t pick this up from their web site. The web site offers tours but no prices and it proved impossible to find the prices prior to arrival to compare with Viator for example.

title: 저렴하고 공항과 매우 가까운 호텔
text: 늦은 시간 공항에 도착해 수속만 1시간 매우 지칠법한 시간에 공항 근처 네이비 호텔은 가성비 면에서 아주 훌륭했다 깔끔한 편이고 규모도 매우 큰 호텔이다 호텔에서 10분거리 이다

title: không phải loại của chúng tôi
text: đó là một trong những lần mà các bình luận viên làm cho tôi ngạc nhiên về một nơi. . . Tôi là tất cả cho vilages nhỏ và thiên nhiên (và chúng tôi đặt nơi này một cách chính xác cho các reasouns) nhưng tôi tự nhiên mong đợi hoặc là một kỳ nghỉ thoải mái hoặc một mức giá hợp lý. thật đáng buồn, khu vườn homestay không cung cấp. trái với tên, nơi không có vườn. đó là một tòa nhà bê tông bình thường. các phòng rất cơ bản với phòng tắm chung và không có cửa sổ kính. vì vậy nếu đó là một ngày mưa hoặc một ngày mưa, bạn sẽ phải đóng rèm cửa gỗ và ở trong bóng tối. khu vực chung cũng bao gồm một số bàn và ghế nhựa ở tầng trệt. bữa sáng miễn phí chỉ là một chiếc bánh mì đơn giản với trứng tráng và một tách trà. như tôi đã nói không có gì sai với chỗ ở cơ bản, nhưng các thẻ giá là 360 k cho phòng, 150 k cho một chiếc xe đạp cũ của Trung Quốc được tổ chức cùng với băng keo và 100 k cho bữa tối mà chúng tôi có ít hơn nhiều trên các điểm nóng du lịch quanh Việt Nam . . . cách những người khác biện minh cho những mức giá này là "hợp lý" là ngoài sự hiểu biết của tôi, nhưng nó đơn giản không phải dành cho chúng ta. về mặt tích cực, phòng sạch sẽ và thân thiện với chủ sở hữu. họ đủ tử tế để tuân thủ khi chúng tôi muốn hủy đặt chỗ của chúng tôi trong những ngày còn lại.

title: Austero pero muy economico
text: Es un hotel pequeño y sin lujos, el desauno no es demasiado bueno, pero hay que decir en su favor que es muy economico, son muy amables y esta limpio. Te ofreceran las excursiones y los billetes de autobus. A mi me recogieron en el aeropuerto con un taxi por un precio muy razonable comparado con las compañias de taxis de la zona. Estoy satisfecho
en_review: Es un hotel pequeño y sin lujos, el desauno no es demasiado bueno, pero hay que decir en su favor que es muy economico, son muy amables y esta limpio. title: Chuyến đi kinh khủng nhất ngày 29/06/2018
text: Ngày 29/06/2018 tôi có đặt 12 phòng cho gia đình tôi nhưng do có việc bận nên có 4 người không đi được. Trước ngày khởi hành 2 ngày tôi đã gọi điện cho anh Đông (giám đốc ks). báo hủy anh Đông ok cho tôi hủy. Nhưng khi tôi đến nhận phòng thì nhân viên khách sạn thông báo là chúng tôi phải ăn tất cả các bữa ở ks này và phải sử dụng dịch vụ của ks không được đi ra ngoài. Vì bức xúc quá nên tôi có hỏi lại Anh Đông nhưng nhận được cậu trả lời "không ở thì biến..." Tôi có thắc mắc thêm thì anh Đông liền tát vào mặt tôi liên tiếp 2 cái. Vụ việc tôi đã báo cơ quan công an xử lý. Mọi người lưu ý khi đặt phòng tại ks này.

title: !!!!! Stay away from this resort!!!
text: We booked this beach front room for 3 nights during our 7 days stay in Phu Quoc, room is clean, a/c blowing cold air but that is all you get. Like the rest of the reviews, the beach front is actually a view of their restaurant and then beach 30m out. The place is jam packed with tourist buses until late afternoon, my wife's flip flops got stolen right outside of our room. Laundry service is a rip off, they weighed our laundry wet..... beach is nice and calm but loads of garbage everywhere and no one seemed to care....... we had visited Da nang and Nha Trang during our five weeks vacation in Vietnam and I have to say it's night and day! I will never return to this resort!

The place is jam packed with tourist buses until late afternoon, my wife's flip flops got stolen right outside of our room. Laundry service is a rip off, they weighed our laundry wet..... beach is nice and calm but loads of garbage everywhere and no one seemed to care....... we had visited Da nang and Nha Trang during our five weeks vacation in Vietnam and I have to say it's night and day! I will never return to this resort!

title: Terrible
text: If your budget is $10 per night, then ok.....it has a bed and toilet and running water. Anything above $10 and its not worth it !!! Construction quality unbelievably bad.....AC was just a fan. Not clean. Breakfast low quality. Avoid.....stay at Hoa Binh.....its better ( marginally! ) Highlight was the large framed color photograph of a naked lady on the wall by the bed......wife thought it was a bit tacky !!! Hotel also goes by the name of SONG LAM HOTEL......its one and the same

title: Kì nghỉ rất rất tuyệt vời
text: Khách sạn rất rất tuyệt vời. Khách sạn rộng và đẹp. Nhà hàng thức ăn ngon miệng và hợp khẩu vị. Đội ngũ nhân viên chuyên nghiệp, ân cần , chu đáo, thân thiện và luôn nở nụ cười trên môi. Gia đình rất ấn tượng với bạn nhân viên hành lí tại sảnh tên Ngô Thanh Vàng, bạn ấy rất chu đáo, đáo, vui vẻ và rất dễ mến. Cảm ơn Vinoasis đã mang lại cho gia đình một kì nghỉ đầy ý nghĩa. Hẹn gặp lại Vinoasis.

title: 适合全家游
text: 别墅大，有独立泳池，酒店的私人沙滩一个人都没有，除了吃饭的时候看不见别的客人，私密性非常好，酒店里去哪都可以叫嘟嘟车，非常方便。但是，离市区较远，适合不出酒店纯休闲游的人，父母很满意，总之是非常不错的体验。
hotelName: Meliá Vinpearl Cam Ranh Beach Resort

title: Not recomandable
text: The Promotion for this hostel was really awesome und we thought we were gonna have the time of our life. In the end all the activities they bragged about were not free as promoted. Some activities weren't even offered e.g the was no Yoga teacher available. Also you have to pay for the shuttle back to sleeper bus, which we weren't told about. The beach is not useable because of all the trash. In the end the hostel is quite nice, but all you can do here is drink all day and there are definitely better places to do that and with all the disappointments we encountered we can not recommend it here.

title: 모든게만족이었습니다 아이들이 엄청 좋아하네요
text: 룸도 깨끗하고 직원Sa Lem, nhi anh Thuan도 친절하고 바닷가도 넘 이쁘고 수영장도 개인풀과 비치옆 모든 수영장에 구명조끼 튜브가 모두 비치되어 있어서좋았습니다

title: Cajíci
text: Làm thế nào thậm chí có thể có 4 * cho điều này? ? Bắt đầu từ đâu. . . Khách sạn đã không giao tiếp ở tất cả, tôi gửi bốn email không có phản ứng. Một căn phòng rất đẹp với máy lạnh. Tuy nhiên nó phải sạch hơn nhiều, tôi đoán vậy. Nhưng không quá tệ. . . Một dịch vụ phòng là mỗi buổi sáng lúc 8: 15 AM (nghiêm túc?!!) Và một ngày làm sạch phụ nữ đã không hiển thị ở tất cả. . . Nhưng bụi bẩn hoàn toàn ở khắp mọi nơi bên ngoài phòng. Ok, đây là Việt Nam, nhưng vẫn - 4 sao nghỉ dưỡng. Bể bơi có kích thước tốt nhưng nó cũng bẩn. Rất nhiều cát ở trong đó. Và bên ngoài hồ bơi là rác ở khắp mọi nơi. Luôn luôn. Đó là sai lầm rất đắt tiền. . . : - (

title: Disgusting!!
text: Couldnt agree more with previous poster visited 15 dec 2009 same garbage, glass etc, just some dying kittens added to the mini zoo(and we saw a great zoo in the mekong where animals were kept better than in some western zoos so there is no excuse). we were dropped here after our snorkeling trip for an hour, far better things to see.
en_review: Couldnt agree more with previous poster visited 15 dec 2009 same garbage, glass etc, just some dying kittens added to the mini zoo(and we saw a great zoo in the mekong where animals were kept better than in some western zoos so there is no excuse). we were dropped here after our snorkeling trip for an hour, far better things to see.

title: Good location, not great room
text: This location is nice and the pool is beautiful. Breakfast is also good. We were disappointed to pay over 25 per night there, however (sounds cheap I know but not for Vietnam). This was the only room we were disappointed by on our entire stay. The room was grungy and the sheets so thin and had blood stains. I'm sure they had been washed, but the stains were not appealing. Cobwebs between the bed and the wall. Additionally, our pool view room had only a small window that could only open on one side (opaque when closed) and you could only see it from the bathroom. The main room had an interior hallway window and the curtain didn't cover the door window so you could never get the room dark at night. Also, the toilet ran constantly. Last thing- the towels were discolored and stiff- again, I'm sure they were clean but full of stains. This room would be what I'd expect for 15 a night, but not 25.
en_review: This location is nice and the pool is beautiful. Breakfast is also good. We were disappointed to pay over 25 per night there, however (sounds cheap I know but not for Vietnam). This was the only room we were disappointed by on our entire stay. The room was grungy and the sheets so thin and had blood stains. I'm sure they had been washed, but the stains were not appealing. Cobwebs between the bed and the wall. Additionally, our pool view room had only a small window that could only open on one side (opaque when closed) and you could only see it from the bathroom. The main room had an interior hallway window and the curtain didn't cover the door window so you could never get the room dark at night. Also, the toilet ran constantly. Last thing- the towels were discolored and stiff- again, I'm sure they were clean but full of stains. This room would be what I'd expect for 15 a night, but not 25.

title: Séjour en couple durant une semaine
text: Nous avons séjourné dans cet hôtel du 31 janvier au 6 février 2019. La vérité est que nous avons vu les messages postés sur cet hôtel et nous avions de réels doutes sur l'état de ce dernier. Nous hésitions même à changer d'hôtel. Eh bien, nous ne regrettons absolument pas notre choix d'être resté!! La chambre était très propre et spacieuse. Nous avions une belle vue sur la mer. Le petit déjeuner servi sous forme de buffet était très bon. Il y avait beaucoup de choix, alors oui en fin de service le buffet est moins garnis mais cela reste correct. Les infrastructures sont vraiment de qualité, la piscine est immenses avec différents bassins. La plage de sable blanc est magnifique, alors là encore, il y a effectivement quelques déchets dans la mer mais on voit que l'hôtel fait des efforts pour régler ce problème. On voit des gens ratisser la plage pour ramasser les déchets et utiliser des filets pour récupérer ce qu'il y a en bord de mer. Le bar/ restaurant de la piscine est très bien et les plats sont bons. L'hôtel met en place un service de location de scooter que nous avons utilisé pendant 2 jours et vraiment rien à redire nous avions le choix parmi divers scooters. Pour ce qui est du personnel, vraiment très souriants et à l'écoute. On voit qu'il s'agit d'un nouvel hôtel car ils leur arrivaient d'être parfois hésitant avec un anglais difficile sur certains points sur certaines choses ou qu'ils manquaient de rapidité dans certains cas. Par exemple, quand le ménage était fait, il manquait parfois les peignoirs, des petits oublis qui ne devraient pas avoir lieu dans un 5étoiles, néanmoins avec de la pratique et un peu plus de rigueur cela sera un très bon hôtel avec un super service. En conclusion, cet un hôtel très bien avec un superbe emplacement très calme avec un cadre magnifique, mais un personnel encore un peu hésitant sur certains points et avec un manque d'expérience qui doit être amélioré afin d'être à la hauteur du cadre. Un bonne adresse avec un superbe rapport qualité prix .
