title: One night stay is ok
text: The rooms are good, the food is good, the service is ok, but the language skills are not. This is a place to stay 1-2 nights on a tour of Mekong Delta and have a tourguide do the communication for you for the best experience.
en_review: The rooms are good, the food is good, the service is ok, but the language skills are not. This is a place to stay 1-2 nights on a tour of Mekong Delta and have a tourguide do the communication for you for the best experience.

title: Paradies
text: Toller, kitschiger Blick auf den Mekong. Bungalow recht klein mit Balkon zum See; Dusche mit Milchglaswand mit tollem Effekt durch durchschimmernde Gekkos und das Wasser; Service gut. Essen gut; Pool angenehm. Tolle Vegetation, sehr ruhig - einfach paradisisch. Hotel ist durch Schranke bewacht.
en_review: Toller, kitschiger Blick auf den Mekong. Bungalow recht klein mit Balkon zum See; Dusche mit Milchglaswand mit tollem Effekt durch durchschimmernde Gekkos und das Wasser; Service gut. Essen gut; Pool angenehm. Tolle Vegetation, sehr ruhig - einfach paradisisch. Hotel ist durch Schranke bewacht.

title: The best hotel in town
text: Hoa Binh 1 hotel is 4* hotel in Long Xuyen, the room is spacious and clean. Buffet breakfast is just fine. The pool is small but good enough for the kids. Food and drink in hotel is not expensive. Generally this hotel is OK for overnight.

title: KS THIẾU UY TÍN - THIẾU TRÁCH NHIỆM
text: Ngày 27/3 bên công ty chúng tôi có đặt 16 phòng tại khách sạn, ngủ tối ngày 12/4/2019 Bạn nhân viên lễ tân tên Mrs Biên đã nhận lời, chúng tôi đề nghị gửi số TK để chuyển khoản đặt cọc, nhưng bạn này nói không cần, chúng em giữ phòng cho bên anh, anh yeey tâm sẽ luôn có phòng. Tôi tin tưởng: nhưng ko ngờ 22h04 ngày 4/4/2019 ks nhắn tin do em trai của bạn ấy và các bạn lên Điện Biên, không có phòng ngủ, nên họ đã hủy phòng của bên mình 1 cách phũ phàng, nói thông cảm. Tôi không thể chấp nhận được chuyện này. Thiếu UY TÍN - TRÁCH NHIỆM, làm như vậy có được không ? Làm ăn phải có uy tín với khách hàng, còn chất lượng phòng sẽ đi liền với các quản lý làm việc Tôi chia sẻ để Du khách hãy chọ khách sạn khác,,,

title: Mit Salmonellenvergiftung abgereist
text: Der Farmstay ist sehr gut gelegen, wirklich sehr ländlich. Die Zimmer sind spartanisch, aber ok. Das Personal ist wechselhaft von sehr nett bis unfreundlich. Eigentlich hätten wir 3-4 Sterne gegeben, allerdings sind wir mit einer Salmonellenvergiftung wieder gefahren. Auch anderen Gästen ging es hörbar (Bäder mit offenen Fenstern) nicht gut. Deshalb nur ein Punkt.

title: Great staff
text: Ms. Duyin at the front desk was really efficient, pleasant, helpful and went out of her way to make sure we had a memorable stay at the resort. The management was extremely accommodating as it allowed us an early check in and we highly recommend this resort to anyone visiting Phu Quoc for a memorable visit.

text: 友人とハノイ旅行で利用、5年ほど前にも利用さたけど古さを感じてましたが最近休館をリノベ-ションしたようでキレイでした。値段も手頃ですが何せ日本人だらけです。

title: Nice place , bad service . unprofessional staff .
text: We had stayed here 2 nights ( Sep. 23rd & 24th ) 2014 Except the nice butler Cù Văn Siêng - who took care us- All staff of this resort DON'T KNOW HOW TO SMILE . Once again We would like to thank you mr. Cù Văn Siêng for your helping us to had a nice place to stay when we had to check out lake and your arranging a good car to take us to the airport . Restaurant staff served wrong foods , chatting , web checking , phone calling , smoking , drinking coffee at the restaurant in front of their guests . They do not care about customers Beach Club staff did not give bill to me when I payed for our coffee . The resort is in a beautiful setting surrounded . The room was nice, I enjoyed a large bathroom! Room telephone did not work .

title: Saubere Zimmer - gute Lage
text: Wir waren nur eine Nacht dort und es hat uns gut gefallen. Auch hat uns die Familie gleich eine Tour organisiert die einfach grandios war. Die Hölen sind ein echtes Highlite!!! Einziger Mangelpunkt ist die sehr grosse Ringhörigkeit der Zimmet. Da wir um 3.30 Uhr am aufstehen mussten wollten wir um 10pm schlafen. Die Familie "unterhielt" sich sehr laut im Erdgeschoss und es wurde auch noch lange in die Nacht Karaoke gesungen... wir sind nicht heikel diesbezüglich. Wir empfehlen die Unterkunft aber auf jeden Fall.

title: Đừng ở đây nếu bạn là một nữ du khách độc thân
text: Chúng tôi ở lại đây vào tháng 3 để hy vọng mọi thứ đã thay đổi. Trong khi chúng tôi ở đó, chúng tôi đã chứng kiến một nhân viên bằng lời nói quấy rối một nữ du khách độc thân. Chúng tôi trở thành bạn với khách du lịch này và cô ấy nói với chúng tôi rằng nhân viên này liên tục nhắn tin cho cô ấy và nổi giận với cô ấy vì không đi chơi với anh ta. Một đêm nọ, hai nhân viên la hét với nhau trong khi chúng tôi đang ăn tối tại nhà hàng của họ. Nó có tiềm năng trở thành một nơi rất tốt nếu họ thuê nhân viên tốt hơn.

title: Comment of Ho Tram Osaka Resort Vung Tau
text: Ho Tram Osaka Resort is located in the very country side, very quiet in the night but no others entertainment in the night since it's located in the very lonely beach, you have survive food from the hotel.... (don't stay too many day, otherwise, you'll feed up with same food everyday.Against Mosquito Liquid is necessary during staying.

title: Subpar service
text: We (2 people) booked a single room and of course there was only a small blanket and it’s not big enough to cover for both of us. I kindly went to the reception to ask for one more blanket and no one was there. Waited for 20 mins before an old senile man showed up to say that: that blanket is big enough and you can’t find a bigger blanket on earth. I said “just give us another one” and he said no. I called the number of the hotel, the new guy simply replied “no” and hung up on me. I could only rate 1 star bcuz there is no 0 star option

title: superbe endroit
text: Endroit superbement placé sur les bords de l'estuaire du Mékong, plein de verdure avec un joli jardin exotique agrémenté de ponts,On y arrive en barque à moteur. Le bleu de la piscine à débordement contraste avec la proximité des eaux troubles du fleuve, les nombreux bateaux commercent du matin au soir.les lodges sont spacieux et très bien agencés ( baignoire et vasque en bois ) . Un cours de cuisine locale est donné gratuitement vers 18h30 et les mets préparés sont dégustés au diner, moment très agréable ! Lieu idéal pour y trouver le repos pendant quelques jours.

title: трэш
text: Господа, кто дал этому отелю 5*???? Поверьте, я не сравниваю с Ritz и прочими отелями, я говорю об элементарных вещах: 1. еда в ресторане отеля - до 5* ей ну просто очень далеко, это столовка 2. русские Guest relations - не знаю, из какой деревни приехали эти барышни 3. потеряла на пляже электронный ключ-карточку от номера, приходу на ресепшен за новым, мне говорят "платите", ...?? 4. поселили в номер в бунгало, в нем сильно тек душ, попросила переселить. Нашли номер в основном здании. Долго ждала bellboy, который в свою очередь ждал clubcar, чтобы перевезти мой чемодан на колесиках. Не дождалась, принесла сама. можно продолжать еще. Из приятного: шикарные морепродукты в ресторане рядом с пляжем, просто праздник живота какой-то, широченный пляж 9для любителей пеших прогулок самое то).

title: Don't believe Mr and Mrs Smith. Awful, given what it aspires to be.
text: We rate Mr and Mrs Smith and check them out, but don't always book through them if the price is better on other sites. However it has alway until now proved a reliable guide. This place is such a dissapointment. Mossie nets with holes around the bed, drab room, a welcome cocktail that went under the name of a mojito but was anything but, barely edible food. Yes the setting is beautiful and the bathroom is great but that just is not enough. It's in the back end of beyond down a rough track in what appears to be a seedy, run down area. Be warned! In future we will stick with the chains, eg Belmond, Four Seasons, Sixth Senses.

This place is such a dissapointment. Mossie nets with holes around the bed, drab room, a welcome cocktail that went under the name of a mojito but was anything but, barely edible food. title: I HATE being lied to
text: Ok first off this is just shy of 60 kilometres by the shortest route , second at least 10kms out the signs start telling you it's only another 5 Kms a complete lie! Then you get there and the man at the gate speaks no English and wanted 50 dong just for me to look around! I refused to pay so can only tell you that the accommodation is in brick built villas and that the beach is small. IF you are going to attract English speaking people ( all signs ARE in English) then a customers first contact MUST speak or understand English, lack of this shows lack of care and will not get me staying here. Big disappointment!
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng và Spa Wild Beachs

Then you get there and the man at the gate speaks no English and wanted 50 dong just for me to look around! I refused to pay so can only tell you that the accommodation is in brick built villas and that the beach is small. IF you are going to attract English speaking people ( all signs ARE in English) then a customers first contact MUST speak or understand English, lack of this shows lack of care and will not get me staying here. Big disappointment!

title: Hotel sans charme, mais mieux que nos attentes
text: Hôtel correct, chambre correct, piscine pratiquement sur la route... mais le restaurant (aussi sans charme) offre des plats vraiment authentiques et bons. On y trouve beaucoup de locaux qui font des repas avec cérémonielles très intéressants et, pour nous, amusantes. Petit déjeuner riche et aussi authentique. Personnel très aimable. Propre.

title: hotel correct mais moyen pour le prix

title: Tired..
text: I feel that perhaps 5 years ago this place would have been the relaxing paradise I was looking for. It just seems quite sad and run down when we stayed. Good points: I enjoyed the food, and the communal aspect of sit down meals. I see people have described being hungry, and I'm not sure how as food was plentiful and nice. I also found it a sociable place, and met a nice group of interesting people. It is a place for relaxation, and it was a nice wind down being there. Staff were great, had a big bonfire one night. Bad points: The whole place looked run down. The communal games area just had piles of unloved toys/books/broken equipment lying about, and it really wouldn't take much for them to make it that little bit more inviting. Table tennis was fun though. The huts and bathroom facilities are basic, which we expected. Several showers were broken/leaking, adding to the unloved feel. And some huts are nicer than other, with shells mobiles and hammocks. But bedding is a bit grim, and for this price it could be just a bit nicer (when I compare to other places we stayed during our trip). Dogs about (which I loved), but all covered in fleas. Beach is alright, I have seen far more beautiful. Not the cleanest, lots of rubbish washed up. It really wouldn't take much for this place to be much better. It feels like a once loved paradise which the owner had bored of which is a shame as it wouldn't take much to get it that little bit better.

title: Once you've paid there's no service anymore
text: We went for that hotel since it's recommended in our travel guide. Upon arrival, after 6hrs travel, we were not allowed to check in our room, change clothes or maybe eat something, but a guy has been called who asked us where we came from, where we go after Phong Nha, if we already have a busticket, if we want to rent a motorbike and then he gave us a flyer with tours he offers and waited for us to book something. Besides an uncosy feeling in this superficially kept clean hotel that was our first impression: "Buy something". They told us, we should buy everything from the hotel and not outside. Concerning the room - it was ok, but not clean, not comfortable (among other things I found an old shaver on the wardrobe!). The breakfast was tasty - Omelette with Coffee and I was lucky, I would have chosen this since you don't get to choose - and one of the four ladies was friendly and smiled all the time and really tried, I think. But also nobody speaks english there and this is not a big issue as long as the service is good and / or there are no problems to be solved. We made the mistake to book a busticket via the hotel. We were supposed to be fetched at 10 pm. That evening the bus was almost 2hrs late and came around midnight. The staff was not speaking english and also did not care about calling someone to inform us, what happened. We had to do it ourselves. So we called the two numbers printed on the ticked. One was not available, the other did not exist! That's how we sat there in the middle of the night. When the bus finally arrived, it was overbooked. We asked for two seats in the upper back. What we got where one seat in the back at the toilet and one seat in the front. When we had to change for another bus in Hanoi, some taxi driver took us to a travel agency and asked for 220.000Dong for a 10 minute drive!!! (We didn't pay him and he just drove away) We also rented a motorbike and - as everywhere in Vietnam - you get it with the tank just that full that you can manage to drive the 300m to the guy on the corner that sells petrol in plastic bottles. I'm sure that's where the freshly bought petrol goes back to when you return the motorbike again. We would not recommend this hotel (for Westerners at least). The other hotels may also not be that clean or cosy, I don't know about that, but the disappointing thing is, that in Mountain View they try to sell you something, but are not interested in making your stay pleasant in return or feel responsible for the products the sell once you've paid.

title: A nice, local family resort
text: The Long Hai Beach Resort is about two hours' drive from Ho Chi Minh and located on the east end of the beach alongside the Anoasis Resort. The location is about 15 minutes' walk to the crowded public beach on the more western end. We booked through  The resort itself is well groomed and lush with many plants and flowers. We stayed in a garden bungalow, which is a small house divided into four sections. The architecture and room furnishings are Chinese-style. In my opinion, the room furnishings are not exactly luxurious to Western standards, but minimum and clean. The majority of the guests were local and in families. There were a few other couples, but we were definitely outnumbered by boisterous kids during the free breakfast buffet and poolside. There is a buffet and then a separate restaurant called Heritage in the same building, looking onto the beach. The breakfast buffet was large but left much to be desired in taste. However compared to the buffet, I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food at the Heritage restaurant. The seafood dishes were fresh and very nice. There are not many other places to eat except the shacks on the public beach or going back into town, so we ate all of our meals at the resort. The facilities were well-kept and clean. The pool was large and had plenty of towels and lounge chairs available. The private beach area was not crowded and for the most part clean. There were a few stray plastic bags but trash became much more frequent on the walk into the public beach. For a convenient beach getaway from HCMC, I would recommend this resort for a short visit. The price is right and the facilities are well-kept. However due to its isolated location and lack of dining options, I would not recommend it for a longer stay. Also keep in mind that the resort is catered to local families so while you can find those quiet spots, it is not a romantic beach hideaway.

title: Don't come here if you are a drinker.
text: Booked and paid up front for this place, as it's advertised as having a rooftop bar and minibars. It also gets fulsome reviews everywhere. Imagine our delight upon arriving and finding there is no minibar and no bar. Holiday weekend ruined. The room is clean, however.
en_review: Booked and paid up front for this place, as it's advertised as having a rooftop bar and minibars. It also gets fulsome reviews everywhere. Imagine our delight upon arriving and finding there is no minibar and no bar. Holiday weekend ruined. The room is clean, however.

title: Resort living
text: We spent 6 days at the resort as part of a package deal. The resort has all the amenities we required including 3 pools , spa , restaurants , beach bar etc. The resort had only been open since April so understandably there were some teething issues. I realize that English is not widely understood and I would not criticize the resort on that basis however some steps may assist communication . For example I can only recall perhaps 5 staff who were able to understand reasonable English . A solution could be to employ a few people who could be used as interpreters or informal teachers . However having said that we coped comfortably. The food on the whole was very good although sometimes not sufficiently heated . A seafood bbq was not successful as the food was kept warm for too long and became tough. The resort itself was beautiful , very open and the rooms were very nice and well serviced A shuttle bus was provided for airport transfers and shopping trips to Nha Trang. The staff on the whole were very good especially Wina in the spa and beach bar. Overall a very good stay at a resort which will only get better

title: Rundum zufriedene Gäste
text: Wir waren über Weinachten 2016 nach einer Rundreise von Hanoi nach Saigon zum entspannen und ausruhen in dieser Hotelanlage. Nach der Anstrengung der Tage zuvor war diese Ruhe uns willkommen. Die schöne saubere Anlage, das Essen(andere Länder, andere Essen) und auch das Personal alles vorbildlich! Jedoch ist der Bedarf gegeben, die einst sicher schönen Bungalow einer Verschönerungs- und vor allem einer Renovierung zu unterziehen! Das Meerwasser ist pudelwarm, der Wellengang gigantisch. Doch für Kinder : Achtung! Es ist eine starke Strömung, die sogar uns beinahe mit sich riss. Der Strand machte einen sauberen Eindruck. Was negativ zu nennen ist, sind die Sandflöhe, die uns 2 x in den 7 Tagen ärgerten. Wir hoffen, es gibt keine Nachwirkungen der Stiche. Traumhaft waren die Massagen der Mädchen. Sie verstehen ihr Handwerk. Unbedingt mal "kosten" , es lohnt sich.
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Bãi Biển Hồ Tràm

title: 静かなリゾート
text: トーチミンからボートで１時間更にタクシーで３０分、非常に閑静で静かなリゾートです。ビーチサイイドに面し、プライベートビーチではあるが、海は真っ茶色。プールはある。レストランは、一つしか無く、海のものを期待するも、ほぼほぼ毎日ベトナム料理のみ、朝食は、アメリカンブレックファーストでした。
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng & Spa Bãi biển Tropicana

title: Couple of nights stay in Ca Mau
text: This hotel has quite agrand entrance and feel. Plenty of facilities, most of which I never have chance to try out. The rooms are nice, new and clean, although seem like the Aircon is a bit damp as it smells a little damp when you enter the room. It's not off-putting though. I always get a good night's sleep as it's quiet and the beds are really comfy. I tried the restaurant out, the foodie had was really yummy, although the fries as an appetizer are quite a large portion and probably good for 2-3 people sharing. I had the seabass in soy sauce and the sizzling pork which was really good. Breakfast is typical Vietnamese with some European options. I find sometimes the tea is not hot and the chips are pretty cold. Just small quarms, overall I really like my stay here and can recommend it. The staff are really nice.

title: Kì nghĩ
text: Phòng tôi view hồ bơi rất đẹp. Thức ăn hợp khẩu vị, tôi rất hài lòng với các dịch vụ của khách sạn, Cảm ơn nhân viên hành lí Nhớ đã vui vẻ , nhiệt tình hỗ trợ gia đình tôi , tôi sẽ quay lại vào lần đi lịch tiếp theo.

title: Not a homestay
text: This review is based on the fact that this facility is called a homestay. We were driving around in Vinh Long and a guy asked us if we had a place to stay. He offered us a homestay for VND250.000 and explained that this is a real homestay where we could learn how to roll spring rolls, enjoy the Vietnamese family etc. etc. Sounds good! When we tried to offer help with spring rolls they told us that we had to wait thirty minutes. When we asked after 30 min they where already done. Helping cooking was not appreciated, even after asking several times. When dinner was servwed we ate with the people staying there, while the family had dinner on the kitchen floor. Not what we expected from a homestay. The rooms are clean, but basic, shared bathroom. In my opinion this homestay is to expensive and not worth the full VND250.00.

Not what we expected from a homestay. The rooms are clean, but basic, shared bathroom. In my opinion this homestay is to expensive and not worth the full VND250.00.

title: Ok if you look for basic but don't do it if you have a bad back
text: This bamboo lodge has very friendly owners who will go out of their way to serve you and make the most of your stay. The lodges are basic (no airco but fan and mosquito net and hot water with sun boiler). However, after 2 days of sleeping on bamboo beds with very thin matrasses my husband's back was so sore that it spoiled the experience a bit. Other than that if you're looking for a back-to-basics nature experience and you don't have backaches I can recommend it.

However, after 2 days of sleeping on bamboo beds with very thin matrasses my husband's back was so sore that it spoiled the experience a bit. Other than that if you're looking for a back-to-basics nature experience and you don't have backaches I can recommend it.

title: Trải nghiệm yoga
text: Khách sạn có xe đưa đón phục xụ sân vay đúng giờ, đồ ăn buffer đa dạng, nhân viên phục vụ tốt, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, hồ bơi tuyệt vời vì không có mùi flo, bar ổn, buoi sang 7h co lớp yoga cô Kim Quyên dạy khá tốt hiệu quả thư Giãn tốt cho cơ thể, sẽ quay lại thường xuyên

title: Not what I was expecting
text: I stayed for one night in the hostel. When I arrived the girl at reception took my passport and she just gave me one ticket for my next day breakfast. No information at all. The next day I went for the caves tour and as soon as I got back in the hostel (6pm) I went to reception to say I was leaving at 9 pm. The same girl told me check out was at 3 pm; she wanted to charge me one more night. I said I was not going to pay for an extra time because it was her fault not telling me when I arrived. Noisy rooms and corridors at night and maitress was as hard as a rock.

title: HARD TO BELIEVE THE RAVES
text: First negative is the grueling trip from the airport after a long flight. Hated the small boat trips over rough waves. Another negative is isolation, being on an island. Food is expensive and rather ordinary. Poor value compared to other resorts and hotels nearby. Nha Trang now has an over abundance of rooms and it pays to shop around for a good value deal.
hotelName: An Lam Retreats Ninh Van Bay
en_review: First negative is the grueling trip from the airport after a long flight. Hated the small boat trips over rough waves. Another negative is isolation, being on an island. Food is expensive and rather ordinary. Poor value compared to other resorts and hotels nearby. Nha Trang now has an over abundance of rooms and it pays to shop around for a good value deal.

title: Très bien
text: Le rapport qualité / prix est très bien. La propriétaire et le personnel sont chaleureux et accueillants. La chambre est spacieuse, propre. L'hôtel est bien situé, dans un quartier calme et à proximité de la nourriture. Nous le recommandons !
en_review: Le rapport qualité / prix est très bien. La propriétaire et le personnel sont chaleureux et accueillants. La chambre est spacieuse, propre. L'hôtel est bien situé, dans un quartier calme et à proximité de la nourriture. Nous le recommandons !

title: Western holidays
text: Good place for family holidays with peace landscapes, friendly services: clean and neat room, well equipped swimming pool, acceptable restaurant. However, the fool is general too sweet as a common taste of western area. In fact, it isn't hard to find out what different btw room range of superior and deluxe so far, just rent price.
en_review: Good place for family holidays with peace landscapes, friendly services: clean and neat room, well equipped swimming pool, acceptable restaurant. However, the fool is general too sweet as a common taste of western area. In fact, it isn't hard to find out what different btw room range of superior and deluxe so far, just rent price.

title: Hébergement chez l'habitant
text: Un hébergement simple mais suffisant pour une nuit de repos. Chambre petite et literie très dure, salle de bain commune précaire. Désagréments oubliés car la famille est très accueillante et le dîner et petit déjeuner tout à fait corrects. Wi Fi mais comme partout au Vietnam. A retenir : le côté typique de l'hébergement

Désagréments oubliés car la famille est très accueillante et le dîner et petit déjeuner tout à fait corrects. Wi Fi mais comme partout au Vietnam. A retenir : le côté typique de l'hébergement

title: Habe mehr erwartet
text: Zunächst machte das farmstay einen guten Eindruck. Für den jedoch hohen Preis in Vietnam erwarte ich bequemere Betten und eine heiße dusche. In unserem ersten Zimmer war es durch eine Wasserpumpe so laut, dass wir nur mit oropax schlafen konnten. Frühstück fällt sehr klein aus. Man darf nur ein Getränk und ein essen bestellen. Alles andere muss man extra bezahlen. Die Touren waren sehr gut. Diese macht jedoch nicht das farmstay direkt. Man kann die Touren auch über alle anderen Hostels buchen. Für Familien und Menschen die gerne etwas außerhalb wohnen ist es bestimmt super. Würde dort jedoch nicht nochmal hingehen,sondern eher ein Hostel bevorzugen die zentraler liegen. Jeden Abend wird ein Abendprogramm angeboten wie ein Film schauen oder live Musik. Es laufen immer einige Mitarbeiter dort rum, die gerne Gespräche führen und einen indirekt Touren andrehen wollen. So war mein Gefühl zumindest. Das Essen dort ist in Ordnung. Man muss jedoch mit längeren Wartezeiten rechnen und es kam bei uns eigentlich jeden Tag vor, dass unsere Getränke oder irgendwas anderes vergessen wurde.

Man muss jedoch mit längeren Wartezeiten rechnen und es kam bei uns eigentlich jeden Tag vor, dass unsere Getränke oder irgendwas anderes vergessen wurde.

title: De passage
text: Nous y avons déjeuné avant de regagner Hanoi Repas pour un petit groupe - grandes tables rondes - plats apportés sur un plateau tournant central - correct, mais nous n'avons pas retrouvé les saveurs vietnamiennes Par contre loin du bruit de la ville dans un tres beau jardin

title: Families with young children beware
text: Just want to advise you that today when we picked up our children aged 8 and 6 from the kids club at Nam Hai we found that the person supposedly playing and taking care of them tied our children with a rope and hit them many times on the bottom. He was a man a was left alone with our children for two hours. We found our children very upset and scared of being left alone in the hotel. We advised the hotel manager who confirmed that the men in case though that he was just playing with the children. We find this completely unacceptable and completely ruined what had been until now a great vacation. The hotel and the location are incredible. Please beware if you have young children.
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An
en_review: Just want to advise you that today when we picked up our children aged 8 and 6 from the kids club at Nam Hai we found that the person supposedly playing and taking care of them tied our children with a rope and hit them many times on the bottom. He was a man a was left alone with our children for two hours. We found our children very upset and scared of being left alone in the hotel. We advised the hotel manager who confirmed that the men in case though that he was just playing with the children. We find this completely unacceptable and completely ruined what had been until now a great vacation. The hotel and the location are incredible. Please beware if you have young children.

title: Endroit paradisiaque mais service déplorable
text: les +: L'environnement, la plage, les villas, la décoration, l'endroit est très clairement magnifique, on a beaucoup voyagé et on a rarement vu un endroit aussi beau les -: Le service est catastrophique, notamment la restauration. Les 2 seuls restaurants disponibles sont hors de prix pour une nourriture plus que médiocre. Ne parlons pas du service, a chaque plat commandé il y avait une erreur... Il n'y a pas de solution de contournement pour se restaurer autour du complexe (hormis un magasins dans l’hôtel ou les prix sont risibles tellement c'est cher, le paquet de chips est à 8€), et ça gâche un peu l'expérience de l'endroit. Le room service est aussi cher et plutôt pas bon avec des portions mini. Personne (quasiment) ne parle anglais, très difficile de communiquer.
hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Managed by Accor

Les 2 seuls restaurants disponibles sont hors de prix pour une nourriture plus que médiocre. Ne parlons pas du service, a chaque plat commandé il y avait une erreur... Il n'y a pas de solution de contournement pour se restaurer autour du complexe (hormis un magasins dans l’hôtel ou les prix sont risibles tellement c'est cher, le paquet de chips est à 8€), et ça gâche un peu l'expérience de l'endroit. Le room service est aussi cher et plutôt pas bon avec des portions mini. Personne (quasiment) ne parle anglais, très difficile de communiquer.

title: Rất vui và hài lòng
text: Gia đình rất vui vẻ và cảm thấy rất hài lòng sau chuyến nghĩ dưỡng và vui chơi ở khách sạn Vinpearl Phú Quốc năm nay. Thức ăn ngon, hàng hàng sang trọng sạch sẽ. Phòng đẹp và view biển rất đẹp. Phục vụ chu đáo, nhân viên nhiệt tình. Bạn Minh Dũng nhân viên sắp xếp đưa gia đình tôi ra sân bay rất chu đáo và vui vẻ. Nói chung rất hài lòng.

title: Homesick!
text: We are homesick for the Nam Hai after returning home to Shanghai yesterday. We stayed for 9 nights in a 2br Pool villa with out 9 and 12 year old children. The Villas are huge, as are the gardens surrounding and the private pool. Tu, our butler was so helpful and sweet, bringing me a gin and tonic late afternoon as I lay by the pool :). We literally didn't have to lift a finger. Breakfast is amazing, and overall the food is superb. I agree that the hotel food is extremely expensive, but really, one or two dinners there are fine. The highlight is going 10 minutes in the car to Hoi An and eating at some amazing and well priced local restaurants every other night! Who ever wants to eat in any hotel every night anyway? For our perspective the layout and design of the villas were superb! The staff are incredible and this is one very special place! We loved this amazing resort so much, it was really hard leaving...the most relaxed we've been in years and the kids absolutely loved it!
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An

title: Quá tệ
text: Resort đẳng cấp mà 14g30 chưa có phòng dù đã đặt trước, khách tới check in không có lấy 1 ly nước, đỗ lỗi cho nhân lực it sau mùa dịch, vậy thì đừng mở cửa đón khách nếu không đảm bảo vận hành được. Khách ngồi chờ, mà nhân viên thì ko care

title: 기대했던 것보다는 별로
text: 시설은 평범하고, 서비스 역시 보통입니다. 특히 리조트 내 스파는 가격에 비해 퀄리티가 안좋습니다. 시내 이동시에는 항상 택시를 타야해서 약간 불편합니다. 하우스 키퍼가 청소를 일찍 시작해서 아침시간에 주변이 시끄럽고, “do not disturb” 사인을 무시하고 문을 두드립니다. 리조트 내에 오토바이가 다니는 점도 이해가 안되는 부분 중 하나였습니다.
hotelName: Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa

title: Quality going down
text: I have been here on January, and come back again last week. While the first visit is great, the second time is a big disappointment. 1. The view on 1st time is awesome, flower everywhere, golden fish everywhere, but now all the garden look empty, it:s hard to find a fish in fish pond, the water in the pond also dirty. 2. Many attractions is closed, though this is not the resort fault, there are not much things left to do while stay here, especially for kids. 3. The food in my first visit is great, but the 2nd time is a disaster. For room service: - Porridge in my first visit is the best in all the 4-5 star resorts/hotels I have been too, 2nd time is even worse than a 10k VND porridge you can buy anywhere on the street - No standard at all, on the 2nd visit, I ordered both Pho and fried rice in 2 consecutive days. First day they brought a huge bow of Pho, fried rice also came with a thin layer of omelette which made it look really good. Second day they brought a much smaller bow of Pho, probably just half size of the bow on 1st day. Fried rice came with no omelette, and the water even dare to tell me that layer of omelette is supposed to throw away, not to eat, he also smirked like how stupid I was to eat that omelette. Well I'm not a chef, but putting egg into the dish and expect customers to not eat it is a stupid idea. - But that's not all about the fried rice, in fact I ordered 2 portion of fried rice in 2nd day, 1 of them has 2 times more rice than the other, 1 has cucumber and carrot while the other has cabbage only. The sauce is also ridiculous, on 1st day they gave me a small bow of soy sauce for 1 portion of fried rice, 2nd day for 2 portion they gave 1 tiny dish. For breakfast, omelette, scrambled egg supposed to be made on demand, even 3 star hotels these days make it that way, but this time Flamingo Dai Lai chef made a huge pile of them, by the time customer pick them to their dish, the egg is cold already. The menu also stay the same for 2 days, no new dishes, and no dish was removed. Spring rolls on 2nd day even dead cold and hard like they were put in fridge in 1st day and brought out again on 2nd day.

title: Für 3 Nächte ganz okay - der Strand kann was, das Essen ist so semi.
text: Wir haben drei Nächte in einer Hütte der Beach Bar übernachtet. In erster Linie kann man hier super entspannen und man hört im Bett den Ozean rauschen. Auch das Outdoorbad war super bei hohen Temperaturen. Insgesamt waren wir zufrieden, die Lage ist top, der Strand sauber und man ist fast allein dort. Umgehauen hat es uns allerdings nicht, daher war es einmalig okay, aber beim nächsten Mal würde ich eine andere Unterkunft ausprobieren oder in die benachbarte (und teurere) Unterkunft gehen, die dem gleichen Besitzer gehört. Lage: Die Unterkunft liegt relativ weit außerhalb der Stadt, dafür aber direkt am Strand. Dessen muss man sich bewusst sein - ohne Roller oder Taxi kommt man nicht weg und es gibt im Umkreis auch nicht wirklich etwas, das man unternehmen kann. Beach Bar: das Essen / die Getränke sind im Vergleich teuer und qualitativ auch nur okay. Man isst definitv besser in der Garküche... Der Service war leider auch etwas langsam und unaufmerksam. Für den Preis hätte ich etwas mehr erwartet. Für Alleinreisende nicht zum empfehlen! Wir waren Mitte September die einzigen Übernachtungsgäste...

title: Hơi khó tìm, nhưng sự cô lập là một phần của sự quyến rũ
text: Ở lại một đêm ở đây và không thực sự là bất cứ điều gì để phàn nàn. Việc cung cấp thực phẩm là cơ bản, nhưng tốt. Đối với giá cả, có thể đã dự kiến ​​nhiều hơn một chút về thoải mái phòng, nhưng bầu không khí tốt đẹp của khu vực này làm cho nó.

title: Tolle Umgebung, schlechte englischkentnisse
text: Toller Strand, sehr ruhig, nette Gäste. Viel Personal, das nicht arbeitet sondern mehr herum sitzt. Es ist sehr unaufmerksam. Wir mussten lange warten um bestellen zu können. Das essen wurde meist erst Stunden später abgeräumt. Keiner konnte englisch :-( nur der resortmanager. Die Anlage ist ansich schön gemacht. Leider liegt überall Müll, der nicht weggeräumt wird. Bungalows sind in ordnug. Alles vorhanden. Bad ist klein und ein offener Anbau. Es wurde nicht saubergemacht oder Handtücher ausgetauscht

title: 町はずれのホテル
text: ドンハーの町中から少し離れたところにある古いホテル。ぼろいですが、一応wifiも含めて設備は整っています。かつては町で一番いいホテルだったんでしょう。まちはずれなので、店が周辺にあまりないので食事にちょっと困りましたが。

title: Rustig en afgelegen
text: Hotel en kamers zijn niets over te zeggen. Zijn alle prima en goed verzorgd. Men neemt de nodige maatregelen tegen muskieten. Ontbijt is buffet dus keuze te over Hebben hier 2 x diner genomen en dit is teleurstellend. Gerechten zijn nogal prijzig (dit weet je wel omdat het vijf sterren ✨ heeft) Echter is het niet in verhouding prijs / kwaliteit. Weinig smaak en veelal wat droog. Lamskoteletten waren volledig doorbakken. (ondanks vraag nog wat blue te mogen zijn) De vietnameense gerechten waren beter maar kunnen echter niet tippen aan de smaken die je in de stad bij locals kan eten. Deze zijn zo veel lekkerder en nog eens een pak goedkoper. Gratis shuttlebus naar de stad is goed maar jammer genoeg moet je deze ook al reeds om 15h 30 terugnemen. Zou fijn zijn dat men dit op een wat later tijdstip kan nemen. Verder zeker prima als je van de rust houd en niet verder iets anders wil gaan doen.

title: Stylische Zimmer in alten Villen
text: Wir hatten einen sehr stylischen Petit Room in einer der vielen Villen, die in einem kleinen Wald an einem Hang verteilt liegen. Vermisst haben wir Stühle, Tisch im Zimmer, die Minibar, einen großen Schrank, das passt aus Platzgründen alles nicht rein. Bad und Schlafzimmer gehen nett eingerichtet ineinander über. Das Bett war für uns etwas kurz. Den Kamin haben wir nicht genutzt, die frei stehende Badewanne hat was. Der eigentliche Aufenthaltsraum ist in jeder Villa gemeinschaftlich zu nutzen, geräumig und gemütlich eingerichtet. Das Frühstück war ordentlich, der Service freundlich und engagiert. Die Stadtmitte ist auch zu Fuß in ca. 2km zu erreichen, es gibt aber auch einen Shuttlebus des Hotels.

Die Stadtmitte ist auch zu Fuß in ca. 2km zu erreichen, es gibt aber auch einen Shuttlebus des Hotels.

title: C'eravamo solo noi
text: Per dormirci una notte va anche bene,peccato che fumano nella hall, le camere decorose metterei più impegno nella pulizia,per colazione ci siamo trovati in un grande salone deserto dove per l'occasione hanno messo un solo tavolo per noi con sedie ancora incelofanate,un'impresa ordinare il brekfast,il personale non parla inglese....

title: Thiết kế lạ
text: Resort rất giống những kiểu nhà ngày xưa ở Việt Nam , mọi thứ rất đơn giản , tự nhiên. Tôi rất thích ở đây 😊 rất thoãi mái. Dịch vụ rất tốt, nằm cạnh dinh của vị anh hùng Nguyễn Trung Trực . Cách trung tâm thị trấn 20 phút và sân bay 30 . Resort nằm cạnh biển.

title: Ổn nhất ở Long Xuyên, nhưng thật sự chỉ trung bình
text: Khách sạn ở vị trí rất dễ tìm, nổi bật và có dịch vụ phòng vẻ như tốt nhất ở Long Xuyên. Bữa sáng khá. Giá cũng phù hợp. Bãi đậu xe rộng. Dịch vụ matxa tàm tạm, nói chung là cũng đỡ hơn các nơi khác chứ còn thì nói chung là trung bình.

title: Value of Money but noise level is high
text: Have stay at the hotel for more than 10 days. Overall the hotel is clean and service is good. However due to construction is taken place just beside the hotel even during midnight. Therefore, high recommend to avoid room facing the construction area if you wish to have pleasant sleep.

title: Magnifique repos
text: Nous avons passé de magnifiques temps de repos. C'est un hôtel qui prend soin des clients sans être envahissant. Respect pour la nature. Repas super bon!! Les prestations ne sont pas trop chères comme les massages et on peut être proche de l'océan avec le son des vagues!

title: VERY NICE STAY
text: My family ( 8 people) stayed there two times and most of the members enjoyed the hotel. this is the best hotel in this area. the rooms are nice, you can bargain with the hotel, the price on their website is too high for this area, we paid $40 usd for a room.... a short trip to vinh hung bay was nice... this resort is for family relaxing...

title: The resort is full of mosquitoes
text: Our family stayed here for 2 nights. We had horrible experience!!! there were colonies of mosquitoes in the restaurant. The kid and myself got bites. Its tropical mosquitoes, they carries bunches of deadly disease that victims might be infected. A little advice for whoever wanna stay here, bring your owned mosquitoes propellant since you cant find any convenience stores or pharmacies within 3 kilometers diameter.
hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Managed by Accor

A little advice for whoever wanna stay here, bring your owned mosquitoes propellant since you cant find any convenience stores or pharmacies within 3 kilometers diameter.

title: Quản lý kém
text: Đây có thể là một khu nghỉ mát bởi vẻ ngoài nhưng có một thiếu rõ ràng về quản lý. Trông mong: - chia sẻ hồ bơi với công chúng và làm sạch đôi chân của bạn sau khi tham quan bãi biển như mọi người khác (lưu ý: trong hồ bơi sạch sẽ) và chụp ảnh tự sướng - toàn bộ "khu nghỉ mát" mở cửa cho công chúng để chụp ảnh tự sướng, dạo quanh và sân chơi cho trẻ em, và được sử dụng như một điểm dừng chân nghỉ ngơi / nhà vệ sinh cho xe buýt du lịch. - bãi biển rải rác rác rưởi mà không ai từng cố gắng dọn dẹp. - rác trên mặt đất "nghỉ mát". - nếu bạn yêu thích bột ngọt, bạn sẽ thích thức ăn. Để phương châm: Nhiều hơn là tốt hơn. - trải nghiệm và tận hưởng vệ sinh địa phương của dao kéo và đồ sành sứ - tận dụng lợi thế để tìm hiểu về động vật hoang dã địa phương trong các phòng bị muỗi nhiễm khuẩn.

title: Perfect place to recover from an accident
text: I had a nasty fall from a motorbike in Phong Nha, and called the farmstay for english speaking aid. The staff was amazing, and came to pick us up. Took me to a clinic to get my wounds cleaned, and game us a great room for me to recover. They came to check on me often, and even helped keeping my wounds clean. Thank you! Nice rooms, stunning location.
en_review: I had a nasty fall from a motorbike in Phong Nha, and called the farmstay for english speaking aid. The staff was amazing, and came to pick us up. Took me to a clinic to get my wounds cleaned, and game us a great room for me to recover. They came to check on me often, and even helped keeping my wounds clean. Thank you! Nice rooms, stunning location.

title: New World - hơn thế nữa
text: Phú Quốc bây giờ rất nhiều resort mới và đẹp. Bằng một lí do nào đó, New World là một trong những sự lựa chọn ngẫu nhiên trong chuyến đi lần này của gia đình và để lại những điều vô cùng đáng yêu trong trái tim tôi. Bây giờ tôi mới có thời gian để viết lại những dòng tâm thư gửi tới các bạn. Vừa bước vào tới cổng nhận được sự giúp đỡ tận tình của các bạn. Tôi đặc biệt ấn tượng với Duy Trúc chuyện rất vui và hỗ trợ rất nhiệt tình. Nước welcome drink ở đây cũng khá ngon. Các bạn nhân viên lễ tân cho gia đình tôi nhận phòng sớm hơn dự kiến vì có người lớn tuổi. Tôi rất hoan nghênh sự đối đãi tuyệt vời này từ bạn Ý. Xuân Anh là người hỗ trợ tôi về phòng. Bạn có những thông tin bổ ích không chỉ là resort mà còn về Phú Quốc. Bạn gợi ý những món ăn ngon nên thử và những địa điểm nên ghé. Cô bạn rất nhiệt tình giúp gia đình có những bức ảnh xinh. Lần sau, có cơ hội quay lại mình sẽ nhất định tham gia các hoạt động chèo thuyền kayak một lần nữa. Các bạn nhân viên trò chơi hướng dẫn tận tình. Villa thiết kế đẹp và gần biển. Phòng ốc thoáng mát. Hoàng hôn khá đẹp. Rất mong có dịp trở lại đây.

title: Stay away everyone!!!
text: This is the worst hotel in Vietnam I have stayed during 5 years. Be careful!!! They cheated!!! Beginning with their internet page. No shuttle bus from airport!!! No shuttle bus to the city!!! No English signs in the restaurant!!! Managers don't care, just looking at you, saying nothing!!! Save your time!!! Choose another hotel
en_review: This is the worst hotel in Vietnam I have stayed during 5 years. Be careful!!! They cheated!!! Beginning with their internet page. No shuttle bus from airport!!! No shuttle bus to the city!!! No English signs in the restaurant!!! Managers don't care, just looking at you, saying nothing!!! Save your time!!! Choose another hotel

title: Terrible hotel
text: The hardest bed I ever slept in in my whole life. Only the nails were missing... No facilities. Bad staff. When I asked for my room number, she wrote down the number 1 to 9. They really don't understand anything.
en_review: The hardest bed I ever slept in in my whole life. Only the nails were missing... No facilities. Bad staff. When I asked for my room number, she wrote down the number 1 to 9. They really don't understand anything.

title: What a place!
text: Surely, in the middle of nowhere, but there is were you to be travelling Vietnam. Close to the infamous cave's, the Ho Chi Min Trail and the DMZ. But what a blisterring place the farm stay. Good food, helpful staff and a (small) pool. We had a room at the pool and didn't hear nothing.
en_review: Surely, in the middle of nowhere, but there is were you to be travelling Vietnam. Close to the infamous cave's, the Ho Chi Min Trail and the DMZ. But what a blisterring place the farm stay. Good food, helpful staff and a (small) pool. We had a room at the pool and didn't hear nothing.

title: New year's 2020
text: Beautiful well maintained property with a private beach, peaceful vibe and friendly, efficient staff. We chose a cottage by the river. There are private beach villas also. Great food, clean rooms, pretty cottages, kayaks and sail boat available, relaxing open spa, gorgeous sunset views. Perfect for people looking for a get away from the busy beaches and hectic streets. 30 minutes from the night market by cab. Wholesome experience! Absolutely Loved our stay here.

Perfect for people looking for a get away from the busy beaches and hectic streets. 30 minutes from the night market by cab. Wholesome experience! Absolutely Loved our stay here.

title: Tệ hơn tôi tưởng
text: Khu nghỉ mát này rất xa thành phố và rất sâu bên trong. Không có gì xung quanh khu nghỉ mát. Bạn sẽ cần phải lái một chiếc xe tay ga để ăn và nó rất nguy hiểm vào ban đêm. Không có ánh sáng nào trên đường đến khu nghỉ mát. Vì vậy, bạn có thể sẽ kết thúc bằng việc ăn tại khu nghỉ mát và giá quá cao cho những nhà hàng địa phương. . . có lẽ họ có một số lợi thế từ nó. . . Khi nhận phòng, họ yêu cầu bạn gửi bcuz hộ chiếu của bạn, họ sợ bạn sẽ không trả tiền và bỏ trốn. Mà tôi không đồng ý và không cho họ giữ hộ chiếu của tôi. Nói với anh ấy tôi sẽ trả ngay bây giờ. Anh cứ khăng khăng trả tiền khi trả phòng. (WT * bạn có muốn không?!)

text: Mọi thứ đều rất tốt. Mình đi 4 người ở villa 2 pn Có xe đưa rước tận villa Nhân viên lễ tân, xe buýt, nhà hàng đều rất tốt Nếu mọi người đi gia đình nên book luôn vinpearland và safari. Có chương trình nhạc nước rất hay Có a nhân viên Mậu Anh lễ tân rất nhiệt tinh và so helpful

title: Nơi tốt để ở tại Thái Nguyên
text: Chúng tôi đã ở Thái Nguyên một tuần để xây dựng Habitat for Humanity. Đây có lẽ là khách sạn lớn nhất trong thị trấn. Các nhân viên rất thân thiện và hữu ích (nhiều người không nói tiếng Anh nhưng google dịch đã hoạt động). Các phòng được sạch sẽ và rộng rãi. Có một tủ lạnh nhỏ rất đẹp và cũng là cửa hàng tạp hóa ở tầng một của khách sạn. Chúng tôi có dịch vụ giặt là miễn phí và thật tuyệt vời và được thực hiện cùng ngày. Chúng tôi đã ăn tối ở đó trong một phòng ăn riêng vài buổi tối và thức ăn rất tuyệt. Bữa sáng tự chọn rất đa dạng và mọi người đều có thể tìm thấy thứ họ thích. Các phòng có AC và nó hoạt động tốt.

title: Beautiful place, some staff with inappropriate attitude
text: We enjoyed our stay at Movenpick Cam Ranh as most part of the staff were nice and the place and hotel beautiful. However, I would suggest the staff in charge of the beach security to stop long staring at woman in swimsuit in an appropriate way and laugh together, laughing that immediately stopped when I arrived and look at them back. It happened the 17 of February around 5 pm. It is really inappropriate and better training is required to make customer (and women) feel safe. I hope you will take measure about that and didn't take care of it just because my wife asked me not to as we were on "vacation".

title: Living the mermaid life in Six Sense Ninh Van Bay
text: The first thing I remember about Six Sense Ninh Van Bay is the warmth and dedication. My mother and I were picked up from the airport by the resort's car. After the 30 mins canoe ride across the clear sapphire water, white waves and the fresh ocean breeze, my mother and I arrived at the resort with warm greeting from the resort staffs and the creamy homemade ice cream. To get around the resort, you can either walk, use your own bike or request a ride. Our villa was beach front which was just a step away from the beach and was rounded by trees. The villa has two floor, the ground floor was for bedroom and bathroom. The bedroom and bathroom are connected which was very convenient if you travel as a couple, or you can make it more private by locking the door. The bathroom was spacious with two sinks from each side of the room and a wooden bathtub in the center. There was also a shower room and a toilet room inside the bathroom. But what I love the most is the outdoors bath. Nothing is better than the fresh water sprinkle from an outdoor shower after a hot walk in the sun. The bedroom was occupied by a very comfort king bed with all the soft pillows that make you want to jump in. Just looking at that, I already knee I was going to have a deep and good sleep. From the bed room, there was a door looked straight out to the private swimming pool which was cleaned up daily. The second floor was the living room with a mini bar, long sofa and a hanging swing which my mother helped taking so many nice photo shoots of me sitting in it. The good accommodation is usually my favorite part of the trip, but this time the beach completely took over that part. In my whole life I have never felt so close to nature like I felt when I stayed at Six Sense, Ninh Van Bay. The water was so clear that I could saw my body moving inside the water. For the very first time in my life, there were many silver fishes came and swam with me which made me feel like I was living a mermaid life. At night time, when my mother and I walked along the beach with all the ABBA's songs playing, we also saw many crabs and sea snails running on the sand. It was so great to be far away from the industrial urban life to observe the marine life and become a part of it. There were many beach activities available at the resort such as fishing, diving or visiting other islands. My mom and I did Kayaking during late afternoon. It was a blessing feeling to observe the resort and the long coral coast from a distance. We also joined a yoga class by an experienced and very friendly instructor. There was also a small guests gathering event where we had great talk with other guests. During the morning at evening, we dined at the main restaurant looking toward the beach. The breakfasts were felt and varied with different choices of food. I especially love the juices and smoothies which I could chose my blend and mixed them together. For dinner, you can either chose à la carte or buffet. We were more impressed with what were on the menu, so we chose the à la carte for all dinners. There were choices of Vietnamese food or Western food. Both options were good, although not so impressive. I want to dedicatedly thank all the staffs and management for the amazing environmental conservation. I know many eco resort couldn't preserve the nature after 5 years running, but with a resort that is 13 years in the business like Six Sense Ninh Van Bay, this is an amazing conservational work. I had the fortunate to talk to the General Manager and Sustainability Manager, and learned that everyone in the resort was aware about sustainable development and put tremendous works and efforts to keep Six Sense plastic free. The sustainability museum were also in the process of building to educate the guest about the importance of environmental sustainability. In the future, guests can also visit the resort garden and chicken farm.
en_review: The first thing I remember about Six Sense Ninh Van Bay is the warmth and dedication. My mother and I were picked up from the airport by the resort's car. After the 30 mins canoe ride across the clear sapphire water, white waves and the fresh ocean breeze, my mother and I arrived at the resort with warm greeting from the resort staffs and the creamy homemade ice cream. To get around the resort, you can either walk, use your own bike or request a ride. Our villa was beach front which was just a step away from the beach and was rounded by trees. The villa has two floor, the ground floor was for bedroom and bathroom. The bedroom and bathroom are connected which was very convenient if you travel as a couple, or you can make it more private by locking the door. The bathroom was spacious with two sinks from each side of the room and a wooden bathtub in the center. There was also a shower room and a toilet room inside the bathroom. But what I love the most is the outdoors bath. Nothing is better than the fresh water sprinkle from an outdoor shower after a hot walk in the sun. The bedroom was occupied by a very comfort king bed with all the soft pillows that make you want to jump in. Just looking at that, I already knee I was going to have a deep and good sleep. From the bed room, there was a door looked straight out to the private swimming pool which was cleaned up daily. The second floor was the living room with a mini bar, long sofa and a hanging swing which my mother helped taking so many nice photo shoots of me sitting in it. The good accommodation is usually my favorite part of the trip, but this time the beach completely took over that part. In my whole life I have never felt so close to nature like I felt when I stayed at Six Sense, Ninh Van Bay. The water was so clear that I could saw my body moving inside the water. For the very first time in my life, there were many silver fishes came and swam with me which made me feel like I was living a mermaid life. At night time, when my mother and I walked along the beach with all the ABBA's songs playing, we also saw many crabs and sea snails running on the sand. It was so great to be far away from the industrial urban life to observe the marine life and become a part of it. There were many beach activities available at the resort such as fishing, diving or visiting other islands. My mom and I did Kayaking during late afternoon. It was a blessing feeling to observe the resort and the long coral coast from a distance. We also joined a yoga class by an experienced and very friendly instructor. There was also a small guests gathering event where we had great talk with other guests. During the morning at evening, we dined at the main restaurant looking toward the beach. The breakfasts were felt and varied with different choices of food. I especially love the juices and smoothies which I could chose my blend and mixed them together. For dinner, you can either chose à la carte or buffet. We were more impressed with what were on the menu, so we chose the à la carte for all dinners. There were choices of Vietnamese food or Western food. Both options were good, although not so impressive. I want to dedicatedly thank all the staffs and management for the amazing environmental conservation. I know many eco resort couldn't preserve the nature after 5 years running, but with a resort that is 13 years in the business like Six Sense Ninh Van Bay, this is an amazing conservational work. I had the fortunate to talk to the General Manager and Sustainability Manager, and learned that everyone in the resort was aware about sustainable development and put tremendous works and efforts to keep Six Sense plastic free. The sustainability museum were also in the process of building to educate the guest about the importance of environmental sustainability. In the future, guests can also visit the resort garden and chicken farm.

title: Khách sạn tốt!
text: Khách sạn tọa lạc cách cầu cảng Lý Sơn khoảng 3 phút đi bộ, nơi sầm uất nhất huyện đảo này. Từ đây, bạn có thể đi về mọi di tích hay điểm du lịch một cách dễ dàng. Khách sạn sạch sẽ, có điều hòa, chủ khách sạn cực kỳ thân thiện và cố gắng đáp ứng mọi nhu cầu từ khách hàng.. Nếu qua lại Lý Sơn, hãy trở lại Hiệp Sĩ hotel

title: Хороший отдель
text: Отель хороший. Рекомендую. Опишу минусы, так как их не много: 1. Мы летели с тур оператором и брали пакет питания полный пансион. Питание очень разнообразное!++выпечка, дескрты+++ Минус заключает в том, что на территории отеля негде покушать за деньги. Только лобби бар, где продаются сэндвичи и торты. И второй ресторан на выходе (как он работает мы не поняли: один раз пришли-работает, второй раз- нам сказали закрыт. В общем как-то 50/50 не поняла с чем связано). В нем меню скудное. И очень очень дорого, что в лобби, что в этом ресторане. Для примера: гамбургер стоит 280.000 донгов( в пересчёте на рубли почти 1000р. Нужно убрать нули и умножить на три). Кокос стоит 100.000(300р). Для сравнения на другом пляже он стоил 20-25.000.(60-75р). В общем цены 5а территории отеля очень сильно завышены на всё. Питание советую брать полный пансион, чтобы не тратить время на поиски еды. К тому же это будет гораздо выгоднее заранее купить в туре это питание, чем питаться на месте. Для примера обед /ужин в городе стоит на двоих в районе 300.000-400.000 донгов. У нас же в отеле он будет стоить в три раза дороже. В город не накатаешься- далеко. Такси стоит примерно 350. 000 в одну сторону. (до ночного рынка, а это фактически центр острова). До аэропорта такси стоит 600.000 (1800р 7 местный минивэн). Тур оператор анекс предлагает индивидуально отвезти за 79 долларов. (вообще с у тур операторов лучше ничего не покупать из экскурсий. Это тоже очень дорого в сравнении с реальными ценами на острове. Найдите группу по фукоку и там по отзывам выбирайте любого тур организатора и ездите с ним по экскурсиями, если очень хочется. Эконом я приличная!). Вернёмся к отелю... Добавлю про работу ресторана : если опаздал хоть на минуту, то ровно в назначенное время ресторан закрывают и ты покушать не сможешь. 2. Парк на территории отеля только строиться и обещают его открыть, судя по рекламе в апреле 2020. (сомнительно, но все может быть). А пока там есть только развлечения для детей, колесо обозрения. Аквапарк свиду тоже имеет три горки на палящем солнце. Мы даже туда не ходили. Ездили в большой аквапарк на острове, куда ведёт канатная дорога. Вот он супер. Рекомендую на целый день любителям аквапарков:) Нам двух часов не хватило покататься на всех горках. Оббежали только самые крутые. (каната, аквапарк, обед шведский стол билет такой комби стоит 600.000 донгов на взрослого). 3. Отель находиться далеко от города. Каждый день не наездишься. Цены такси примерно выше написала. Такой отдельный отдых. 4. На территории есть детская площадка, но она совсем для малышей. Можно было бы поставить что-то по лучше! Если меня читают представители отеля - обратите внимание. Из минусов, пожалуй, больше ничего не было. П. С. Море мутноватое и бывало даже грязноватым немного, никто не кусал ни разу!

title: En pleine nature
text: Chambre très simple (un peu trop?) avec douche extérieure ce qui a un certain charme. Accueil sobre. Vélo gratuit. Excursion en bateau de 4h possible pour faire le tour touristique du delta. Bref un lieu qui fait bien le boulot pour le prix. Pas très authentique : ça plaira au routard!
en_review: Chambre très simple (un peu trop?) avec douche extérieure ce qui a un certain charme. Accueil sobre. Vélo gratuit. Excursion en bateau de 4h possible pour faire le tour touristique du delta. Bref un lieu qui fait bien le boulot pour le prix. Pas très authentique : ça plaira au routard!

title: Dịch vụ xấu & bãi biển bẩn
text: Chúng tôi ở tại Bungalow trước biển trong một đêm và máy điều hòa không hoạt động. Sau khi báo cáo với nhân viên, anh ta đến kiểm tra và nói rằng chúng tôi phải đợi 20 phút để không khí - con làm việc cuối cùng nó không hoạt động. Tôi đã yêu cầu chuyển sang một cái mới trước hết, anh ta nói có, sau đó anh ấy nói nó đã được đặt hoàn toàn hôm nay và không thể làm bất cứ điều gì để được đền bù. Chúng tôi có 3 người phải ngủ với một người hâm mộ trong một căn phòng cực kỳ nóng, trong khi đó tôi đã trả đủ tiền cho phòng máy lạnh và bữa sáng. Nhân viên trẻ và không thể nói tiếng Anh vô dụng. Bãi biển quá đông đúc và bẩn thỉu.

title: Nice location but so-so "resort"
text: I do like the location close to the small lake and there is a lot of trees and plants around... However the bungaloes were full of rats (my friend told me) and my own room in the main building was a normal one by vn standards, nothing special... A bit far from town but perfect location if you come from Son La as you don't need to drive all the way to town.
hotelName: Khu du lịch sinh thái Him Lam

A bit far from town but perfect location if you come from Son La as you don't need to drive all the way to town.

title: Premier Residences Phu Quoc Emerald Bay Managed by AccorHotels
text: Nơi ở tuyệt vời, phục vụ tốt, nhân viên chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện nhất là Mr Nhi waiter. Hồ bơi rộng, đẹp và mát. Có máng trượt cho trẻ em. Tuy nhiên , thực đơn nhà hàng chưa phong phú lắm. Đề nghị có dịch vụ đưa rước sân bay (có thể tính phí bằng taxi).

title: Crowded, noisy, domestic Vietnam tourism focused beach monster
text: Whether you will like this place depends what you're after in a beach trip. If you want a peaceful and relaxing trip to the beach this is not it. The place was extremely crowded all the time as they have marketed themselves as a place for vain people to come and take endless selfies, so there were c.700 people arrived at 6am most of whom brought their own speakers, bbqs, chickens, dogs etc. and set up a party outside my room. The DJ was absolutely terrible and no matter how many times I asked nobody would turn the music down. The speakers were so large and unnecessary that everybody had to go to the other end of the resort just to hear themselves think. The bass traveled for miles and the inside of the rooms was unpleasant due to the vibrations. I have never been somewhere so loud and crap. Vinahouse at 110% volume. The manager was great though, and the staff hard-working and efficient. Shame about the environment.

additionalRatings: [{'rating': 4, 'ratingLabel': 'Giá trị'}, {'rating': 5, 'ratingLabel': 'Phòng'}, {'rating': 3, 'ratingLabel': 'Địa điểm'}, {'rating': 5, 'ratingLabel': 'Sự sạch sẽ'}, {'rating': 5, 'ratingLabel': 'Dịch vụ'}, {'rating': 4, 'ratingLabel': 'Giấc ngủ'}]
title: Facilities Beautiful.  Food Not So Good
text: The facilities are beautiful and each room is beautifully appointed. Be warned that there are platforms and stairs in the room so just to be careful. I appreciated the thoughtful complimentary bicycles to get to and fro. The staff are all friendly and always willing to help. Breakfasts were a great mix of local fare and international fare. A great start to the morning. Food otherwise was a big miss for us. As noted from other reviewers the price didn't match the quality of the food. Pricing was equivalent to a city centre luxury location facility and the food offering did not match. Poor value. I believe roughly $10 USD for a standard Vietnamese coffee that you can get for a fraction of the cost elsewhere. $25 USD for a fried seafood (shrimp, catfish, calimari). Taste in the restaurants were poor to average. I personally do not recommend eating in the hotel as I didn't see any value of positive experience. Other then the restaurant the service was fantastic. The staff work very hard to treat their guest like royalty and to maintain the grounds. The hospitality was truly appreciated.
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An

title: MAUVAISE SURPRISE
text: Très mauvaise surprise au Jungle Beach. Chambres extrêmement spartiates, sans le moindre confort, propreté douteuse, salle de bain ridiculement sale et peu confortable. Des prix très élevé pour la région et le pays. Je déconseille fortement cet établissement. Seul point positif notable, la plage de sable blanc.
en_review: Très mauvaise surprise au Jungle Beach. Chambres extrêmement spartiates, sans le moindre confort, propreté douteuse, salle de bain ridiculement sale et peu confortable. Des prix très élevé pour la région et le pays. Je déconseille fortement cet établissement. Seul point positif notable, la plage de sable blanc.

title: Une nuit à Lang Son
text: Hôtel très défraîchi, service pas à la hauteur d'un quatre étoile, chambre sale ( cheveux, poils. ..), piscine au fond douteux nettoyée le matin de notre départ ( différence flagrante). Pas de service bagages... Pour le dîner impossible de manger, menu sans prix et la plupart des plats de la carte indisponibles. Pour le petit déjeuner très peu de choix pour les européens. En conclusion un quatre étoiles low cost.
hotelName: Muong Thanh Luxury Lang Son Hotel

En conclusion un quatre étoiles low cost.

title: Beautiful stay
text: Legacy Yentu is a beautiful property and the service is done with a big smile even though not all staff could speak English. Highly recommend for a stop between Hanoi and Halong Bay. The mountain is worth the efforts.
en_review: Legacy Yentu is a beautiful property and the service is done with a big smile even though not all staff could speak English. Highly recommend for a stop between Hanoi and Halong Bay. The mountain is worth the efforts.

title: Improved from the last time
text: Everything works. Air conditioning, shower. The cleanliness is very good, except the balcony. The bed is really comfortable. The room is huge. That's so impressive. You have a living room with TV and a comfortable sofa. You also can cook if you want. Huge and beautiful swimming pool area. Very nice for a quiet dinner. It's my second time here and I needed extension and no room available. I have to book another hotel. I understand the situation, but considering I stayed so long, they could have been more personal and asked me before book everything. Anyway, very worth the value.
en_review: Everything works. Air conditioning, shower. The cleanliness is very good, except the balcony. The bed is really comfortable. The room is huge. That's so impressive. You have a living room with TV and a comfortable sofa. You also can cook if you want. Huge and beautiful swimming pool area. Very nice for a quiet dinner. It's my second time here and I needed extension and no room available. I have to book another hotel. I understand the situation, but considering I stayed so long, they could have been more personal and asked me before book everything. Anyway, very worth the value.

title: Angsana Lang Co in Winter
text: The resort is very nice and staff is friendly and responsive. Good selection at breakfast, especially you can have Vietnamese coffee, pho and a good selection of fruits. The jaccuzi around the hotel is warmly heated which makes it still possible to dip in water and enjoy the sun. It was winter so the water in the pool was ice cold, but I still managed to swim in it. The pool goes around the resort, it is very nice. Particularly the Moonlight pool, it is so calm and beautiful. If you are looking for excursions to Hoi An, Da Nang and Hue, Lang Co is central, however, it takes 1-2 hours each way! There is nothing around the hotel. So other than eating in the resort, your other option is to go to Banyan Tree. Banyan Tree offers good reasonable food in the golf club. Water Court is quite resonable, given it is Banyan Tree and of course there is the famous Saffron. Afternoon tea in the library at Banyan Tree is also quite good.

title: Disappointed
text: The An Lam is perfect in so many ways...unfortunately we had two incidents that affected our stay. The rooms (ours a garden suite) was huge, beautifully appointed with one of the most comfortable beds we have had the pleasure of sleeping in. With many other little touches to make our stay amazing ie. quality amenities, coffee machine & complimentary mini bar. The grounds were tropical and well maintained (so many frogs & lizards) a testament that their environmental & sustainability policies are successful. The pool was beautiful and refreshing. The restaurant has an ala carte menu for breakfast which had a decent selection of options to suit all...the restaurant staff are wonderful. Our issues were No.1 The shuttle speed boat couldn’t operate one evening, we were told 30 minutes before we were due to leave & given no other option than paying for a taxi to District 1 our selves...poor customer service in my opinion. No.2 On the morning we were leaving I couldn’t find my watch after searching I found it behind the beside table with the leather band chewed extensively, not only was my watch there but also dozens of half eaten nightly chocolates (also evident behind the other beside table). This was obviously done by rodents...which is kind scary as the tables are right next to the bed you are sleeping in. When I mentioned it to our butler Dũng he shrugged it off & asked if the my watch was expensive...not the response I was hoping for. The resort would be easily be 5 star if it wasn’t for the issues above. On the whole we loved resort but probably wouldn’t consider staying there again.

title: Tuyệt vời
text: Ở đây thủ tục check in nhanh chóng, phòng sạch đẹp và tiện nghi, view đẹp không gian tuyệt vời cho một kì nghỉ cùng bạn bè, pool bar rất tốt 2 bạn bartender Kim Thủy và Việt Hoàn thân thiện và rất nhiệt tình

title: Redelijk hotel
text: Redelijk hotel. De streek is minder toeristisch. Het hotel richt zicht voornamelijk op Vietnamezen. De kamers zijn redelijk ruim en onze kamer had een mooi uitzicht op de rivier. Schoonmaak kan beter. Het eten smaakte prima maar ook dat hebben we elders lekkerder gehad. De Karaoke bar is niet een plek om te verblijven en vol louche figuren en privé-kamertjes. Al met al een prima hotel voor een kort verblijf.

title: Bad experience there
text: Bad experience in check in process and having breaskfast on 4/29 monring. The receptionlist doesn't exaplin too much, so when I come back to the room I have the guest service request I don't know how to reach it.

title: Beautiful setting but...
text: It's a gigantic resort with beautiful setting. Breakfast was chaotic but great selections. The pools were great. Staff were nice enough but struggled a bit with English but you're not in Native English speaking country so no problem. Had dinner at Beach club, it was nice. Now the bad part. The room was nice but the shower..... It's a hand held shower over bath tub. Hand held shower........ The water will switch to the tub everytime when you turn it off, so you have to have it on and it will splash all over. The most uncomfortable shower ever. I don't know what were they thinking. And the soundproof system worse then a 3 star hotel. You can hear door slamming left and right so loudly and the next door neighbors closet door slamming as well.... All night. And there were some banging noise around 1 am on both nights we stayed and it was so loud and constant, we could not sleep. I talked to the lobby manager and she said she'll look into it but no result. So if you stay at the hotel building, good luck sleeping. It's a nice resort with beautiful setting but it cannot basic needs of travelers.

title: Cảm ơn Radisson
text: Kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời, phòng ốc đẹp, nhân viên thân thiện ! Gia đình mình ở vào đúng dịp lễ 30-4, nhưng vẫn ko có cảm giác xô bồ, mọi thứ đều chu đáo. Hồ bơi đẹp và rất sạch . Thức ăn rất ngon, cảm ơn chef Micheal Muir !

title: Puppies resort
text: We booked 3 days and 2 nights at Wild Beach. The resort owns a wonderful location with mountain back and seafront. Our room has a doubled bed, a 1HP air conditioner, a small fridge, a cable CRT TV with a tea desk. The place is not nice and clean but can’t blame them for this wilderness style. However the pathways and other things “out of the garden” is neat. We have tried the Seafood Sauna here, such a masterpiece of showmanship. There are a lot of dogs at the security booth when we’re in our car into the resort. A black French bulldog with a twisted neck greeted us at the reception and a small jack russel “always there for you” just a couple of stairs to the restaurant. We love dogs so there’s no problem with that but it might be annoying for tourists who don’t like this pet.

title: very pleasant
text: Stayed there one night due to the fact that cat bien farmstay reminded me too much of 'Psycho'. After a another terrifying experience in another tam my hotel (too bad I didn't write down the name) I checked into anh huy hotel and must say that there is absolutely nothing to complain about. The room is of good size and well furnished, the bed comfortable and everything works. The bathroom is nice and there are even plants - not ants- inside. There are plenty of restaurants close to it. I had a very good and quiet night and if tam my was more interesting I would have stayed longer there. For $ 15 the night a real winner! R. Gene from Germany

title: Great Stay in the Island Lodge - wish it had been longer
text: We stayed in the Island Lodge for two nights at the end of a long weekend in HCMC. It was a perfect antidote to the hustle and bustle of that vibrant city and we only wished we could have stayed longer. Michel and Francoise, and indeed all the staff, made us feel really welcome. The hotel itself is in a lovely tranquil setting overlooking the river with really interesting and slightly quirky decor. We enjoyed relaxing by the pool sipping one of the hotels fantastic mango smoothies ( best I have ever had) watching the barges on their way up and down the river. Just to note, these were on the far side of the river so they were totally noiseless, but simply added to the interest and quirkiness of the place. I agree with other reviewers that the photos do not do the place justice and it is much better 'in the flesh' so to speak. The transport organised by Michel from HCMC to the Island Lodge and back directly to the airport worked seamlessly and I can recommend that service. A great little place and a great few days. Thank you Michel and Francoise.

title: A Paradise on Earth
text: Mooi 'complex' aan het strand.Rustig gelegen.Super vriendelijk en behulpzaam personeel. Zeer ruime en mooie kamers.Uitgebreid ontbijtbuffet. Voldoende strandbedden op het strand en aan het zwembad.Heerlijke massages in de spa.
hotelName: Khu Nghỉ Dưỡng Chen Sea & Spa

title: Poor service and facility
text: I stayed here for 02 nights, I was disappointed with both of the service and the facility :( Although I have already known that there are not much choices in Ca Mau but this hotel cannot be recommended to other visitors. The room rates is cheap (380,000 VND/night ~ 18 USD) but the service is so poor. You should try other place if you come to Ca Mau and you should know that Ca Mau is not attractive place also, especially foreigner people. Better to go Mekong delta including Ca Mau than going to Ca Mau only.

title: Pleasant enough
text: Stayed 3 nights here as a part of a tour package. The Resort is superbly located right on a large stretch of pristine beach, which when we visited was pretty much desolate. The resort was also pretty empty, so it was a nice quiet retreat from the craziness of the big Vietnamese cities we have visit. There is no doubt the resort is looking dated and tired but our stay was pleasant enough. Breakfast was fair (1 out of the 3 mornings we had a buffet - which was supplied because a large corporate group were staying - the choices on the buffet far exceeded the menued breakfast on the other 2 days). The pool is huge (and deep at 2m) but very exposed to the hot sun, with very little shade. No pool towels provided either.

title: Plutôt une caserne qu'un hôtel.
text: Cet hôtel, indiqué 3 étoiles, ne mérite absolument pas ce classement : les chambres sont mal équipées (pas de lampe de chevet, mais un seul plafonnier), les salles de bain mal éclairées et pas finies (nombreuses fuites). Les couloirs sont sinistrés et font plus penser à une caserne qu'à un hôtel agréable. Le restaurant est à l'image de l'hôtel, à éviter absolument.

title: What Makes this place Special is the Excellent Service
text: It was our first visit to Viet Nam and the FS was our second stop after a short stay in Saigon. This is a large resort with very good infrastructure, two restaurants, one Vietnamese and the other western style food, a bar with great views, three pools one for kids, a lap pool and an amazing large "quiet pool". But what makes this place special is the service they provide and the attention to details. It happened that it was my birthday during our stay and they really made the day very special. Take advantage of the resorts close proximity to the city Hoi An and the bus service they provide, It is worth visiting specially when the sun comes down and all the lanterns are lit. There are lot's of places to have a coffee, a drink or local food.
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An

title: Pas de vues sur le lac
text: Nous n'aime pas trop la maison car elle est loin du lac, loin du tout et les vues ne sont pas jolies et c'est pas pratique pour y aller. Nous ne sommes pas contents de notre excursion avec cette agence que nous avons trouvée par hasard dans le vieux quartier de Hanoi.
