title: Очень понравился!! Это просто чудо какое то!!
text: Отель просто сказка. Много где был и был в 5 звездах, есть с чем сравнивать. Не понимал изначально почему всего 3 звезды. Поговорив с персоналом понял, что они просто любят быть скромными, но эта скромность очаровательна при их величии. Скажу более, на острове Фукуок я увидел совсем другой вьетнам, здесь люди улыбаются, совсем другая аура в отличии от Нячанга. Нячанг совсем не понравился, по сравнению с этим островом небо и земля. В отеле честно даже не к чему было придраться, хотя я могу ))) Персонал просто самые милые люди! Находиться очень близко к пляжу. Бесплатные велики (нигде не встречал ранее), обычно во многих отелях только врут ,что есть. Мопеды по 150 донгов (450 р примерно) за день, парковка на входе удобная. Рядом есть джипы в аренду по стоимости 60 баксов день. С ездой по острову нет проблем, если ты трезвый и в шлеме. Весь остров 50 км в длину, с мопедом за день можно проехать весь. И в этом есть плюс, все рядом, далеко не бывает. Рядом с отелем очень много кафе, которые себя зарекомендовали, но если лень пройтись или ты устал, то при отеле очень хороший ресторан «Рубик», с видом на красивый бассейн, мммм прекрасный вкус ребрышек, говядина на стручках чеснока, да много вкусного!!! Цены как и везде у них в ресторане, приходили не раз, можно взять тарелку в номер и коктейль, и не париться с тем, чтобы отнести назад, в обед следующего дня все сами уберут. Сервис!! Что поразило особенно это внимательное отношение к чистоте отеля, они проводили обработку от насекомых, предупредив всех брошюрами. При отеле есть дни барбекю по выходным, цены ниже чем в соседних отелях, сравнил. В отеле есть бесплатный бильярд и настольный футбол с дартсом! Вай фай просто шикарный!!! Нигде так хорошо не работал интернет как у них! Я фильм загружал на телефон за 2 минуты!! Завтраки!!!! Завтраки просто бомбааа!!!! Ааааа!!! Первый раз попался отель в котором каждый день меняют блюда!! Всегда было - неделю одно, потом неделю другое. БЛИНЫ с медом, блины с шоколадным соусом, блины без ничего!!! Блины блины блины!!! Очень вкусные блины, сюда стоит ехать только даже из за блинов!!! Они БО-ЖЕ-СТВЕННЫ!! Бассейн красивый и вода всегда комфортная, даже в дождь хорошо, чистый всегда!! Никаких ремонтов на неделю!! Шезлонгов много на басике, что немаловажно! Полотенца пляжные каждый день меняли! И по отьезду никто не спросил лишних денег!!! Отель мечта!! Хочу еще в этот отель!! Как и говорил, отель без лишних неуместных неоправданных понтов, все по делу, приезжаешь и удивляешься, как же тут хорошо!! Реально ориентированы на клиента!! Я в шоке!! Я очень рад что выбрал изабеллу!!! Берите сюда поездки, не думайте!! Не пожалеете точно!!
en_review: Отель просто сказка. Много где был и был в 5 звездах, есть с чем сравнивать. Не понимал изначально почему всего 3 звезды. В отеле честно даже не к чему было придраться, хотя я могу ))) Персонал просто самые милые люди! Находиться очень близко к пляжу. Бесплатные велики (нигде не встречал ранее), обычно во многих отелях только врут ,что есть. Мопеды по 150 донгов (450 р примерно) за день, парковка на входе удобная. Рядом есть джипы в аренду по стоимости 60 баксов день. С ездой по острову нет проблем, если ты трезвый и в шлеме. Весь остров 50 км в длину, с мопедом за день можно проехать весь. И в этом есть плюс, все рядом, далеко не бывает. Рядом с отелем очень много кафе, которые себя зарекомендовали, но если лень пройтись или ты устал, то при отеле очень хороший ресторан «Рубик», с видом на красивый бассейн, мммм прекрасный вкус ребрышек, говядина на стручках чеснока, да много вкусного!!! Цены как и везде у них в ресторане, приходили не раз, можно взять тарелку в номер и коктейль, и не париться с тем, чтобы отнести назад, в обед следующего дня все сами уберут. Сервис!! Что поразило особенно это внимательное отношение к чистоте отеля, они проводили обработку от насекомых, предупредив всех брошюрами. При отеле есть дни барбекю по выходным, цены ниже чем в соседних отелях, сравнил. В отеле есть бесплатный бильярд и настольный футбол с дартсом! Вай фай просто шикарный!!! Нигде так хорошо не работал интернет как у них! Я фильм загружал на телефон за 2 минуты!! Завтраки!!!! Завтраки просто бомбааа!!!! Ааааа!!! Первый раз попался отель в котором каждый день меняют блюда!! Всегда было - неделю одно, потом неделю другое. БЛИНЫ с медом, блины с шоколадным соусом, блины без ничего!!! Блины блины блины!!! Очень вкусные блины, сюда стоит ехать только даже из за блинов!!! Они БО-ЖЕ-СТВЕННЫ!! Бассейн красивый и вода всегда комфортная, даже в дождь хорошо, чистый всегда!! Никаких ремонтов на неделю!! Шезлонгов много на басике, что немаловажно! Полотенца пляжные каждый день меняли! И по отьезду никто не спросил лишних денег!!! Отель мечта!! Хочу еще в этот отель!! Как и говорил, отель без лишних неуместных неоправданных понтов, все по делу, приезжаешь и удивляешься, как же тут хорошо!! Реально ориентированы на клиента!! Я в шоке!! Я очень рад что выбрал изабеллу!!! Берите сюда поездки, не думайте!! Не пожалеете точно!!

title: NOT FOR AUSTRALIAN COUPLES
text: We purchased an internet deal at Vinpearl, Phu Quoc. Before our purchase we tried getting information about this property but very little information is available on the various travel websites. We did find out that there were adjoining properties but after our purchase we were not able to get any clarification as to which of the 3 properties our purchase was at to ensure we were at the property most suited to couples. Hope this information is helpful. Firstly, I see no need to go to Phu Quoc Island in Vietnam, there are much easier tropical/island destinations to get to throughout South East Asia. We spend several months each year holidaying in South East Asia and have been to Vietnam several previous times. The Vietnam Visa required is reasonably expensive. To get to Phu Quoc Island it is a one hour flight from Ho Chi Min City and this short flight is expensive. The Island has a main town about 15 minutes drive from the airport. It is very local with some restaurants and food carts, there are small shops selling local craft and a market. The cloths in the market are overpriced, a cheesecloth white shirt three times the price we paid in Thailand with no negotiation on the price. Beer is available in the small 7/11 type shops but no bottle wine to purchase apart from in restaurants and hotels. Vinpearl Resort, Phu Quoc is about 70 minutes drive from the airport. This place is massive three adjoining resorts Vinpearl Oasis, new with over 1,000 rooms in the hotel section. Vinpearl Resort & Golf also huge with a hotel building and villas. We are staying in Discovery 2 Resort, there are around 800 three bedroom villas all with own small swimming pool. Discovery 1 and 3 are soon to be opened adjoining Discovery 2. The 3 restaurants at Discovery 2 are huge I would estimate over 200 seating in each restaurant. It is a chaotic feeding frenzy people shouting, pushing and shoving and very badly behaved, unsupervised children running around the restaurant. The food in the restaurant is OK, breakfast was good but the nightly dinner varied enormous from good to inedible with much of the bae-mare food being near cold. Between the town and the Vinpearl area, about 50 minutes drive there is only the occasional local shanty shops and restaurants on the side of the road. Most of the road is ok but very rough in a few parts. Adjoining the resorts is the very large Vinpearl Fun Park, we did not go there. About 10 minutes drive away is Vinpearl Safari, we did go A$28.00 each, it was OK, not many exhibits in the zoo area but a lot of animals in the bus drive through Safari section. Unfortunately the commentary is in Vietnamese, I think the guide did try to say some in English but nothing could be understood. There is also a multi animal show but again nothing understandable in the commentary. The staff are very friendly, many of the Vietnamese housekeeping, restaurant and maintenance staff speak no English. Vinpearl have sourced many well qualified European staff at the upper department levels. They are all very nice and were keen to chat with we Westerners of which there were almost no others during our stay. The Vinpearl clientele is mostly from South East Asia, India/Pakistan and Russia. Most of the guests were holidaying in large family groups. The included spa treatments were good. There are 3 spas on the properties and a shuttle is required to transport you to the spa. Overall the property is beautiful, the villas are well designed high end. There was a full kitchen in our villa but there is NO cooking equipment, as cooking in the villa is strictly not allowed. We were at Phu Quoc mid year it was the wet season and was very wet and windy. I could not recommend this property for couples, it is very family orientated for large family groups with few Westerners or couples.

We did find out that there were adjoining properties but after our purchase we were not able to get any clarification as to which of the 3 properties our purchase was at to ensure we were at the property most suited to couples. title: Khách san không sao
text: Thời gian qua tôi có đi du lịch Mộc Châu và ở tại khách sạn Hương Sen. Được thông báo là khách sạn chuẩn 2 sao nhưng thực tế tại khách sạn chỉ tương đương với nhà trọ bình dân. Vệ sinh trong phòng kém, nhà vệ sinh ko có vòi sịt. Phòng không có tủ để đồ của khách. Rèm cửa sổ không kéo được kín do khi lắp điều hoà ống dẫn lồi ra chặn đường kéo của rèm cửa, chăn ga cũ kỹ trông rất nhếch nhác ...

title: Serious issues for a new hotel
text: We only stayed one night here, and whilst the english speaking manager T seemed helpful the whole experience was not great to say the least. On arrival we were caught in a bargaining fiasco where they kept trying to sell us a more expensive room than we explicitly said our budget was. The toilet/ bathroom smelt like raw sewage was about to come back out of the toilet, a smell which perforated into our room even with the door shut and when we told them, their fix was to spray some cleaner around when we'd left to have dinner, which lasted all of 10 minutes. The final straw for us was that we had a window onto the corridor (completely useless design flaw) which meant that the fluorescent lights shone through lighting up our room and even when we turned them off, the switch is in the corridor for everyone to use so it was like being in a dorm room. In the morning we explained and asked to swap rooms which was met with excuses, a 'you get what you pay for' speech and a refusal to allow us a different room unless we paid more. Overall it was a poor experience, although their breakfast balcony is pretty.

The final straw for us was that we had a window onto the corridor (completely useless design flaw) which meant that the fluorescent lights shone through lighting up our room and even when we turned them off, the switch is in the corridor for everyone to use so it was like being in a dorm room. In the morning we explained and asked to swap rooms which was met with excuses, a 'you get what you pay for' speech and a refusal to allow us a different room unless we paid more. Overall it was a poor experience, although their breakfast balcony is pretty.

title: Worst hotel in 2 weeks in Vietnam, stay elsewhere in town.
text: We stayed here to spend a day in DBP. Nice town, off beat with no tourists. But stay elsewhere. They have cheap rooms at 150k which were awful so we looked at the othrr rooms (300k) and were so tired we mistakenly said yes. Lets see what we got: - Horrible service, no staff around. Take your money (upfront) then disappeared. - Room smelled of cigerette smoke as others on here reported. - Air con wouldnt work. Hot boiler wouldnt work. - When we lay down we noticed the pillows STANK. So with no staff there we walked around the other rooms (which were just left open) to find clean ones. The fact this took us several rooms of looking sums up this hotel. - We had 2 hours to wait for our bus. When we found staff we asked to leave our bags (a service offered to us for free everywhere we stayed in Vietnam) and she wanted 50k per bag. Be lucky to have checked this out on TA, we wish we had. Walk 2 min down the street from the bus stop amd there are nice looking places.

title: Thái độ phục vụ tệ
text: Mình đi du lịch ở các resort thường cho check in 12h/2h ở đây 4h mới check in mih muốn đặt và hỗ trợ cug k được. Kiểu đặt phòng là rất bất cần 4h nhận k nhận thì thôi mih đi 1 ngày đến nơi 12h/1h muốn nhận sớm để vui chơi vì 12h trưa mai mih về sg lại nhưng bên phía resort báo ph villa k cho nhận . 10tr/1 đêm qá tệ vẫn còn nhiều lựa chọn ở hồ tràm lắm

title: Big dissapointment
text: Overpriced and very much overrated. We had an upstairs room the first night which was okay but very expensive. The second night we had a 'pool'side room, since the upstairs one was booked. There is no pool to speak (its more an oversized bathtub) of and the room was Shocking. There were mosquito nets hung 50cm above The bed and the bathroom was horrible. The aussie owner was a jerk. Breakfast and dinner were good but enormously overpriced. We finally fled to the lakehouse down the road which is cheaper and much much cleaner and better. Would not recommend to anybody.

title: BOF
text: Bon accueil mais notre chambre aurait mérité plus de propreté. Des souris ou autres étaient venues faire leurs besoins sur le lit. La pression de la douche était inexistante, serviettes bien fatiguées. le pompon: la protection électrique. Repas convenable, petit déjeuner quelconque.
en_review: Bon accueil mais notre chambre aurait mérité plus de propreté. Des souris ou autres étaient venues faire leurs besoins sur le lit. La pression de la douche était inexistante, serviettes bien fatiguées. le pompon: la protection électrique. Repas convenable, petit déjeuner quelconque.

title: Damp & moldy rooms!!
text: Wish I took pictures of this place. Worst rooms I've seen whilst on my travels, was so damp it was dripping from the ceiling! Was no way I was sleeping there, went someware else after I asked for a differant room and the one they then gave was just as damp! Awful ! How can you be expected to sleep in damp rooms' totally gross! Avoid this place' , the gecko a 30 second walk down the road is 100x nicer

title: Not clean and badly maintained - don’t stay here
text: We had a reservation here through a large travel agency as art of our tour. The place had good reviews. However, when we went to our 2nd floor rooms, we discovered that all 3 toilets were badly dirty (I don’t want to detail), in 2 of the 3 rooms the roof ventilator didn’t work (there’s no A/C) and in the 3rd room the ventilator shaked badly as if it was going to rotate out of the roof. Luckily, after some deliberation, our tour company agreed to take us to a different hotel. Bottom line, don’t stay here.

However, when we went to our 2nd floor rooms, we discovered that all 3 toilets were badly dirty (I don’t want to detail), in 2 of the 3 rooms the roof ventilator didn’t work (there’s no A/C) and in the 3rd room the ventilator shaked badly as if it was going to rotate out of the roof. Luckily, after some deliberation, our tour company agreed to take us to a different hotel. Bottom line, don’t stay here.

title: excellent
text: Good location near the lake. Very friendly and helpful hosts. Basic but clean (family)rooms. Dinner was very good but too much . Nice atmosphere where you can easily meet the family and other travellers. English spoken.
en_review: Good location near the lake. Very friendly and helpful hosts. Basic but clean (family)rooms. Dinner was very good but too much . Nice atmosphere where you can easily meet the family and other travellers. English spoken.

title: Không bao giờ lặp lại
text: Không bao giờ lặp lại! Người phụ nữ trẻ ở khách sạn thực sự rất tốt đẹp và có động lực. Và người duy nhất ở đó nói hai từ tiếng Anh (nhưng không nhiều hơn). NHƯNG: - Căn phòng tôi đã có lúc đầu đã bị mốc và ẩm ướt và có mùi (thay đổi thành một phòng ok ngay sau đó) - anh chàng lớn tuổi hơn từ khách sạn hút thuốc ở quầy lễ tân, lấp đầy toàn bộ căn nhà với mùi khói - nó rất ồn ào, ngay tại một con phố đông đúc - giường cực kỳ khó - Tôi muốn ở lại 2 đêm, nhưng kể từ khi nó quá tệ, quyết định rời đi sau một đêm, họ vẫn tính tiền tôi cho 2, và thậm chí WORSE: sau đó họ đã điều chỉnh đặt phòng của tôi. com đặt phòng xuống một đêm, rõ ràng là để tiết kiệm hoa hồng thanh toán Tôi chưa bao giờ thấy tiền vướng víu như thế / tham lam - thực sự khiến tôi không nói nên lời.

title: 素晴らしいリゾートホテルでした
text: 8/18から8/23まで１０歳の娘と家族３人で滞在しました。 ダナンの町から車でおよそ１時間で、とても静かにリゾートを満喫したい方には良いと思います。 家族連れには大きなプールがあるので、楽しめると思います。娘もかなり気に入っててとても楽しんでいました。プールの前は遠浅な海が広がっていますが、正直、そんなにきれいではありませんでした。ライフセーバーの方がいるので、安全面は割としっかりしていると思います。 朝食のビュッフェは美味しいのですが、あまり変化がないので、後半は飽きてくるかもしれません。 夕食は前の方も口コミしていましたが、隣接するバンヤンツリーのサフランというタイ料理のお店はおすすめです。出来たら、サンセットに合わせてテラス席が取れればベストです。ただ予約必須のお店なので予約は早めにしたほうがいいですよ。シェフもアンサナプーケットから来てる方みたいで本場のタイ料理が楽しめます。値段も料理の味とのバランスを考えれば妥当だと思います。ドレスコードはあるようでないような感じでした。アジア系の方は短パンサンダルの方が多かったですが、ヨーロッパ系の方はちゃんとジャケットを着てる方が多かったような気がしました。もちろんお店の雰囲気は言うまでもなく後者です。 今回は私たちはやりませんでしたが、ニックファルド監修のゴルフ場が隣接しており、ゴルフをする方にも楽しめると思います。 ホテルを拠点にフエやバナヒルズ、少し足を伸ばしてホイアンといろいろと観光も組み合わせが可能だと思います。今回、あまり時間がなかったので、ドライバ－付きレンタカー１０時間でバナヒルズとホイアンを一気に回ってきました。バナヒルズが意外に面白く、バナヒルズに行かれれる方は、時間を余裕に取ったほうがいいと思います。私たちはバナヒルズに昼食も含めて５時間くらいいました。 最後に日本に帰る前日に今までに感じたことがないような痛みをみぞおちに感じ、ダナンの大きな病院に連れて行ってくれたVanさんはじめスタッフにはとても感謝しています。結局、胆石が原因とのことで薬を処方してもらいよくなりました。スタッフのかたはとても親切でホスピタリティに優れています。 最初にも言いましたが、ダナンで静かにリゾートを満喫したい方はぜひ行ってみてください。おススメですよ。

title: Not a bad place for the money.
text: We arrived here at about 6.30am after a long journey by night bus then local bus. We had emailed in advance to say we were arriving early but didn't get a response. However, on arrival, our room was ready which was great as we needed to rest. Great location. Bamboo Cafe across the road and Easytiger and Jungle Bar 1 minute away. Its only about 5 mins walk from the tourist information centre where you can get tickets to get on a boat to the caves. You can hire motorbikes (with or without driver) or bicycles at numerous places on the high street. The hotel only offers one tour I think which is advertised behind reception. The lady working here mentioned the tour but didn't push it when we said we were going to arrange our own. In the end as it was wet season we hired a car with a driver from Phong Nha Travel Agency (cross the road and turn right coming out of the hotel). Its a new agency and guy couldn't have been more helpful. Car and driver for the day for $42 and he took us wherever we wanted and waited while we explored the caves. The room was large, clean and comfortable. We also had a balcony. We only stayed two nights but it was cleaned with fresh towels for our second day. Breakfast was basic but fine. Aircon worked. We also had a fan and TV (although didn't turn this on so not sure what channels etc). The bed was comfortable and the bathroom was the usual wet bathroom you get in Vietnamese hotels. No problems with insects, damp or anything else. Reception isn't manned all the time so I'd take your room key out with you. We paid $38 for two people for two nights. Certainly not the cheapest accommodation we've had in Vietnam but seems to be the going rate in Phong Nah. Its not luxurious but its a good, basic hotel. We'd stay again.

title: Good service!
text: Nhân viên cực kì thân thiện và chuyên nghiệp. Phòng ngủ và phòng tắm đẹp. Ăn sáng ngon. 2 Điểm trừ duy nhất là nhân viên sale làm việc cực kì thiếu chuyên nghiệp và chậm trễ, mình đã phải gọi điện 4 lần để nhắc các bạn trả lời mail booking. Tại sao không có nhân viên trực email?? hay các bạn nghĩ mình đặt qua voucher nên không cần phải trả lời hay care khách?? Và điểm trừ thứ 2 là khi trả phòng check out, mình đã yêu cầu nhân viên lễ tân gọi giúp 1 xe taxi và không sử dụng dịch vụ xe riêng của resort nhưng nhân viên lễ tân cố tình không gọi giúp, báo hết xe ko có xe vào trong khi có 3 xe thành công ở ngoài và mình đã phải tự gọi. Mình cực kì không hài lòng về chuyện này. Ngoài 2 vấn đề này thì nhìn chung tất cả mọi người đều ổn. Highly Recommend! Hi vọng các bạn có thể cải thiện chất lượng dịch vụ tốt hơn. Thanks and Regard

title: Excellent
text: Nhà mình ở đây 2 đêm. Nhìn chung phòng có không gian to, đẹp, bay-view cũng khá thoáng, phòng mình ko bị che bới cây nhiều. Đồ ăn rất ngon, nếu có thể cải thiện sự đa dạng cho bữa sáng cũng như các bữa khác thì sẽ hài lòng hơn nữa. Nhà mình rất trân trọng sự giúp đỡ của bạn Trường quản gia. Dù bạn ý ko phụ trách nhà mình nhưng luôn ân cần hỏi thăm, giúp đỡ trước và trong chuyến đi. Sau chuyến đi, mình để quên đồ nên cần hỗ trợ cũng được bạn nhiệt tình giúp.

title: Hotel and Staff Fantastic - Location though remote
text: We got this resort on a deal so it was a bargain for us. Look around for deals The hotel is co-located with a Banyan Tree and you can use the BT facilities as well. It has an amazing golf course. For a relaxing holiday this resort does have you well catered and cared for Points we like The staff they are amazing and can't do enough to help The beach, its very good - pool is great The hotel rooms are spacious and well appointed - average internet speed in the room, but you can watch movies as long as you queue it up - thumbs up for a large number of coat hangers Bed - big and comfortable Bathroom big and with high quality consumables - Note shower in our room was a bit of character. You had to get in and hold the selector in to get the shower head, otherwise then rain shower hit you full force - stupid me did that twice in my clothes View from our beach front room with small pool was fantastic Room service was very good. Breakfast very good Other meals were good expect to pay $$$ prices Points to note IT IS REMOTE. - if you're planning on doing day trips, plan on 1 hour each way for Danang - 1-1/2 hours each way to HUE, and 2 hours each way for Hoi An There are no shops outside so don't think you can slip outside the resort for a cheap meal or pick up non silly priced soft drinks or snacks Wine is very expensive - bring your own --- be warned, and wine seems very expensive in Vietnam in general ----On your way out of Danang or Hue to the hotel get the driver to stop and load up with soft drinks, beer etc The weather - the rainy season, we went in the rainy season and were prepared - but there were people here who thought it is sunny all year round - having stayed in the region in summer it is advisable to bring hats, and loads of sunscreen and light weight cooler climate gear for the rainy season Some rooms are right across from the pool bar and for some reason the inevitable trance music they all seem to play. Rooms 6201, 6202, 5119 - 5110, 6119 -6110 are likely to be affected Beach beyond the resort bounds is trash covered but interesting to see ----- Overall a really good hotel - we would come back prepared and in the summer time

Rooms 6201, 6202, 5119 - 5110, 6119 -6110 are likely to be affected Beach beyond the resort bounds is trash covered but interesting to see ----- Overall a really good hotel - we would come back prepared and in the summer time

title: Nice accommodation but Not the food!
text: The accommodation was great, really big rooms and right on the lake. I give the accom a 8/10 but it was very $$$ to! The staff we lovely to, we really like them. But unfortunately the two nights we were there every time they messed up our food order and then served me raw chicken, which then I was sick most the night after and worried about getting salmonella. Also at 7am when were trying to get a sleep in we had a loud knock on our door, I got up and answered it and it was a staff member just walking away and not saying any thing. Really frustrating. Over all I would stay there but not eat there.
en_review: The accommodation was great, really big rooms and right on the lake. I give the accom a 8/10 but it was very $$$ to! The staff we lovely to, we really like them. But unfortunately the two nights we were there every time they messed up our food order and then served me raw chicken, which then I was sick most the night after and worried about getting salmonella. Also at 7am when were trying to get a sleep in we had a loud knock on our door, I got up and answered it and it was a staff member just walking away and not saying any thing. Really frustrating. Over all I would stay there but not eat there.

title: Amazing hotel, great staff, but lacking in some areas.
text: This is a tough hotel to reviews as there is much about JW Marriott PQ to love. There are however areas where the property is lacking as well. What we loved: The most obvious thing we loved was the spectacular design of the property. From the minute you walk in to the time you leave you will be enchanted by the attention to detail, the beautiful buildings and luxurious fittings. The room we had (5401) was beautiful and convenient in that it opened onto the room and beach, perfect for laying on our private day bed and taking a dip whenever we wanted. It was truly beautiful and we loved it. the resort pools themselves were nicely designed as well and always clean. The resort facilities were first rate. There is a fantastic gym, kids room, activities room and the spa is superb. The staff were amazing. A special mention must however go to May, a waitress in Tempus Fugit restaurant. May made our trip extra special. She introduced herself in the first night we were there and went out of her way every day to make us happy and ensure we had whatever we wanted. Aside form that excellent service however it was her friendly chats and demeanour which added to our stay in ways words alone never properly conveys. Thank you May, you are truly an asset to JW Marriott Phu Quoc. Josh was great during our lantern making class (which we recommend) and Sandeep, a chef, went out of his way to personally deliver my egg order everyday! There were many other staff that also made the trip great. Breakfast buffet was stunning and second to none. The bike trip to the pagoda hotel as awesome. What we didn't love: Don't come here for untouched beaches. Despite an army of workers clearing the beach every day (seemingly all day), there are endless amounts of rubbish on the beach and in the water. We stuck to the pools mostly. The shuttle to town. On arrival we tried to book the shuttle. We were told it was booked out, no vehicles available. The next night then? Also booked out. Lucky we were staying 6 nights. If you were only staying a couple you'd not get the bus at all. We Told that the buses they had were full. Absolute rubbish, three nights later they had a much larger bus in use as well as the shuttles. So they have the vehicles they just choose when to use them. The resort was not even that busy. Absolute rip off hotel transfer costs. At the rates guests pay it should be an inclusion, not a method of ripping guests off another $60-$80 each way. I must add that the other resort we stayed at (half the price and just as luxurious) provided an Audi town car to transport us if the shuttle was full. That hotel also included airport transfers. Whilst admittedly out of the hotels control the behaviour of some guests was disgusting. On so many occasions we saw guests hocking and spitting wherever they were, in public areas. On pool decks, on the pathways, at or near restaurants. We were there for 6 days and so not an isolated incident. Also the same groups of guests were arrogant, treating the restaurant as though they owned it, loud, screaming, walking around whilst drunk. Letting their kids wander around and run around the restaurant in reprimanded in any way, no matter how much they were disrupting others. Despite what you read and what is advertised, there is no adults only pool, every pool had kids in it everyday. The menu of the beachside restaurant. Not one single vegetarian dish and no offer to cater to vegetarian diet. This excluded us from dining at one of the two restaurants, and the only one which was both close to our room and outdoors, not good enough. Tempus Fugit has a vegetarian menu but you have to ask for it (and/or hope staff know about it, not all of them did). Service in Tempus Fugit on one of the three nights we dined there was terrible (may's night off!). Us and the guests around us waited forever for dishes. When served they weren't served together and then the rice didn't come at all. I asked for my dish to be reheated (it went cold whilst i waited for my wife's dish to be served). It was returned still lukewarm and missing half the sauce. Just not good enough for a 5 star resort. The resort is great but simply not good value at over $500 a night. It's a $300, maybe $350 a night resort. So three stars might seem harsh given the amount of beauty the place has and the efforts of most of the staff, however all things must be considered when reviewing a hotel including the way it pitches itself as against the market and what a guest should expect when booking the premiere resort on the island.

title: Try and find something you don't like, I dare you...
text: This place is amazing. It hits the high notes and can hold them for the duration of your stay. The architecture, service, views, facilities, welcome, food, ambience, accommodation are unsurpassed. It is the total package. No question. You know getting in a dressed 4WD from the airport with wi-fi, the world's best cashews and dried mango you're on your way to something special. Add an iPad with a complete introduction to the resort including the menus and wine list and you start to develop an sense for the make-up of the Amanoi DNA. Get in the shower and open a door to the South China Sea! Head to the Beach Club and experience another world of aquatic luxury. The fitness centre and spa are awesome. So is everything else. This is uber luxe. I actually wouldn't have believed how good this place was until I came here. Now that I have, I'll never forget it.
en_review: This place is amazing. It hits the high notes and can hold them for the duration of your stay. The architecture, service, views, facilities, welcome, food, ambience, accommodation are unsurpassed. It is the total package. No question. You know getting in a dressed 4WD from the airport with wi-fi, the world's best cashews and dried mango you're on your way to something special. Add an iPad with a complete introduction to the resort including the menus and wine list and you start to develop an sense for the make-up of the Amanoi DNA. Get in the shower and open a door to the South China Sea! Head to the Beach Club and experience another world of aquatic luxury. The fitness centre and spa are awesome. So is everything else. This is uber luxe. I actually wouldn't have believed how good this place was until I came here. Now that I have, I'll never forget it.

title: Đi ra khỏi khách sạn
text: Tôi ở đó một đêm. Khách sạn ở trong tình trạng khá nghèo / xấu. Sơn treo tường, đèn không hoạt động ect. Nơi này vô cùng ồn ào. Từ 5 giờ sáng đã không ngủ được. Giường rất cứng. Tôi đã yêu cầu thêm 2 tấm chăn để cố gắng làm mềm giường, nhưng tôi không biết liệu họ có hiểu tôi không, hay chỉ không quan tâm. Nhân viên có vẻ tốt đẹp mặc dù. Không thể đề nghị.

title: Prachtig Hotel maar slecht eten
text: Na een rondtoch door Vietnam, Laos en Cambodja eindigde we onze vakantie in het Nam Hai resort in Hoi An om even lekker bij te komen. Het resort is werkelijk waar prachtig. Er zijn 3 gigantische zwembaden, 2 voor mensen met kinderen en 1 voor mensen boven de leeftijd van 16. Het resort is een architectonisch hoogstandje, de kamers zijn luxe ingericht en de restaurants zijn chique en comfortabel. Alle zwembaden hebben een overloopgoot wat de illusie wekt dat je vanuit het zwembad de zee in kan zwemmen. We kregen een stuk terrein met 3 bungelows en een prive zwembad. Ook hier zag alles er geweldig uit maar er waren een aantal kleinigheidjes die ons stoorde. Van de geluidsinstallatie in het huis werkte maar 1 speaker en de airconditioning was niet te besturen. Verder waren we totaal niet te spreken over de kwaliteit van het eten in het resort. De keuze bij de restaurants was beperkt en de gerechten die geserveerd werden waren niet smakelijk. Verder vonden we de kaart onvolledig. We zijn daarom elke avond in Hoi An gaan eten, hier is het eten goed en de prijs schappelijk. Tot slot zijn consumpties in het resort vrij duur.

title: Un hôtel dans la rue principale
text: Hôtel récent, situé sur la place du village à proximité du marché du dimanche matin. Plusieurs restaurants à proximité. La réception de l'hôtel est au deuxième étage car le rez-de-chaussée est occupé par un magasin. La chambre (n° 402) est spacieuse et donne sur la rue mais la fenêtre est protégée par une grille métalliques rendant son ouverture difficile. La chambre est dotée de deux grands lits avec des matelas plutôt raides, Wi-Fi, TV, TV5, climatisation, bouteilles d’eau, frigo, bouilloire mais sans thé ni café. L’insonorisation est mauvaise. La salle-de-bains est propre avec gel douche, shampooing et séchoir. Le personnel est aimable et serviable mais ne parle pas anglais. Petit-déjeuner simple servi dans la gargote voisine où l’on peut également se restaurer. Le choix des hôtels à Dong Van est limité, comme partout dans l’extrême nord du Vietnam où le tourisme est encore balbutiant, le Lam Tung semble être le meilleur choix. Très bon rapport qualité/prix.

Le choix des hôtels à Dong Van est limité, comme partout dans l’extrême nord du Vietnam où le tourisme est encore balbutiant, le Lam Tung semble être le meilleur choix. Très bon rapport qualité/prix.

title: Resort tuyệt vời!
text: Gia đình tôi đã nghỉ ngơi 2 ngày tại đây, chúng tôi đã được trải nghiệm cảm giác nghĩ dưỡng tuyệt vời. Mọi thứ đều hoản hảo từ check in tại villa nhanh gọn cho đến dịch vụ chăm sóc baby tận tình. Lễ tân tên Nguyên đã giúp đỡ chúng tôi rất nhiệt tình. Spa ở đây rất chuyên nghiệp và sang trọng, tôi đã hoàn toàn hết mệt mỏi và căng thẳng sau. Về nhà hàng tôi khuyên các bạn nên đến Safron, đồ ăn Thái ở đây rất tuyệt và cách phục vụ tuyệt vời. Tôi đã đặt Destination Dinner và cảm ơn đội ngủ nhân viên đã trang trí rất lãng mãn và chẵm sóc tận tình cho baby của tôi.

title: Merveilleux
text: Nous avons eu la chance de rester huit jours chez Monsieur Huy, séjour extraordinaire , chambre spacieuse très propre, et quel calme!!! petit déjeuner parfait très bonnes crêpes. Personne très discrète mais présente ,a su nous organiser une grande marche, promenades à moto ,excursion,vraiment parfait aucune hésitation à avoir et pour finir repas avec la famille vraiment très sympa!!!!

title: Nice location.  Average service
text: Very well located. The restaurant is average. The service is good and staff gentle. Cleanliness is not bad, but could be better. The price is good and is well paid. There is a nice swimming pool. Breakfast is OK.

title: unexpected experience.
text: Overall, It was wonderful until i saw couple of cockroaches in front of our villa during having in dining BBQ. Private pool was good enough for our couple. If you want to get some souvenir, the gallery cannot help you. There are only banyan tree bathroom articles that you can see in your room.

title: Тихое место для спокойного отдыха наедине с природой
text: Отель больше подходит для тихого, я бы даже сказал отшельнического отдыха. Расположен в дали от цивилизации, которой во Вьетнаме и так не хватает)). Будьте готовы ехать до отеля около 6 часов. Мало того, что далеко от всего находится, кроме нас в отеле почти никого не было. Так что если любите уединение и быть наедине с природой, то этот отель для вас. Завтраки скудные и с местным колоритом, надо быть готовым, что привычной европейской еды будет очень сложно найти. Рядом кроме кафе СССР ничего нет, так что насчет обеда будьте готовы к поездкам в город или есть по относительно высоким ценам в рядом находящемся кафе. В близлежащий населенный пункт ехать около часа и стоит около 12000 донгов. Номера и территория в целом отличные, море и природа супер. Много живности, тоже надо быть готовым к этому.

title: 可怕，被恐吓威胁
text: 入住时一定检查好房间物品，否则如退房时发现物品有损坏，会被索要高于房间内价单标价多倍的费用，并威胁恐吓住客，不付钱不准离开富国岛。

title: Khách sạn tồi tệ nhất không ghé thăm
text: Khách sạn tồi tệ nhất mà tôi đã thấy. Chỉ có vẻ của khách sạn là tốt nhưng dịch vụ là xấu. Điều hòa không khí đầu tiên đầu tiên không hoạt động Lần thứ hai - Họ không nói được tiếng Anh hay bất kỳ ngôn ngữ nào và chỉ có tiếng Việt. Điều kiện không khí cũng rất xấu. Điện thoại cố định để kết nối với lễ tân không hoạt động. Khi gọi cho người phục vụ phòng không đến trong thời gian dài. Đã phải gọi từ điện thoại khẩn cấp ở sảnh để gọi dịch vụ phòng. Nhân viên dịch vụ phòng không hiểu bất kỳ ngôn ngữ nào. Đừng đi đến khách sạn này

title: Khá có thể là một trong những khách sạn tồi tệ nhất ở Việt Nam
text: Hãy tưởng tượng nếu bạn sẽ gói một ít gỗ bên trong một tấm, sau đó đặt một chút gỗ ở giữa giao lộ bận rộn nhất ở Việt Nam, sau đó hướng dẫn mọi xe tải chở xe tải và xe gắn máy hạng nặng nghe còi liên tục khi họ lái xe qua. Bằng cách này một chút gỗ là giường của bạn. Khách sạn này là quá khứ aweful. Nó không xứng đáng với tên của một khách sạn. Các giường cứng như đá, nơi bẩn, tiếng ồn giao thông không thể tin được và nhân viên nói dối. Rất đơn giản là không có gì để giới thiệu cho họ cả. Đại lý du lịch địa phương của tôi ở Việt Nam Bà Hà đồng ý chúng tôi đã nói dối. Cô sẽ không bao giờ đặt chúng lại. Tiết kiệm tiền của bạn và ngủ trên đường phố có lẽ sẽ sạch hơn và yên tĩnh hơn. Nếu tôi có thể cho điều này một âm 99 tôi sẽ. Nơi đáng sợ.

title: Overpriced , extremely basic
text: This hotel costs way too much for the type of room you get. We've paid this much for places elsewhere in Vietnam and have stayed in luxury in comparison. Bathrooms had hot water, and beds were comfortable. The staff is very nice and friendly and breakfast is included, but nothing special. The hotel is right on the water though, which is nice to wake up to. You get to eat breakfast on the harbour.

Bathrooms had hot water, and beds were comfortable. The staff is very nice and friendly and breakfast is included, but nothing special. The hotel is right on the water though, which is nice to wake up to. You get to eat breakfast on the harbour.

title: Pretty decent
text: Stopped here randomly on our motorcycles because it got late. 462.000 vnd for an upgraded room with bathtub and breakfast. Really cool a/c and breakfast was decent. Perfect for a night/stop! Visit Nha vien quan not far from there and eat :)
en_review: Stopped here randomly on our motorcycles because it got late. 462.000 vnd for an upgraded room with bathtub and breakfast. Really cool a/c and breakfast was decent. Perfect for a night/stop! Visit Nha vien quan not far from there and eat :)

title: Một kỳ nghỉ đáng nhớ
text: Dịch vụ của khu nghỉ dưỡng rất tuyệt vời! Nhân viên phục vụ rất tận tình, thân thiện, dễ mến, lịch sự. Đây có lẽ là điểm cộng cao nhất cho khu nghỉ dưỡng. Phong cảnh rất đẹp, phòng trang trí sang trọng, sạch sẽ, đầy đủ tiện nghi, tuy nhiên phần ban công của phòng chưa được sạch. Bên cạnh đó bữa ăn buffet với giá tiền như vậy thì chưa thực sự ổn, món ăn chưa đặc sắc, cách nấu chưa được ngon.

title: Terrible service; definitely not 5*
text: This resort is definitely not a 5 star property. Service was terrible. The shower in the room did not work, and although we tried to get it fixed or change rooms for 2 nights, the staff did not care and offered no assistance. It wasnt until after we had checked out (5 days early) that anyone apologized or offered to do anything. The managers solution was to downgrade our room to a lower class without any refund. No thanks! I'm thankful we left and were able to enjoy the remainder of vacation at a nicer resort with better service. The resort was crowded. Not just busy, but crowded and difficult to get a table to eat, constantly waiting for elevators, and no space at the pool or beach. The guests are primarily Russians and many were extremely rude. I witnessed a drunk, hostile Russian man physically threaten the front desk clerk. No manager or security ever stepped in to say his behavior is unacceptable. Dont be deceived by the nice views. That's all that this resort has going for it. Go elsewhere.

That's all that this resort has going for it. Go elsewhere.

title: vui hè 11/8-13/8/20

title: Ngủ cơ bản qua chỗ ...
text: Ngoại thất có thể là khách sạn lớn nhất trong thị trấn, khách sạn cung cấp các tiện nghi tối thiểu để ngủ nghỉ. Phòng bảo trì đã lỗi thời và không phù hợp. Phần tốt là thị trường Bắc Hà nằm trong khoảng cách đi bộ.

title: Beautifully secluded and perfect for nature lovers
text: Accommodating only a small number of guests, this beautifully built lodge is perfect for couples and or nature lovers. A previous comment mentioned "overpriced" but considering the small number of guests, quality of service, luxury rooms, and beautiful location, I thought it was a good value. A trekking lover I loved the jungle walks just outside my door with my knowledgable guide. He knew everything I could have ever wanted to know about birds, plants, and animals in the area. I would highly recommend the lodge to all.

title: Waoooaw
text: This place is amazing. Really nice atmosphere and very welcoming friendly owners. I can highly recommend it. And the food, that the dear owner Loan cooked ,was amazing. The best Vitnamies dinner I ever had. The rooms are simple but very stylish.

title: Team building here is not a good idea
text: I know I shouldn't expect too much with that price. It's just vnd1,500,000/room But I hope it will be better in next year after upgraded. We were not lucky because they are reparing right now. No spa, no water sports, less staffs (but the boy who works in the restaurant was so friendly and helpful) plus point just because of him. The pool is kind of small but clean. Breakfast was so terrible with alot of flies around.

title: A Room with a beauty view

text: Gần như một ngôi nhà trên cây giống như bạn ngủ trong một căn phòng lớn với rèm cửa trên giường của bạn. Comfy, chăn dày (ngay cả thoug chúng tôi đã phải yêu cầu một tươi!). Gia đình ăn tối tốt và rất nhiều. Gặp những du khách tốt đẹp khác và hoàn thành tất cả bia trong tủ lạnh!

title: Over priced for what they offer
text: Sorry as nice as the staff is this is a hotel review and the Oasis is not a place I would stay again. You need to know the location is on the wrong side of the river and if you, like us you are walkers expect at least a thirty minute walk to town. The rooms need to be redone, they smell musty, the linen, towels etc have seen better days and the TV offers no English news ( this was the only hotel in our month in Vietnam that didn't offer this) Wifi worked only intermittently in the room. Breakfast was minimal and if you would like juice etc. that was extra, really nickel and dime stuff. Tours were cheaper near the bridge. Overall based on our time in Vietnam we found this hotel overpriced be sure to check out the hotels on the other side of the river they were cheaper and offered much better services.

title: the most overpriced hotel in SE Asia, not worth it
text: we stayed for four days over Christmas. at the $1200 per night we were charged, this place is not worth it. It is trying to be an Aman resort or something of similar high-standard, but it just ain't. We thought we were booked into a seaside villa, when we arrived we found we were in a villa facing the town road on one side and a jungle landscape on the other. We could have been in Anywhere, Central Florida. After a to-do, we were finally placed in a seaside villa the third day of our stay. The rooms were fine, not great, no where near the level of other high- end "exotic" resorts in places like india or Thailand. this is more the level of a W Hotel, not an Oberoi. And the design of the villas, eeehh, what were they thinking? the bedroom is an obstacle course for mountain goats. The staff is very well-meaning, but really needs training. there often seemed to be more waitstaff in the dining room than guests, yet it took three requests, sign language, and almost 1/2 hour to not receive a cup of tea (we finally walked out). The dining room was also very crowded with large extended families when we were there, hardly relaxing. aside from the outrageous price we were charged for this resort, our biggest complain by far was the food. the first night we were there, there was only a prix-fixe dinner. we arrived late after a long day of traveling, unaware that this place is so far from town. the dinner was inedible, really the worst meal, by far, that we had in our three weeks in SE Asia, and for this we were charged over $400.00. It got worst the next day when we decided to play it safe and just order something easy from room service. The meal we were served, slopped on a plate, was akin to something from a salad bar at an airport Holiday Inn. when we complained about the food we were met with blank stares. The staff here is extremely well meaning and really seemed to be trying, and working, very (very) hard. They cannot, however, do their job correctly without the proper training and good direction from the owners of the company who owns this resort, alas, all woefully lacking.

title: Tiềm năng là có ... NHƯNG
text: Tôi sẽ cố gắng và tử tế khi viết bài đánh giá này. Tôi rất vui mừng khi tìm được khách sạn ngay trên bãi biển lúc đầu, và xa như vị trí khách sạn này cung cấp. Dịch vụ này là tồi tệ nhất tôi đã có cả tháng tại Việt Nam. Tôi đã cố gắng rất nhiều để cung cấp cho nhân viên cơ hội để đẩy nó lên. Tôi đưa ra những gợi ý tinh tế như đưa các món ăn của riêng tôi trở lại nhà bếp sau khi họ ngồi vào bàn của tôi trong một tiếng rưỡi. Cuối cùng tôi phải làm điều đó cho hầu như mọi bữa ăn. Giá cho đồ uống và thực phẩm được tăng cao. Chất lượng không phản ánh giá cao. Tôi đã đặt mua cá và khoai tây chiên và chúng được giao lạnh. Đồ uống của tôi là 80% băng. Ăn sáng được bao gồm nhưng lựa chọn rất hạn chế. Đó là một sự xấu hổ vì vị trí này là lý tưởng (cách xa thành phố). Bạn đang theo nghĩa đen trên bãi biển và họ giữ cho khu vực tư nhân của họ nguyên sơ. Khu vực nhà hàng rất quyến rũ. Nếu tầm cỡ của thực phẩm được cải thiện. Nếu kích thước của đồ uống được cải thiện và họ sử dụng ít nước đá hơn, và chúng thông qua một trang trí nhỏ để có biện pháp tốt, giá có thể phù hợp và khách hàng sẽ không cảm thấy bị tính phí. Tôi thực sự muốn cung cấp cho khách sạn này một đánh giá tốt. . . nhưng tôi không thể. Tôi không phải là một khách du lịch năm sao, vì vậy tôi mong đợi trong các lĩnh vực vị trí, sự quyến rũ và dịch vụ khách hàng. Thật không may là thiếu dịch vụ khách hàng. . . trong suốt thời gian lưu trú của tôi: yêu cầu thực đơn, đưa đĩa trống của riêng tôi vào bếp, không phải lúc nào cũng được tặng đồ uống (luôn phải treo cờ xuống máy chủ hoặc tự đi vào khu vực nhà bếp), không ai hỏi bữa ăn của tôi có được yêu cầu không , các phần nhỏ, thức ăn nguội, đồ uống chủ yếu là đá, mọi thứ đều có giá cao. . đường cao. Đây không phải là điển hình của dịch vụ khách hàng thân thiện nhất quán mà tôi đã tìm thấy trên khắp Việt Nam. Một chút tinh chỉnh và nơi này có thể là một viên ngọc ẩn.

title: Kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời
text: Đây có lẽ là kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời nhất với gia đình tôi. Món ăn ở đây rất phong phú và đa dạng các khu thăm quan rất tuyệt người dân thân thiện các hướng dẫm viên rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo đặc biệt là anh hướng dẫn viên xa kem tôi hướng sẽ quay lại đây vào kỳ nghỉ tới
en_review: Đây có lẽ là kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời nhất với gia đình tôi. Món ăn ở đây rất phong phú và đa dạng các khu thăm quan rất tuyệt người dân thân thiện các hướng dẫm viên rất nhiệt tình và chu đáo đặc biệt là anh hướng dẫn viên xa kem tôi hướng sẽ quay lại đây vào kỳ nghỉ tới

title: This could be so much better
text: This hotel was very disappointing. Although the building initially looks quite impressive the reality is somewhat different. The bedroom was basic with poor lighting, although the bed was comfortable. The bathroom had a bath with no sealant around it and no shower curtain so was like a swamp in a few seconds. There was a big patch of mould on the ceiling and I was very worried about the bathroom heater as everything else was in such poor condition. It seems as though the cheapest of everything was used in the building and it could be so much better if it was properly maintained. The restaurant had an extensive menu but you got the impression that most of it was a fantasy and not available. What we did manage to order was tasty enough and reasonably priced. The waitresses were pleasant enough and the breakfast was adequate and eggs were available. There is nothing around the hotel so you are a captive audience.

title: There has to be better options
text: Room was ok but old and dark. Clean an Spacious good view from 5th floor. I think for the same money you can get better ones in Ha Tien. Location: in town but not very central We arrived with the bus from Can Tho. Beware: they throw you out from the bus at no-where and some bad transportation-folk waits to cheat you. Ignore them and walk..... Its not that far.

Location: in town but not very central We arrived with the bus from Can Tho. Beware: they throw you out from the bus at no-where and some bad transportation-folk waits to cheat you. Ignore them and walk..... Its not that far.

title: Đội 3 sao tiêu chuẩn nhưng thân thiện
text: Giá tốt vì đơn giản là 8 USD. 1 Tôi có một phòng đôi riêng với phòng tắm, tiện nghi và máy lạnh làm việc tốt. Một số nhân viên nói tiếng Anh và một số người khác không tốt, nhưng tất cả họ đều thân thiện và hữu ích. Người phụ nữ thậm chí còn chở tôi đến Ngũ Hành Sơn mà không phải trả thêm phí. (Đó là khoảng 15 phút đi bộ hoặc 7 phút lái xe đi.) Nói chung tôi đã ở lại dễ chịu ở đây. Giá trị đơn giản nhưng tuyệt vời - cho - tiền.

Một số nhân viên nói tiếng Anh và một số người khác không tốt, nhưng tất cả họ đều thân thiện và hữu ích. Người phụ nữ thậm chí còn chở tôi đến Ngũ Hành Sơn mà không phải trả thêm phí. (Đó là khoảng 15 phút đi bộ hoặc 7 phút lái xe đi.) Nói chung tôi đã ở lại dễ chịu ở đây. Giá trị đơn giản nhưng tuyệt vời - cho - tiền.

title: "An unforgettable experience...these guys were the best!!!"
text: We were a group of 3 girls that had booked a trip up to northern Vietnam visiting Meo Vac, Bao Lac and Ha Giang...Via Ba Be lake..The B tourist company were amazing, They picked us up in Hanoi and escorted us the whole way. The Guide Chien was Fantastic, very knowledgable and very easy to get along with! The driver Nam was a great driver, we all felt very safe, as some of those roads can be pretty hairy...Together they were a fantastic team...we had many laughs together. I would defiantly request these 2 again if I was to do the trip in the future. The Homestay in Ba be lake was beautiful, as is Ba Be Lake itself...defiantly one of the highlights of the trip. The Linh family were very friendly and Mrs Linh was a great cook! I cannot recommend this company highly enough..!!!
en_review: We were a group of 3 girls that had booked a trip up to northern Vietnam visiting Meo Vac, Bao Lac and Ha Giang...Via Ba Be lake..The B tourist company were amazing, They picked us up in Hanoi and escorted us the whole way. The Guide Chien was Fantastic, very knowledgable and very easy to get along with! The driver Nam was a great driver, we all felt very safe, as some of those roads can be pretty hairy...Together they were a fantastic team...we had many laughs together. I would defiantly request these 2 again if I was to do the trip in the future. The Homestay in Ba be lake was beautiful, as is Ba Be Lake itself...defiantly one of the highlights of the trip. The Linh family were very friendly and Mrs Linh was a great cook! I cannot recommend this company highly enough..!!!

title: An Lame!
text: We rented two hill top villas for three nights. The villas were dirty, very worn and poorly kept. Maintenance was extremely poor and there was ingrown filth (grime) on indoor and outdoor surfaces, green fungus inhabiting the shower, dried black dirt running down the bathroom wall, and stains everywhere on furnishings. We made a formal complaint about the conditions on the first evening but were told that one is to expect this level dirt since the villas are in the forest. When comparing the 2300£ price we had paid with the fact that this resort claims to provide 5-star luxury, An Lam fell short of our previous experiences (in and outside forests) of similarly rated hotels. The obscenely rude manager told us that we did not know the standards of other 5-star hotels and if we were unhappy this reflected poor judgement on our side. However, it was agreed that housekeeping would clean the villas again and a fresh start and review with the manager would be had the next morning. The manager also explained that up to 7 people stayed in these houses, so we should understand that there is some degree of wear and tear, and they were also busy due to the local holidays and to deliver the service we expected had been difficult. Following this, one villa was allegedly cleaned (why only one is still unclear). Nothing had changed in the morning, and the pictures uploaded were taken following the 'extra' clean and subsequent bi-daily clean. The manager never came on day two for the agreed 'fresh start'. In the evening he walked straight past us and had to leave 'on urgent matters and would not be able to talk to us' even though he'd had all day. After staying two nights in the rank villas, one party was moved and only by further pressure was the other party moved also for this final night. The head butler finally reviewed the houses and agreed with us that the villas were of an unacceptable substandard. On the morning of day 2 because of the substandard conditions and the inability of staff to cope in a timely manner with these obvious shortcomings, we asked for a partial refund. The manager told us he would speak to the booking company to arrange it. At 10pm the manager pushed the butler to us to settle the bill for our stat. Now, the manager told us he was unfortunately not able to agree a refund himself' as he could not get hold of the booking company; but he would like us to pay the whole bill. Through our own effort we then managed to get hold of the booking company because the manager 'could not', and even when he was on the phone with them he 'could not make settlement for a refund' (10 minutes before we had to leave). In this discussion with the booking company, he claimed to have upgraded us - but we had offered to move into any clean accommodation of the level that we had booked. We also pointed out that one party had had only 18 hours and the other 12 hours in these new villas (out of three days). Furthermore, he protested that we had been given 4 buffet dinners and sparkling wine (worth 7.25£ in our local supermarket). Of course, this has nothing to do with the fact that we paid for a 5-star experience and got unclean 3-star level (at best) accommodation and 1-star service. Also, the booking company wrote a copy of the mail that the hotel had sent about our stay, when confronting the manager; he protested he knew nothing of it. The manager did not understand that we would have preferred honesty from them, saying on arrival: you have a choice of cancelling or moving into these villas that we know are substandard (which they directly admitted to verbally on day three when someone senior finally reviewed the villas). In the end (10 minutes before checkout), the manager insisted that we should leave a signed letter agreeing to hotel expenses, and claimed it was all out of their reach to refund part of the costs despite the fact that we were able to have it sorted before leaving (the manager claimed that they couldn't get to speak to the booking company when in fact we as guests could very easily). In fact, they had 60 hours from we first complained and failed to address the issues raised, and though I know the manager will disagree, I would not expect any of the above in a 5-star resort! There are some other aspects that were not up to standard where before booking you should ask yourself if you would be happy with this: -there is unrestricted access to your hotel room, because you cannot lock any aspect of your house when leaving it. This is quite unusual to be forced to trust fellow guests and all staff in a large resort. -Paying high rates but don't get the true 5-star experience because the villa is in a forest and the team is too busy to clean the houses -upon arrival we filled out forms about how we wanted this service to be, and then when actually using it we waited 90 minutes and three phone calls for the butler to bring us four gin and tonics. When finally successful, these arrived in the form of two cans and four shots of gin in the same drinking glass covered by cling film for us to mix without appropriate glasses, ice or lemon. This was the end of our expectations to this service. -$40 per person pick up per way consisted of us wheeling our own bags though the airport car park unguided to an undefined location, being transported with other parties in a minibus like on a cheap package holiday from the 80'ies, and we arrived at the jetty with 30 other guests in complete chaos. We had an awful experience in the hill top villas and are still not happy with what we have paid to stay there. We have had our hotel expenses stricken off (agreed by the manger before we left after a huge argument). The expenses amount to less than one night's stay only, and we would rather have paid the full amount for an appropriate accommodation and service.

title: Un très beau site
text: Une plage magnifique, au calme, le lieu est parfait pour quelques jours de repos loin de l'agitation touristique. Le propriétaire Français crée petit a petit un établissement idéal pour les vacanciers qui recherchent une plage qui n'est pas encore dégradée comme dans d'autres lieux au Viêtnam. Trois points qui ont peut être leur importance pour certains voyageurs: les tarifs sont élevés pour le type de chambre mais le site vaut le prix payé. Comme évoqué par d'autres voyageurs, cet hôtel n'est pas fait pour les personnes adeptes d'un haut niveau de sécurité. Non pas qu'il y ait des problèmes mais simplement car la salle de bain extérieure donne sur la chambre mais sans possibilité de fermer la porte par ex. Cela ne m'a posé aucun problème pour ma part. La promiscuité, du moins pour la chambre 1, qui est mitoyenne avec le dortoir et les chambres sont communicantes au niveau du plafond. Ma 1ere nuit durant laquelle le dortoir était occupé a donc été plus "tardive". Ce sont vraiment des petits bémols comparés à la qualité du séjour dans cet hotel, à la gentillesse des employés et à la plage propre et bien équipée en transats et parasols. Je recommanderais sans hésiter cet hôtel.

title: Thuong Ton
text: Excellent hotel, breakfast is so good too many choices with high quality foods, the pool is incredible, my room has very good view with the private pool we watching the sunrise from our room perfect view. We will comeback again
en_review: Excellent hotel, breakfast is so good too many choices with high quality foods, the pool is incredible, my room has very good view with the private pool we watching the sunrise from our room perfect view. We will comeback again

title: Dịch vụ tâm trí của khách sạn 4 sao này
text: Tôi đã được thông báo rằng đây chỉ là một khách sạn 4 sao ở thị trấn này bởi hướng dẫn viên du lịch. Kích thước của nó, tất nhiên, là tương đương với khách sạn 4 sao, nhưng hãy để tôi chỉ ra nếu tâm trí dịch vụ của họ xứng đáng có nhiều ngôi sao. Khi tôi được hướng dẫn trong phòng, tôi nghĩ mình đang ở trong căn phòng vắng vẻ một thời gian dài. Hai phòng bổ sung đã được hiển thị, nhưng tất cả các phòng đều có mùi bụi do không có ai ở đó trong một thời gian dài hoặc không được làm sạch đúng cách trước đây. Dù sao tôi đã được đưa ra phòng thứ hai (# 1212). Sáng hôm sau tôi xuống tầng một để ăn sáng trên sàn đá cẩm thạch. Chỉ cần tưởng tượng khách sạn này được bao phủ bằng đá cẩm thạch ở khắp mọi nơi (có thể đây là lý do tại sao tôi ngửi thấy mùi bụi bao giờ tôi đã đi bên trong khách sạn). Khi tôi trở về phòng của mình sau bữa sáng, hãy tưởng tượng những gì tôi đã chứng kiến. Nhân viên dọn phòng dọn dẹp phòng của tôi trước khi tôi kiểm tra căn phòng, tất cả đồ đạc cá nhân và vật có giá trị của tôi vẫn ở trong phòng. Tôi hỏi người đã cho phép vào phòng, nhưng anh không thể trả lời. Tất cả những gì anh ta vặn lại tôi là anh ta là một nhân viên dọn phòng và anh ấy đang làm công việc của mình. Khi tôi hỏi anh ta nếu anh ta nhìn thấy tất cả các túi xách, anh ấy đã trả lời. Tuy nhiên, anh ta vẫn tiếp tục dọn phòng mà không cần kiểm tra với quầy lễ tân nếu khách đã trả phòng hay không. Khi tôi có một cuộc trò chuyện với người quản lý phía trước của nhiệm vụ, các nhân viên dường như bối rối để tìm hiểu những gì đã xảy ra, nhưng không thực hiện bất kỳ hành động nào. Ngay cả người hướng dẫn viên cũng bận rộn bảo vệ phe họ, không phải bên tôi. Đó là ngày 23 tháng 12 năm 2017.

title: Heerlijke spot met behulpzaam en lief personeel
text: Heerlijke spot om tot rust te komen in de water bungalow. Er was fruit geregeld en het ontbijt de volgende dag was ook lekker! Werden vriendelijk onthaald, scooter huren was ook direct mogelijk en konden voor vragen bij de dames terecht. Klein nadeel is het bed/ beddengoed, wat niet erg comfortabel ligt en erg heet is. Voor de rest zeker een aanrader om een nacht op het water te verblijven en te genieten van de rust!
en_review: Heerlijke spot om tot rust te komen in de water bungalow. Er was fruit geregeld en het ontbijt de volgende dag was ook lekker! Werden vriendelijk onthaald, scooter huren was ook direct mogelijk en konden voor vragen bij de dames terecht. Klein nadeel is het bed/ beddengoed, wat niet erg comfortabel ligt en erg heet is. Voor de rest zeker een aanrader om een nacht op het water te verblijven en te genieten van de rust!

title: 나쁘진 않으나...
text: 예약할 때 non smoking으로 요청했고, 프런트에서도 non-smoking이라고 이야기를 해 주었으나, 방에서 담배냄새가 너무 심했습니다. 더더군다나 6층 휴게실처럼 되어있는 곳에 재털이 가득 피우고 남은 꽁초가 채워져있을 정도였어요. 체크인 하자마자 냄새가 너무 심해서 프런트에 이야기 했더니 air-refresh를 해 준다고 하고서는 직원이 와서 탈취제?같은 것을 뿌려주고 갔습니다. 그러나 그때뿐 시간이 지나니 다시 담배냄새가 올라오고 너무 늦은시간이라 어쩔 수 없이 코와 입을 손수건으로 감싸고 잠들었네요. 다음날 아침에는 냄새가 더 심해있어서 프런트에 방을 바꿔달라고 해서 10층으로 옮겼더니, 그 방에선 냄새가 안나더라구요. 혹시 가실 분들 non- smoking을 원하시면 절대 6층에선 투숙하지 마세요.

title: Un peu vieillissant
text: Bel hotel, végétation luxuriante, chambre sombre mais agréables toutes en briques, petite terrasse. Salle de bain sans intérêt. Literie dure à la vietnamienne. Grande piscine sympathique. Spa agréable. A 10 minutes de la citadelle en taxi Restaurants ok, petits déjeuners moyens choix restreint
en_review: Bel hotel, végétation luxuriante, chambre sombre mais agréables toutes en briques, petite terrasse. Salle de bain sans intérêt. Literie dure à la vietnamienne. Grande piscine sympathique. Spa agréable. A 10 minutes de la citadelle en taxi Restaurants ok, petits déjeuners moyens choix restreint

title: 3 days, 2 nights
text: Dit was een erg leuke ervaring! Deze familie is erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Ze doen hun best om Engels te spreken en maken het lekkerste eten voor je klaar! De kamers zijn netjes en verzorgd. Zeker de moeite waard!
en_review: Dit was een erg leuke ervaring! Deze familie is erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam. Ze doen hun best om Engels te spreken en maken het lekkerste eten voor je klaar! De kamers zijn netjes en verzorgd. Zeker de moeite waard!

title: Thật sự rất tệ
text: Tối thứ 7 tuần trước ngày 13/8/2016 mình có đặt một phòng standard ở khách sạn với giá 1triệu6 2 người ở. Khi mình nhận phòng thì cảm giác đầu tiên khi bước vào phòng là sàn nhà bẩn, tủ cũ , giường cũ mùi hôi hám bốc lên quả thật như nó cả thế kỉ chưa có người sử dụng. Tiếp đến là nhà tắm không có khăn tắm và bình nóng lạnh thì hỏng trong khi thời tiết ở Tam Đảo thì khá là lạnh kể từ 5 giờ chiều trở đi. Nhân viên phục vụ không có đồng phục, quản lí thái độ rất kém. Tối hôm mình ngủ thì phòng mình ở còn bị dột 3,4 chỗ. Wifi thì không thể sử dụng vì rất chậm. Chưa kể đến là phòng còn có kiến và mình còn mất cả ô vì hôm đó mưa to. Cuối cùng là hệ thống đèn và phong thủy cũng như cách trang trí phòng thật sự làm cho khách rất bất an. Hôm đó mình đi tham quan thực sự rất mệt mà về phòng ở ngay đầu giường có cái đĩa rất kì quái. Không gian phòng hẹp, hôi hám, 2 thanh chắn ngay giữa phòng và mình bị đập mấy lần. Quả thật đặt phòng ở Khách sạn này hôm đó là điều tồi tệ nhất trong du lịch Tam Đảo của mình ngày hôm đó. Chắc chắn sẽ không quay trở lại khách sạn đáng sợ và tồi tệ này.

title: Trải nghiệm ở RADISSON BLU
text: Mình nhận phòng nhân viên nhiệt tình nhẹ nhàng. cũng giúp đỡ hết mức có thể. Nhưng mình thấy dịch vụ gửi giữ đồ và thanh toán trả phòng có chút vấn đề. Mong các bạn sẽ cải thiện hơn. Khi nhận phòng mình có đặt tiền nhưng lúc ra thanh toán trả phòng thì nhân viên báo là đã trả tiền cọc rồi thực tế là chưa trả. Sau đó mình phải đợi để được thanh toán lại tiền cọc.

title: Nice resort! Good staff!
text: When I arrived I was picked up by a guy in a nice truck. He drove very carefully, what was a big plus after all the traffic in the rest of Vietnam. Ha, and the first thing he did when we where in the car he opened western music (Christmas songs from George Michael) from his mobile phone to the radio, guess just to please me. After arrival they give me a shelter which was quite comfortable. But after a few hour the sound of the little insects makes me crazy. I complained and immediately they give me an other house, far away from the noise. That was perfect, it was also an free upgrade. The staff was friendly, the food was good, the information they provide is good, I could easily rent a motorbike at the reception, the house was clean, the pool was cozy and clean. What else do you need on the island to get some rest??? For me alone a few days to relax this was the right choose. If possible I will come back.

title: Good Location
text: My housemate and I decided to stay at a lodging near one of the beautiful beaches, Bai Sao. We were not disappointed with the beauty of the beach. The lodging, around $55 a night, was not bad either. The bungalow was nice, modern, and big. Inside they had a king size bed with side table lamps. We slept well during our three night stay there.Tourists from different part of Phu Quoc usually arrive to swim in the day time and leave when the sun sets. So lodgers can get to enjoy the uncrowded place in the evening. The downside of staying there would be the overpriced food and very slow service. If you're not a foodie or into bar hopping and would just like to spend most, if not all your time in the beach, then this is a good choice.

title: Интересно тем, кто с детьми
text: Доброго времени суток! Отдыхали с семьёй в конце апреля - начало мая. Постараюсь быть максимально объективной. Понравилось: быстро заселили, ждать особо не пришлось. Просторные номера, сами корпуса новые. Питание разнообразное, есть морепродукты, мясо, фрукты. До тех, кто любит анимацию, она не плохая, люди были довольные пенными дискотеками, конкурсами. Везде питьевая вода на территории отеля. Много лежаков на пляже, на басссейне. Минусы: очень шумно для отеля, который позиционированирует себя как семейный. Сначала поселили в номер с видом на дискотеку. Попросили переселить, тк маленький ребёнок. Переселили в номер над всеми кондерами. Не танцы, так что-то постоянно противное гудит (просите корпус В). Гулять особо негде. Маленькая территория и вся под наклоном. Убирают плохо номера. Пыль лежит, стекла вообще никто не протирает. Валяются чёрные волосы. Постель не меняют. Полотенца уставшие. А теперь самый большой минус: ДЕТКИ БЕСКОНЕЧНО БОЛЕЮТ. Из 10 дней отпуска 5 мы провели с температурой, сыпью и рвотой, затем понос (3 из которых лежали в госпитале). Диагноз Коксаки, ротовирус... А может и то и другое. Детки с высокой температурой и сыпью. В ресторане очень хорошо видно пятнистые ножки и ручки. Местный доктор говорит «я ничего не знаю». А кажется так: «мне ничего нельзя говорить». Таксисты удивляются. Сколько едут со Свандора и соседнего Дессоле. В больнице если русский, то с синим браслетом Swandor. И это не первый месяц далеко. Когда мы вернулись с больницы, бассейн был оцеплен. Видимо подняли панику. Но это ничего не изменит. Чтобы это прекратилось надо закрывать на карантин... болеют даже те, кто не ходит в игровые и не купается в бассейне. Очень жаль, что у руководства и сотрудников отеля нигде даже на секунду не просыпается совесть, сколько малышей из за них намучились, а у родителей испорчен был отдых, как у нас...

title: 5* resort but feel like 3*
text: Really disappointed with booking service and food. We booked 5 rooms at Dis1, and waited for 5 days to get "maintenance plan" or something like that. And they suggested us change to resort & golf. We chosed and booked 2 villas at Vinpearl Resort & Golf. But, finally, they set 2 villas at Dis1 for us without any explain or apology. We asked them why, but the answer was unacceptable. And, our slots (booking at resort & golf) were free, no one used them. :( Each villa has 1 pool, but ít's so small, like a bath. It's suitable for 130cm~150cm kids,

title: Clean, cheap and welcoming!
text: Cheap, clean and welcoming stay - Tong (homestay brother) spoke very good English. He organized a morning tour to Mekong floating markets, land markets, coconut candy factory and honey factory for 300, 000 dong pp. Food was delicious - Happy family pancake highly recommended. Great location - dinner area and hammocks on decking overlooking the Mekong Delta The only downside to our stay was the trouble of getting there; we caught a local bus to Dong Phu (bus driver didn't want to drive all the way to dong phu so we were told to get off the bus and get on his mates motorbike to dong phu bus station). This became quite confusing as nobody spoke English so it was hard to communicate where we were going/staying even though we showed them the address. Not many tourists around the area. Would be easier if you have a mobile phone to call the guest house when you arrive in Dong Phu and they will organize transport from the bus station

title: It is ok
text: We had 1 suite bedroom with pool, nice view and spacious. Breakfast the best I would say ok only but service has to improve a lot more. Pool side and beach cafe are ok. The beach is so so and just golden rough sand. An hour from airport. Tried the spa, ok.

title: Một nơi nghĩ dưỡng giành cho gia đình
text: Tui và gia đình đã ở đây được ba hôm và những kỹ niệm của gia đình tui cùng với khu nghĩ dưỡng là rất rất là thoải mái và tuyệt vời,đặc biển nhân viên ở đây cực kỳ dễ thương và nhiệt tình,😀😀😀😀😀😀😀
hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Managed by Accor

title: Nice resort, nice people.
text: It was a very nice holiday in Hoi An we had. The resort is impressive and our butler Huong is such a nice young lady who tried to make our stay as pleasant as possible and at the same time tried to give us privacy. Daily laundry, complimentary cars (nice cars) and abundant supply of drinking water added to our pleasant stay. Everyone at the resort were ready with their greetings. The fitness centre is nice with good machines. We were upgraded to a two bedroom villa because all one bedroom villas were full. The living room size is impressive although we felt a bit lonely by being just three of us. If I may give some suggestions, it would be nice to provide some mossie repellant and after sun lotion. Also, probably upgrade your shampoo? We will definitely be back in the near future. Please convey our sincere gratitude to your staff.
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An

The fitness centre is nice with good machines. We were upgraded to a two bedroom villa because all one bedroom villas were full. The living room size is impressive although we felt a bit lonely by being just three of us. If I may give some suggestions, it would be nice to provide some mossie repellant and after sun lotion. Also, probably upgrade your shampoo? We will definitely be back in the near future. Please convey our sincere gratitude to your staff.

title: Tuyệt vời homestay!
text: Chúng tôi đã có một kỳ nghỉ thực sự tuyệt vời! Tốt homestay với nhân viên tốt đẹp, thân thiện và hữu ích. Chúng tôi đã làm một tour du lịch rừng với một hướng dẫn viên địa phương, chúng tôi chắc chắn sẽ không bao giờ quên bởi vì nó là tuyệt vời như vậy, cô đã rất hiểu biết về vị trí của mình. title: not the best impression
text: We wanted to get out of HCMC during the crazy days around new year & booked 5 days at FCL. On the first impression, it's a humble place with a very friendly owner. We been welcomed very friendly, had humble lunch & been listening to the options of encountering the part I the following days. So far so good. The first day we had a boat ride & the following morning we booked the early Gibbon Trekking, where we been provided with a breakfast to go. The owner brought us to the ferry and introduced us to the guide; how was also very kind and on top very knowledgeable. However, I came to understand that the ơner booked a lower priced tour, but asked the guide to "show us Gibbons anyway"; on top of that I been told that our son (4 years old) should have been free, but he charges us 50% (same for the boat Ride) Worse to mention that the place might be good for a night stay, BUT if you stay longer you shouldn't expect any (any!!!) service in your room. We had to ask for fresh towels and (YES) toilet paper. Talking about food, the breakfast was rather minimalistic, bread with cheese & honey are not really a satisfactory start into the day, and the other meals are fresh (mostly vegetables from the local garden) but very low on protein. While the lady who cooks is making rounds to double check the satisfaction, she doesn't cope well will requests & reacts rather stubborn(ish) if you dare not to compliment her. We ended up exploring the alternatives in the village for the rest of our stay, as the alternative was rather pitiful. Don't get me wrong, if you look for a place for a night or two, perfect(?!?!?) but I would not recommend it for more than 2 nights. Never the less, waking up at NY morning (5:15h) and listening to the sounds of Gibbons in the neighborhoods is great. And if the owner gets a grip on his hospitality skills (as he has the right personality) this place could become something.

title: ein besonderer Ort
text: Es gibt hier nur ein Gästezimmer; es ist wirklich eine besondere Atmosphäre, die hier herrscht und es ist ein besonderes Erlebnis hier zu Gast zu sein. Man erhält einen ziemlich unverfälschten Einblick in den Alltag in einem vietnamesischen Dorf (mitunter ist es ziemlich laut). Die Besitzer stehen einem mit Rat und Tat zur Seite, wenn es darum geht, die Insel zu erkunden - man bekommt tolle Tipps und Empfehlungen, wie man die Insel auf eigene Faust oder mit ihnen zusammen erkunden kann. Last but not least: Das Essen in der villa Cua Can ist ausgesprochen gut!

title: away from the crowds
text: Phu Quoc island is quickly turning into another Phuket , but there are still quiet and peacefull locations, with hardly anybody on the beach and with an over flow pool that is total bliss with vieuw over the ocean. Phu Quoc Eco Beach resort has spacious rooms, with even bigger open air bathroons, and large double beds. The rooms are all located in bungalows, some attached, some free standing, and all with a lovely balconny. The small beach has a sort of tidal pool, and an open part as well. A 5 min walk, pass the neighbouring small resort will bring you do a long beach with just nobody on it ! The massage and pedicure small building on the beach is just what you want for a wonderfull massage . The restaurant gives a great breakfast buffet , but lunch and dinner needs some working on. Menu is limitted, and main dishes came without vegetables. Manager is very accomodating and eager to please his quest .
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng Phú Quốc Eco

title: 0 Sterne zum 3 Sterne Preis
text: jungle Beach könnte ein schöner Ort sein, leider ist das Gelände und die Hütten ziemlich runtergekommen. Ich habe nichts gegen einfache Hütten - gepflegt sollten sie dennoch sein. Überall liegt Zeug rum das ganze Areals wirkt leider ziemlich verwahrlost. Eine Nacht kostet pro Person 600Tausend Dong, genauso viel wie eine gute Midrange Übernachtung. in dem Preis sind 3 Mahlzeiten inkludiert. Nicht besonders, nichts schlechtes aber eben auch nicht richtig gut. Für den Preis enttäuschend.

title: Wonderful stay
text: Huge clap to Fusion Cam Ranh Resort, we have been pleased by everything there! 🎉👏🏼⠀ ⠀ The location is ideal, as the resort is located 5 minutes from the airport, right onto the beach. However the resort doesn’t spoils the scenery; the houses are built in a very respectful way, and from the beach you can only see a forest when looking at the resort, which is a huge plus to us ! 🏝⠀ ⠀ The rooms are outstanding in terms of design and view, and as the resort is quite modern, the appliances such as the AC are in really good conditions.⠀ Service is amazing, the staff is well trained and will give you as much attention as you need, without being too pushy.⠀ ⠀ The free shuttle, yoga, massages everyday… also really helped to give a great review ! And this applies to every guest ! 🥇

And this applies to every guest ! 🥇

title: Very good place and service in decent price!
text: Big rooms! Very clean! Very nice bathroom! The service was excellent, the girl at the reception helped us in any questions and gived an ideas to activities. The only disadvantage: very hot at lobby, not enough fans (but the air conditioner at the room was very good!)
en_review: Big rooms! Very clean! Very nice bathroom! The service was excellent, the girl at the reception helped us in any questions and gived an ideas to activities. The only disadvantage: very hot at lobby, not enough fans (but the air conditioner at the room was very good!)

title: Hotel OK mais...
text: Situation excentrée à 3 km du centre, architecture horrible, et les chambres ne valent pas 50 0 000 dongs ! Préférez le nouvel hotel A1, idéalement sitúé dans une rue transversale calme entre la colline du meme nom et le cimetìere Vietminh ; pour un peu moins cher (490 000 dong), les chambres sont beaucoup mieux

title: A great hotel
text: A great hotel with so many great and great facilities. I really enjoyed this hotel because it has so many beautiful scenes. Not only that, the staff also serve very well and thoughtfully to customers like us. Truly this is a great hotel. My family and I are extremely satisfied with the facilities and service as well as this hotel.

title: pleasant homestay in a magnificent environment
text: Found the homestay when riding a bicycle through the area. Without reservation able to stay for the night. Thanh, the daughter of the owner is a great hostess and showed me around Ben Tre City in the evening. Eventhough 4 km from the centre, it is very doable with the bicycle or bike. Included in the price is an extensive dinner and breakfast. The homestay is basic but ideal for travelers who want an of the beaten track south Vietnam experience and do not long for a busy nightlife.

title: Phù hợp cho nghỉ dưỡng
text: Villa thiết kế đẹp và sang trọng. Không khí thoáng đãng với nhiều cây xanh. Đi lại bằng xe điện nhanh chóng, thuận tiện. Dịch vụ nghỉ dưỡng khá đa dạng. Điểm trừ là flamingo đồ ăn chưa được phong phú và tương xứng với 5 sao. Xe đưa đón không được đỗ tại Nhà Hát Lớn nhưng vẫn có trong lịch trình điểm đón và được đăng kí, đến khi gặp công an lại trách nhẹ khách hàng.
