title: Just warning
text: I decided to take time for review about this place, because I had really bad experience to stay there. Don't get me wrong. Place is very nice. Its in small village surrounded by pomelo gardens and local houses. You can really feel countryside there. Our problems started after coming to My Hoa Homestay. 3 people take us from main road to this place. After coming there, we wanted to see our 2 booked bungalows (after whole day trip). On welcome we got watermelon and we wait for someone who is manager there or at least speak English. After 30 minutes of waiting I called to the guy from card, and he told me they don't have more space, because more tourists came before us. After long discussion by phone, he told me to wait another 30 minutes. After some time, small boy introduced us to this place, he told us about situation and he was kind of mediator between us and "the guy in the phone". It was really not professional. I felt a little sorry about boy, because he was not a person to whom I should complain. He was great - he should be manager there for sure. Then he showed us our room . And again I had to deal with another guy working there. I showed him my reservation on emailbox, so they can believe me that I paid fro 2 bangalows. Finally they agreed to return me money for one bungalow. But after more than 1 hour of dealing with mysterious guy in the phone I lost my mood for anything:( I saw many good reviews about this place and I was really excited about staying there. I have an idea about homestay. How it can look like. But the way they deal with customer was very disappointing. One more thing - its not easy to get there, if you don't take taxi. Motorbike taxi drivers will take you from main road for free when you get there. When you leave they will charge you 30k for person.

title: My Tho, Rang Dong Hotel on the river
text: The Hotel is good hotel... but when you arrive It is important which you go inside in the hotel ... You do not speak to the men outside which want to sell you tour or minibus to saigon. They have sold us a minibus direct to saigon but it was not true,. They left us on the street and they have stopped a bus for us a line bus which gone to the saigon bus station very far from the saigon centre.... So we payed 4 $ for a service that does not exist.... and we would could take the same bus for less of 1$... You do not speak with the men outside are not good people

title: homestay tệ nhất ở việt nam
text: phòng trông suy đồi với rất nhiều thứ cần sửa chữa. cửa lưới chống muỗi có rất nhiều lỗ. phòng hơi thoáng, mong đợi (như tôi) những con dơi bay quanh giường bạn vào ban đêm và rất nhiều muỗi. wifi không hoạt động Ngay cả tôi cũng đã nói chuyện với chủ sở hữu trước để chắc chắn rằng chúng tôi sẽ gặp nhau, bởi vì tôi đã được chỉ định làm trưởng đoàn du lịch để tìm các điểm tổ chức các tour du lịch và tôi muốn có một số mẹo để làm smtg khác bên cạnh các tour du lịch tùy chỉnh của 'bánh tráng '/' kẹo dừa ', v.v. ngay khi tôi đến, anh ấy nói anh ấy sẽ tổ chức đám cưới trong ngày (có thể nói trước đó). vì vậy hãy nói với tôi 'sáng hôm sau! '. chắc chắn, cho đến 11 giờ anh ta không ở đó và ngay cả khi tôi gặp anh ta, mất 5 phút trước khi rời đi mãi mãi. Anh không thể quan tâm. thái độ của "tôi không đưa ra một sh * t". Tất cả giá đều được định giá quá cao (nếu bạn đã đến các điểm tương tự khác trước khi bạn hiểu). toàn bộ thái độ của nơi này và những người khác có vẻ hơi mệt mỏi khi làm công việc đó. Hầu như không có lựa chọn nào cho thực phẩm trong một binh lính, vì vậy họ vượt trội, thậm chí với tôi vấn đề thực sự là chả giò đông lạnh (bạn có thể hỏi bất cứ điều gì bạn muốn, nhưng làm ơn, cung cấp chất lượng ít nhất), những thứ tồi tệ nhất tôi từng có. phản ánh thái độ chung, bạn có thể đoán rằng không có nhiều tình yêu trong thực phẩm đó. nếu anh ta không ở đó, tất cả các tour anh ta điều hành sẽ cùng với một người nào đó quanh quẩn tại chỗ, vì vậy hầu như không có chỉ dẫn / tiếng Anh. họ sẽ chỉ và ném một số từ khóa. một lần nữa, các tour du lịch là quá đắt, đặc biệt là về chất lượng. Có rất nhiều homestay xung quanh (và ở Bến Tre) với sự rung cảm đáng yêu, với những món ăn siêu đặc biệt và với những người thực sự quan tâm đến việc kinh doanh của họ và sẵn sàng làm thêm một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời (và không phải trả giá quá cao). Điều này, có lẽ là tốt một lần trong một khoảng cách quá khứ, kinh nghiệm của tôi cảm thấy như một sự lột xác chất lượng xấu.

'. chắc chắn, cho đến 11 giờ anh ta không ở đó và ngay cả khi tôi gặp anh ta, mất 5 phút trước khi rời đi mãi mãi. Anh không thể quan tâm. thái độ của "tôi không đưa ra một sh * t". Tất cả giá đều được định giá quá cao (nếu bạn đã đến các điểm tương tự khác trước khi bạn hiểu). toàn bộ thái độ của nơi này và những người khác có vẻ hơi mệt mỏi khi làm công việc đó. Hầu như không có lựa chọn nào cho thực phẩm trong một binh lính, vì vậy họ vượt trội, thậm chí với tôi vấn đề thực sự là chả giò đông lạnh (bạn có thể hỏi bất cứ điều gì bạn muốn, nhưng làm ơn, cung cấp chất lượng ít nhất), những thứ tồi tệ nhất tôi từng có. phản ánh thái độ chung, bạn có thể đoán rằng không có nhiều tình yêu trong thực phẩm đó. nếu anh ta không ở đó, tất cả các tour anh ta điều hành sẽ cùng với một người nào đó quanh quẩn tại chỗ, vì vậy hầu như không có chỉ dẫn / tiếng Anh. họ sẽ chỉ và ném một số từ khóa. một lần nữa, các tour du lịch là quá đắt, đặc biệt là về chất lượng. Có rất nhiều homestay xung quanh (và ở Bến Tre) với sự rung cảm đáng yêu, với những món ăn siêu đặc biệt và với những người thực sự quan tâm đến việc kinh doanh của họ và sẵn sàng làm thêm một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời (và không phải trả giá quá cao). Điều này, có lẽ là tốt một lần trong một khoảng cách quá khứ, kinh nghiệm của tôi cảm thấy như một sự lột xác chất lượng xấu.

title: Very downgraded hotel in Cao Lanh
text: The hotel is 3* officially but it is not as good as a new 2* hotel because the room is running down, water is leaking and the smell in the room is terrible. It seems that the housekeeping here does not know how to make the room. Buffet breakfast is OK. Hotel is downtown and easy to access to other places in the evening. I am not recommend this hotel.
en_review: The hotel is 3* officially but it is not as good as a new 2* hotel because the room is running down, water is leaking and the smell in the room is terrible. It seems that the housekeeping here does not know how to make the room. Buffet breakfast is OK. Hotel is downtown and easy to access to other places in the evening. I am not recommend this hotel.

title: 中心部から離れているが新しいホテル
text: 新しく清潔。隣接する建物にはスーパーがあり、中心部から少し離れているが、これから発展する可能性のある新規開発地域。朝食はベトナム料理がメイン。
hotelName: Khách Sạn Mường Thanh Luxury Cà Mau
en_review: 新しく清潔。隣接する建物にはスーパーがあり、中心部から少し離れているが、これから発展する可能性のある新規開発地域。朝食はベトナム料理がメイン。

title: Business trip
text: This is great spot to take a business trip in Vietnam. The room is spacious, clean and amazing view. Pleasant smell at the hotel along with supermarket in hotel, laundry, pool, comfortable beds and breakfast buffet and all great, along with the location. Helpful and friendly staff especially Ms Hue, one of the team leader in The Diplomatic Bar

Pleasant smell at the hotel along with supermarket in hotel, laundry, pool, comfortable beds and breakfast buffet and all great, along with the location. Helpful and friendly staff especially Ms Hue, one of the team leader in The Diplomatic Bar

title: Amazing place!!!!
text: Our best experience in Vietnam so far!!! Mr linh is very friendly and his place just felt like home!!! He also organizes some tours which are great! We did the 2-day trekking and loved it!!! I will come back again for sure and highly recommend the place!
en_review: Our best experience in Vietnam so far!!! Mr linh is very friendly and his place just felt like home!!! He also organizes some tours which are great! We did the 2-day trekking and loved it!!! I will come back again for sure and highly recommend the place!

title: Mường Thanh Quảng Trị
text: Khách sạn ổn nhất ở Quảng Trị. Nhân viên thân thiện. Phòng sạch sẽ, view đẹp, cách âm tốt. khách sạn ngay đường chính đôi lúc nghe tiếng còi của xe tải. Bữa sáng có các món nấu nóng ngon. Hầm giữ xe khá tối. Tiện ích như phòng gym hồ bơi cần cải thiện.
hotelName: Khách sạn Mường Thanh Grand Quảng Trị

title: Wasn't the best
text: The hotel is beautiful.. massive building. Lovely staff who were very helpful. Bedrooms were very nice. Unfortunatly the food wasnt great and we had no hot water. The hotel was a long journey from the train station and we got a taxi who hadnt a clue where we were going (not ghe hotels fault). We never got to the pool unforunatly but it looked beautiful.

The hotel was a long journey from the train station and we got a taxi who hadnt a clue where we were going (not ghe hotels fault). We never got to the pool unforunatly but it looked beautiful.

title: Just great
text: I think it is the most remote resort from the airport and the center but this what gives it its uniqueness. You can rent a motorbike there (very affordable price) to visit the island. The beach is amazing and what gives it more charm are the fisherman village which is a 100 m away. The owner and the staff are very welcoming and helpful. The food is very good. The snorkeling equipment and DVDs are for free usage. It is a small resort with only 8 bungalows. The bungalows are spacey, clean, well equipped (A/c and Wifi) and comfy with a nice view on the gorgeous beach. Very good value for money and I advise you to go there.

title: Unique, first class but not for all
text: Beautiful facility and grounds, excellent service. Rooms are unusual, but worth it, large, modern with great amenities. Easy wi fi access and charging portal. Always love the outdoor shower. Good, not great, breakfast buffet. Great spa, unique and beautiful set up. Every room has a couple of bikes to help get around the property if that is your preference. The room set up may not be for all, but we loved it.
hotelName: Khách sạn Nam Hải Hội An
en_review: Beautiful facility and grounds, excellent service. Rooms are unusual, but worth it, large, modern with great amenities. Easy wi fi access and charging portal. Always love the outdoor shower. Good, not great, breakfast buffet. Great spa, unique and beautiful set up. Every room has a couple of bikes to help get around the property if that is your preference. The room set up may not be for all, but we loved it.

title: Nothing except beautiful landscape
text: Stayed here two nights in March to do some birding. Low season as it is very foggy this time of year so there were very few visitors. Well built initially, but they are doing nothing to maintain the place. Mildew in the bathroom, broken electrical switches, empty light bulb sockets. We had to ask them to make up our room. Restaurant served expensive, poorly prepared food which was generally cold by the time it got to our table. Still the best in town despite all this. Hope they get the message.
en_review: Stayed here two nights in March to do some birding. Low season as it is very foggy this time of year so there were very few visitors. Well built initially, but they are doing nothing to maintain the place. Mildew in the bathroom, broken electrical switches, empty light bulb sockets. We had to ask them to make up our room. Restaurant served expensive, poorly prepared food which was generally cold by the time it got to our table. Still the best in town despite all this. Hope they get the message.

title: 2 Days Trekking in the Pu Luong area
text: We spent two night here. The bungalow was lovely and the food was delicious. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Twice there was no electricity which was a problem because it was very hot and humid. Only fans, no AC...otherwise was perfect. Great treks in villages around. Beautiful views of rice terraces.
en_review: We spent two night here. The bungalow was lovely and the food was delicious. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Twice there was no electricity which was a problem because it was very hot and humid. Only fans, no AC...otherwise was perfect. Great treks in villages around. Beautiful views of rice terraces.

title: Disappointing; focus on wrong kind of details
text: A bit of a disappointment after seeing the pictures and reviews online... This place focuses on the wrong kind of details. We for instance would have loved to exchange the jacuzzi and the TV with internet and karaoke function, for a properly functioning and less noisy AC (at least we would then have gotten some good sleep) and for door openings that would be covered to prevent so many mosquitoes from entering the room. If you are travelling on your own or as a young couple, and can handle the heat in the room, this place is ok. It is basic and small, but it is clean. We however do not recommend this to families with young children and pregnant women, as the room is so small, very warm, full of mosquitoes, and the hotel does not provide for a baby cot. There are also no high chairs available in the restaurant. The staff's English is rather limited so it is difficult to communicate (that is of course part of travelling, but a bit of training could help raising the standard to at least enable some basic communication). As the hotel did not meet our expectations we decided to cancel the second night and move elsewhere. The hotel handled this correctly, and offered us another room. As the reception had not been occupied for quite a while earlier on (they let us wait for a significant amount of time and we had to ask a couple of times for the receptionist to come over) we had however already decided to book another hotel as we wanted to avoid running the risk of no other hotel being available.

title: Tourist trail...
text: Had planned to stay here for 1 night but changed my mind after arriving at the farmstay. Don't be fooled by the lonely planet / trip advisor reviews, having travelled Vietnam for a while I can confirm this is not the 'real Vietnam' experience. Thanks to the Lonely planet this place is well and truly on the tourist trail. In the general the local staff were extremely friendly and helpful but the manager (not the owner) was pretty arrogant and unpleasant. In terms of PRICES, it's too expensive for what it offers. There are cheaper and nicer options available - Lakehouse up the road has the same facilities but a lovely pool would an great view!

title: Осень в Swandor
text: Отдыхали семьями. Отель новый. Базовый Отель турфирмы Pegas. Из плюсов хорошие анимационные программы, неплохое питание, доброжелательный персонал, ухоженная территория, 4 бассейна. Из минусов: территория отеля небольшая, море неспокойное и плавать в море невозможно, удаленность от Нячанга и платный автобус ( видимо чтоб не уезжали из Отеля ). В целом отдых понравился, но второй раз уже не поедем. Отель на твёрдую четверку. Пожелание отелю: бесплатный трансфер в Нячанг продлить маршрут до Европейского квартала, перед вечерней программой на экран транслировать видео из жизни отдыхающих или фото дня, построить волнорезы если это возможно.

title: Cibo e servizi da dimenticare
text: Siamo stati 7 giorni in questa struttura, e purtroppo è stata una gincana fra gli scarsi servizi: la struttura è bella, ma il cibo é pessimo (40 euro per una cena a buffet che grida vendetta, con pochissima scelta di scarsa qualità). Poi il personale non è preparato alla clientela e il fatto che praticamente nessuno parli inglese certo non aiuta. La spiaggia è bella, con lettini e teli gratuiti, ma il mare è sporco - di rifiuti che vengono da fuori, ma anche di alghe e strane 'schiumette'. In definitiva, assolutamente sconsigliato: il Vietnam è un'altra cosa!
hotelName: Premier Residences Phu Quoc Emerald Bay Managed by Accor

title: Simple but so cool!
text: We loved this place for a cheap couple of nights. The rooftop is awesome! The BBQ is delicious! The room is so super basic and there's burgundy coloured bed linen which is kind of gross haha but we felt safe and felt like we had privacy in our little room. It's right next door to a really awesome hostel too that has live music every night 👍🏻
en_review: We loved this place for a cheap couple of nights. The rooftop is awesome! The BBQ is delicious! The room is so super basic and there's burgundy coloured bed linen which is kind of gross haha but we felt safe and felt like we had privacy in our little room. It's right next door to a really awesome hostel too that has live music every night 👍🏻

title: Prachtige accomodatie maar een bijzondere slechte organisatie en weinig te doen.
text: We verbleven hier 3 dagen en hebben er geen goed gevoel aan overgehouden. De plek op zich is prachtig en de bungalows zijn prima. De organisatie en communicatie is echter beneden alle peil, voor een groot deel veroorzaakt door het feit dat, op enkele gidsen na, niemand van het personeel Engels spreekt. Hierdoor ontaarden de meest eenvoudige vragen ( "do you have a map of the area" of "kunt u onze koffers laten ophalen") in Babelonische spraakverwarringen. Verder is het iedere weer raden bij wie, hoe laat je en waar je moet zijn voor het beloofde programma dat bij het arrangement hoort. Stel je trouwens niet te veel voor van dit programma. Behalve dat er steevast een paar 'tourist-traps' in het uitstapje zijn opgenomen houdt het niet meer in dan achter een gids aan een stukje fietsen of, in het geval van de 'floating market' excursie, varen langs een paar hoge boten die groentes en rijst te koop aanbieden. Dat laatste moet je dan maar aannemen want je kunt het niet zien. De 'cooking-class' is eigenlijk een 'cooking demonstration' want het aandeel van de deelnemers beperkt zich tot het vouwen van een paar won-tons en springrolls. Verder is er weinig of niets te beleven in Mekong Lodge. Een zwembad is er niet, maar er zijn een paar bungelows voorzien van een ingebouwde badkuip in de voortuin. Wie houdt van een paar dagen luieren in een ongemakkelijke ligstoel zal zich hier wel vermaken maar voor dit geld is er vast wel iets meer exciting te vinden.

title: Spacious villa with private pool!
text: We had 3 nights stay and it was a very quiet and relaxing resort. From airport transfers, arrival at hotel, villa check-in, room and restaurant service are all superb. I would like to emphasize that Fusion staff are well trained in communication. From the time we booked, all our inquiries were answered timely and accurately. It is fascinating to experience that a high level of good communication skills from all operational departments of the resort are available. Good job to all your team members. The only thing we would like to mention for improvement is the time duration of their massage services. All are 50 minutes. I have been living in Vietnam for 10 years now and I can speak confidently that most of the massage in 5 star hotels down to the level of street massage places are all 60 minutes or 90 minutes as another option. Well, we can only assume since the resort is offering an all inclusive spa they would like to maximize the number of massage service by deducting 10 minutes from each guest. We did not request a longer time since the menu says clearly 50mins and staff did not ask or offer if we prefer longer duration. So, we believed that this is their strategy to handle as much massage service requests. The downside is the masseuse tend to rush and before you can even fall asleep; the service is over. Something the Management can study if this concerned comes from a few number of guests or a significant number of comments. If they have established this idea already, I would expect that the Spa staff would offer at the very least if we prefer to have a longer massage service duration. Even for an additional fee, we can be agreeable because in the end our goal is to feel rejuvenated and more importantly satisfied.

title: Nice facility.  Good rest was possible
text: Nice facility. Good rest was possible. But location was a little difficult to go out to see local area. Need to improve staffs' English skill. It was sorry not possible to swim in the sea due to heavy & high wave. Anyway, our family have enjoyed late summer vacation very pleasantly this time. Thanks to everyone in Angsana Lang Co resort.

It was sorry not possible to swim in the sea due to heavy & high wave. Anyway, our family have enjoyed late summer vacation very pleasantly this time. Thanks to everyone in Angsana Lang Co resort.

title: Một trải nghiệm không ngọt ngào
text: Xem trên mạng trước khi đi QN thấy chỗ này mới ,phòng lung linh nên quyết định trải nghiệm xem biệt thự QN như thế nào? Có lẽ do ngày xui nên bị mất điện từ 16h tới 19h mới có lại . Có điện xong thì mất nước ,sau khi chủ nhà sửa chữa xong thì nước rất đục và không có nước nóng . Đặt ăn tối nhưng do sự cố mất điện nên phải đi taxi ra trung tâm ăn tối ,chỗ này không thuận lợi cho đi lại nên không phải là sự lựa chọn tốt cho những người đi công tác. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình ,thân thiện theo cách của người miền trung. Biệt thự mới nhưng không tinh tế trong trang bị nội thất .về phòng ở thieu nhiều vật dụng cần thiết ,nói chung kiểu homestay này phù hợp với dân phượt hơn. Dù sao đi nữa cũng cảm ơn chủ nhà về sự nhiệt tình và thân thiện.
en_review: Xem trên mạng trước khi đi QN thấy chỗ này mới ,phòng lung linh nên quyết định trải nghiệm xem biệt thự QN như thế nào? Có lẽ do ngày xui nên bị mất điện từ 16h tới 19h mới có lại . Có điện xong thì mất nước ,sau khi chủ nhà sửa chữa xong thì nước rất đục và không có nước nóng . Đặt ăn tối nhưng do sự cố mất điện nên phải đi taxi ra trung tâm ăn tối ,chỗ này không thuận lợi cho đi lại nên không phải là sự lựa chọn tốt cho những người đi công tác. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình ,thân thiện theo cách của người miền trung. Biệt thự mới nhưng không tinh tế trong trang bị nội thất .về phòng ở thieu nhiều vật dụng cần thiết ,nói chung kiểu homestay này phù hợp với dân phượt hơn. Dù sao đi nữa cũng cảm ơn chủ nhà về sự nhiệt tình và thân thiện.

title: Loud, average room, but 1 excellent staff member!
text: The room was average, bathroom window didn't close, so mosquitoes were coming in. The view out the back window was lovely, overlooking rice paddies and Karst mountains, but this small and rapidly growing town is LOUD!!! The hotel family was what I refer to as a yelling family. Lots of screaming at the young child, crying, elevated voices between husband and wife. It would have been quite uncomfortable but for the extraordinary service provided by Huyen, the young women working the front desk. Her English is excellent, and her quick smile and exuberance made up for much that was lacking in the accommodation.
en_review: The room was average, bathroom window didn't close, so mosquitoes were coming in. The view out the back window was lovely, overlooking rice paddies and Karst mountains, but this small and rapidly growing town is LOUD!!! The hotel family was what I refer to as a yelling family. Lots of screaming at the young child, crying, elevated voices between husband and wife. It would have been quite uncomfortable but for the extraordinary service provided by Huyen, the young women working the front desk. Her English is excellent, and her quick smile and exuberance made up for much that was lacking in the accommodation.

title: Bat themed with flies
text: Stayed here on a organised cycle trip. Knew we would get varied quality hotels but this was the worst out of generally very good hotels. Our room was fly infested and we had to request fly spray and remove a fly next from the curtains.
en_review: Stayed here on a organised cycle trip. Knew we would get varied quality hotels but this was the worst out of generally very good hotels. Our room was fly infested and we had to request fly spray and remove a fly next from the curtains.

title: Đây là lần đầu tiên với tôi
text: Đặt phòng trên trang web, khách sạn yêu cầu đặt cọc $ 250, với giả định rằng tôi có thể hủy đặt phòng trước không quá một tháng. Tôi đã hủy đặt phòng trước hai tháng. Họ từ chối trả lại tiền đặt cọc.
en_review: Đặt phòng trên trang web, khách sạn yêu cầu đặt cọc $ 250, với giả định rằng tôi có thể hủy đặt phòng trước không quá một tháng. Tôi đã hủy đặt phòng trước hai tháng. Họ từ chối trả lại tiền đặt cọc.

title: Way too expensive for what you get, worth skipping.
text: Being that Ninhvana is remote, you eat and do everything from there and they take full advantage of that. From overpriced food and drinks to having to pay extra for pretty much everything from cheese to eggs on a burger, its a pricey place to stay. The beds are good with a fan. Another downside is the veeery slow service. From check in taking half an hour (not because the hostel was booked out) to them forgetting our burgers, its a bit of a farce. The wifi is a bit iffy in the rooms and the water stopped working in the bathroom. Also the showers are terrible, pretty much no water comes out. Honestly, just skip this place. There are a few very nice hostels further up the coast, for example near quy nhon, that this is skippable.

There are a few very nice hostels further up the coast, for example near quy nhon, that this is skippable.

title: Très bon hotel mais trop loin du centre...
text: Situé sur une belle plage mais à 15 kms de Hué Splendide piscine. Chambre spacieuse mais humidité impressionnante (sol chambre mouillé en permanence) Bon petit dejeuner et bon service de restauration - un peu cher - (Works Burger à tomber au Aqua Pool bar) Service parfois approximatif . Ai même dû passer ma carte bleue dans la machine car le personnel n'y arrivait pas... Navette pour aller dans le centre mais nous sommes trop tributaires des navettes (par taxi environ 10 USD) Idéal quand on veut buller mais quel est l'intérêt de prendre un hôtel si loin de la ville si on ne reste pas longtemps dans la ville impériale ?

title: Quiet and luxurious
text: We arrived just as the typhoon was in its last days so trips into Hoi An were a little hindered. The weather is delightful now so we could take advantage of the beautiful pool(s) which directly overlook the beach. Probably the most beautiful pool area I have seen and the attendants were always nearby to tend to your every desire. Great how there was a separate children's area and a quiet area for adults but there weren't too many children around at all. This thing I noticed most was how quiet the resort is. Despite beautifully attended grounds, the was not a piece of garden machinery in sight. In all, an exceptional rejuvenating experience

title: It's OK
text: The resort used to be nice but it is a bit outdated now. it needs a few touch up. Breakfast is good. The beach nearby is not really for swimming. Facilities such as gym, spa, and restaurants are ok. Room decoration is OK, nothing outstanding.
en_review: The resort used to be nice but it is a bit outdated now. it needs a few touch up. Breakfast is good. The beach nearby is not really for swimming. Facilities such as gym, spa, and restaurants are ok. Room decoration is OK, nothing outstanding.

title: Chỗ ở tốt nhưng thực phẩm đắt tiền
text: Chúng tôi đã dành hai đêm yên tĩnh tại Ecolodge. Túp lều cũng được bổ nhiệm mặc dù nó là một ví dụ khác về tiếp thị xanh. Túp lều khá xốp với những vết nứt của ánh sáng mặt trời xuyên qua nhưng được trang bị máy lạnh nhưng không có quạt. Ngoài ra, không có nguồn năng lượng thay thế hoặc bất kỳ dấu hiệu của việc giảm dấu chân môi trường của nó. Chỉ cần rất nhiều cây trồng mới trong sân mà tôi đoán là phần sinh thái. Thức ăn nhạt nhẽo, không tốn kém và đắt tiền. Hầu hết các đường dây chính là 6 - 9 đô la Mỹ và sau đó cơm là thêm 2 đô la, Bữa sáng rất kém - - Món ăn phương Tây là trứng chiên quá mức (gọi là trứng tráng) và bánh bao.
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng sinh thái Mekong Ecolodge

title: Very disappointed
text: We booked 7 nights at Vinpearl in a two bedroom pool villa. The apartment itself was amazing and beautiful however, overall we were (are) bitterly disappointed. We have found it difficult to get information. There was no information about the resort at reception. We can't find the gym. There is only an afternoon shuttle bus into town. Every time we have enquired for information we have received blank looks and no assistance. The food while nice is very repetitive. There is only one restaurant open. The large pool is ok but there is no restaurant open next to it and it is a long way away. We are thinking about checking out early and going elsewhere despite already having paid $300 per night. Do not stay here. I do not recommend it at all.

Do not stay here. I do not recommend it at all.

title: Amazing place!
text: New modern, ecologic hotel. Very friendly staff fluently speaking English, Vietnamese and Polish languages, amazing tasty food on brekfast buffet and on restaurant. Only 80m form beautiful , clean beach. Beautiful tropical garden on rooftop. Many atracttions on this place, warmly recommended.
en_review: New modern, ecologic hotel. Very friendly staff fluently speaking English, Vietnamese and Polish languages, amazing tasty food on brekfast buffet and on restaurant. Only 80m form beautiful , clean beach. Beautiful tropical garden on rooftop. Many atracttions on this place, warmly recommended.

title: Sẽ không trở lại
text: Tôi thực sự ghét viết đánh giá tiêu cực. Nhưng trong trường hợp này, tôi tin rằng tốt nhất là thành thật. Vị trí của khách sạn là ok và các phòng là ok. Nhưng khi chúng tôi đến lúc 6 giờ chiều thì điện bị tắt, không có ai tiếp tân và tiền sảnh đầy những người đàn ông Việt Nam say xỉn. Cuối cùng, đèn bật sáng và ai đó xuất hiện, nhưng họ không có đặt phòng của chúng tôi. Chúng tôi biết điều này chỉ bởi vì chúng tôi đã có một người bạn Việt Nam giúp chúng tôi. Cuối cùng họ đã tìm thấy đặt phòng của chúng tôi và chúng tôi lên đường đến phòng. Có vẻ như chúng tôi đã đến cùng lúc với một nhóm lớn người Việt Nam. Tất cả đều để cửa mở và nói chuyện lớn vào đêm khuya và sáng sớm. Vì vậy, nó là một khách sạn rất ồn ào. Vào buổi tối, chúng tôi ở lại với bạn của chúng tôi, chỉ để trở về khách sạn và phát hiện ra chúng tôi đã bị khóa. Tôi nghĩ rằng chúng tôi đã phải để chìa khóa trên bàn tiếp tân. Nhưng tôi không cảm thấy thoải mái khi để chìa khóa cho một người đàn ông say rượu nhặt, vì họ đã nhìn chằm chằm vào tôi trước đó. Chúng tôi bấm số điện thoại nhưng không ai trả lời. Vì vậy, chúng tôi phải đợi đến 6 giờ sáng khi người ngồi sau bàn tiếp tân tỉnh dậy. Sau đó chúng tôi đổi sang một khách sạn khác. Chúng tôi đã không nhận được một khoản hoàn lại đầy đủ. Tôi nghĩ rằng đây là một khách sạn cho người dân địa phương nhưng không quá tuyệt vời cho khách du lịch.

title: Terrible lunch experience
text: We (eight people) stopped for lunch at this resort since it looked nice from the outside but it was a terrible experience. No one could speak English, the order for the food got totally mixed up, we had to wait a very long time and when it finally came it was not good and two of the dishes did not come at all. Unfriendly staff, wait to long and bad food.
en_review: We (eight people) stopped for lunch at this resort since it looked nice from the outside but it was a terrible experience. No one could speak English, the order for the food got totally mixed up, we had to wait a very long time and when it finally came it was not good and two of the dishes did not come at all. Unfriendly staff, wait to long and bad food.

title: Not at my expectation, very tired deplacement and poor breakfast
text: We had a family trip and stayed at a 3 bedroom villa, kind of far from the beach (near the reception hall). Every deplacement needs electric vehicle but we had to wait around 30-40min every time we call the reception to have vehicle, very tired mentally and physically since we are a big family with 3 little kids, 1 adult with injured feet and 2 aged adults. The resort said that they are overloaded because of high season but we've seen around 20 people at maximum each time we came to the beach/front swimming pool (maybe the other ones rest at their villa and don't come out for the beach, i don't know). Anyways, if the resort has built too many villas, so they can foresee the quantity of potential clients who they need to serve, this reason is not acceptable for 30-40min waiting time. And the breakfast buffet is very disappointed with many conserved/industrially processed food, even the yaourt is not homemade and the soup for beef noodles is all flavored with ready-to-use condiment wich is not used in other resorts that we have stayed, if the resort is ranked 4 star or above, the soup is usually homemade with natural or dried condiment, not that packed and kind of ready-to-use 1-step-make-all like that. All we have ate that day is bread and salad, they don't have any Nha Trang specialties as expected. Just a thing to complement is the room, clean and spacious. But its still have mosquito and did not provide a net even thought the bed had 4 pillar that supposed to be a net support. I will come back to the Long beach because of its beautiful and ramp beach but definitively don't rest at Vinpearl Long beach.

title: confort inattendu
text: L'hôtel est très sympa, proche du pont de Konklor où l'on voit de jolis couchers de soleil. Les chambres sont très correctes en bungalows indépendants pour un prix vraiment raisonnable. La literie est très bonne. Petit défaut l'interrupteur est très loin du lit. Beaucoup de voyageurs à moto. Parking gardé, petit déjeuner local ou européen mais pas le meilleur du voyage. Vraiment une bonne surprise
en_review: L'hôtel est très sympa, proche du pont de Konklor où l'on voit de jolis couchers de soleil. Les chambres sont très correctes en bungalows indépendants pour un prix vraiment raisonnable. La literie est très bonne. Petit défaut l'interrupteur est très loin du lit. Beaucoup de voyageurs à moto. Parking gardé, petit déjeuner local ou européen mais pas le meilleur du voyage. Vraiment une bonne surprise

title: Thiên đường nhỏ
text: Khu nghỉ dưỡng được xây dựng vào thiên nhiên, cơ sở vật chất rất đẹp, xung quanh trong một vịnh yên bình. Chúng tôi đã dành 10 ngày trong một biệt thự đầm phá, mặt bằng rất riêng tư, bạn có thể thư giãn và tắt cuộc sống hàng ngày. Vì mùa thấp điểm chỉ có một vài khách khác, nên hầu hết thời gian chúng tôi có bãi biển và hồ bơi tại nhà hàng cho hai chúng tôi. Đừng sợ mùa mưa, chúng ta vừa có 2 ngày mưa! Vì các biệt thự không hoàn toàn đóng cửa trên mái nhà (trừ phòng ngủ) mong đợi một số bụi bẩn từ động vật hoặc sóc dễ thương ăn cắp trái cây của bạn, tuy nhiên biệt thự được làm sạch hai lần một ngày, nhưng nếu bạn muốn được bao quanh bởi thiên nhiên, đó là cái giá phải trả ? Thức ăn rất tuyệt, đặc biệt phải kể đến bữa sáng tự chọn, với rất nhiều món ăn địa phương / châu Á và phương Tây ngon tuyệt. Bữa tối cũng ổn, sự lựa chọn lớn và giá cả hợp lý. Thưởng thức một ly cocktail tại quán bar trên bãi biển, tôi không mong đợi có những ly cocktail tuyệt vời ở đó, nhưng tôi được dạy tốt hơn. Yêu thích của tôi là "bãi biển nhỏ màu trắng", rất khuyến khích! Nhân viên luôn thân thiện, điều duy nhất là nếu có gì đó không ổn họ không biết cách xử lý một cách chuyên nghiệp và tìm giải pháp, nhưng kinh nghiệm này tôi có ở khắp mọi nơi tại Việt Nam. Chúng tôi chỉ có một vấn đề với đồ giặt, đã được bù, vì vậy chúng tôi ổn. Đặc biệt phải kể đến là lời mời từ GM để có một hành trình xuống nắng tại vịnh với đồ uống cho tất cả khách - đó là một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời vì môi trường xung quanh tự nhiên chỉ là tuyệt vời ở nơi này. Cảm ơn vì điều đó. Tổng cộng chúng tôi yêu thích ở lại nơi tuyệt đẹp đó, hoàn toàn thư giãn và chắc chắn sẽ quay trở lại.
en_review: Khu nghỉ dưỡng được xây dựng vào thiên nhiên, cơ sở vật chất rất đẹp, xung quanh trong một vịnh yên bình. Chúng tôi đã dành 10 ngày trong một biệt thự đầm phá, mặt bằng rất riêng tư, bạn có thể thư giãn và tắt cuộc sống hàng ngày. Vì mùa thấp điểm chỉ có một vài khách khác, nên hầu hết thời gian chúng tôi có bãi biển và hồ bơi tại nhà hàng cho hai chúng tôi. Đừng sợ mùa mưa, chúng ta vừa có 2 ngày mưa! Vì các biệt thự không hoàn toàn đóng cửa trên mái nhà (trừ phòng ngủ) mong đợi một số bụi bẩn từ động vật hoặc sóc dễ thương ăn cắp trái cây của bạn, tuy nhiên biệt thự được làm sạch hai lần một ngày, nhưng nếu bạn muốn được bao quanh bởi thiên nhiên, đó là cái giá phải trả ? Thức ăn rất tuyệt, đặc biệt phải kể đến bữa sáng tự chọn, với rất nhiều món ăn địa phương / châu Á và phương Tây ngon tuyệt. Bữa tối cũng ổn, sự lựa chọn lớn và giá cả hợp lý. Thưởng thức một ly cocktail tại quán bar trên bãi biển, tôi không mong đợi có những ly cocktail tuyệt vời ở đó, nhưng tôi được dạy tốt hơn. Yêu thích của tôi là "bãi biển nhỏ màu trắng", rất khuyến khích! Nhân viên luôn thân thiện, điều duy nhất là nếu có gì đó không ổn họ không biết cách xử lý một cách chuyên nghiệp và tìm giải pháp, nhưng kinh nghiệm này tôi có ở khắp mọi nơi tại Việt Nam. Chúng tôi chỉ có một vấn đề với đồ giặt, đã được bù, vì vậy chúng tôi ổn. Đặc biệt phải kể đến là lời mời từ GM để có một hành trình xuống nắng tại vịnh với đồ uống cho tất cả khách - đó là một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời vì môi trường xung quanh tự nhiên chỉ là tuyệt vời ở nơi này. Cảm ơn vì điều đó. Tổng cộng chúng tôi yêu thích ở lại nơi tuyệt đẹp đó, hoàn toàn thư giãn và chắc chắn sẽ quay trở lại.

title: Hostel
text: Magnifique hostel avec des petites maisons sur piloties. La vue des chambres donnent sur les impressionnantes montagnes de phong nha. Sun le propriétaire est vraiment gentil et est aux petits soins avec ses clients.
en_review: Magnifique hostel avec des petites maisons sur piloties. La vue des chambres donnent sur les impressionnantes montagnes de phong nha. Sun le propriétaire est vraiment gentil et est aux petits soins avec ses clients.

title: Bel hôtel à l’accueil exécrable
text: Un bien bel hôtel tout neuf confortable et calme situé au bord d’un lac. Une piscine avec un bar servant des sinh tô de rêve ... mais alors l’accueil est abominable surtout si vous êtes vietkieu !!! Dans ce cas on refuse même de vous servir... Mesdemoiselles en poste ce 4 avril 2018 à 8h00 apprenez à sourire et à ne pas faire de rejet des étrangers svp🙏🏽 si vous voulez qu’une clientèle non vietnamienne vienne dans votre bel établissement !!!
hotelName: Khách Sạn New Palace Bạc Liêu

Une piscine avec un bar servant des sinh tô de rêve ... mais alors l’accueil est abominable surtout si vous êtes vietkieu !!! Dans ce cas on refuse même de vous servir... title: Vinoasis phu quoc + Vinpearland and safari park
text: We enjoyed our stay at this resort Because it was low season and very empty the place was very souless. The resort was clean and the rooms were adequate but it lacked the following things that you would expect from a 5 star resort. 1) There wasnt big enough towels in the room to dry your hair. 2) Not enough shower gel or shampoo in the room for 2 people. 3) Apart from the movie option in the evening there was no entertainment or 1) Resort was souless 2) Could do with some more activities after waterpark hours 3) needs a communial area. No games for the kids or cultural shows. 4) Limited staff spoke english 5) The staff never offered you a drinks when by the pool. so many missed opportunities however they handed out popcorn to the kids! 6) The lifeguards were very inconsistent. Some would let our kids do stuff then the next day they weren't allowed! 7) The zoo and safari park was great. 8) The aquarium in vinpearland was depressing and the poor penguins looked very sad 9) The waterparks were great for the kids. 10) Food rotated every 3 days with Again no drinks offered. 11) Complimentary drinks were only avaliable from one bar in the hotel 12) Your not allowed to take towels from the pool area. This is annoying as the hotel has tiled floor which is very slippery when wet. 13) The resort could do with organising some local snorkelling trips to the island that can be seen from the resort beach. 14) Spa was great! the Ambiance there was fantastic pity it didn't resonate into the resort! 15) Could do with a coffee shop inside in very large souless boring walkway. 16) Staff were friendly 17) The whole resort seems to be focused around the casino... it's not really great for teenagers. 18) Kids club looked ready dull just one room. 19) Go and do a tour and see the island as the resort isn't a true representation of the island. If you want to go to a resort and experience nothing about the culture this will tick your boxes. If you want to see the real vietnam this is not for you.. this is a 5 a star resort that could be anywhere in the world.

title: It is supposed to be the best in town, I would hate to see the worst
text: On arrival instead of being shown to the "new wing" which we believed we were staying in we were ushered to the 3rd floor of the "old wing". Shown to room 304, but had to be moved from that one because there was a water leak down one internal wall which was causing a dripping sound in the room. Try room 306..... but no, had to be moved from that because the wash basin in the bathroom leaked water out all over the floor. Last resort room 307.......this room was usable, but the bathroom continually smells like a public lavatory, and the rooms always feel damp, there is an air conditioner but no control to turn it on. Bathroom needs a damned good clean and disinfect, as I am sure it has not been cleaned properly for a long time. A very poor standard of hotel, I would suggest anyone should try elsewhere. Service is pretty poor, breakfast is barely passable and a very limited affair.

title: Desillusion
text: Đến khách sạn, đường lái xe chỉ phù hợp cho một Landrover. Nhân viên hầu như không nói được tiếng Anh. Chỉ có người lao động sống trong khuôn viên, chúng tôi là khách duy nhất. Vườn xem có nghĩa là nhìn vào một bức tường đá. Nhà hàng vẫn đang được xây dựng. Cùng đi cho hồ bơi, bãi biển, spa vv Không có cơ sở nào cả. Ao khô. Hồ bơi có màu xanh lục. Poolbeds là thối. Hồ bơi matrasses được sử dụng bởi công nhân ngủ. Đừng có nghĩ đến việc uống một ly cocktail ở đây. Ngoài ra sức mạnh thất bại. Chúng tôi không thể tìm thấy lý do để ở lại đây, do đó, mặc dù đặt phòng của chúng tôi, chúng tôi rời đi. Đừng bận tâm đến đây.
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng và Spa Wild Beachs

title: Tres déçu
text: Nous étions ravis de venir mais l'eacrt entre la promesse et la réalité et surtout la comparaison à beaucoup d'autres établissements au Vietnam fait que nous ne recommandons pas. Point positif à signaler une extrême gentillesse du personnel et du gérant. En revanche les vélos ne fonctionnent pas, le parc est petit et peu entretenus, les animaux sont enfermés dans des cages et les chats anorexiques. Beaucoup d'idée y compris des petits cabanes type écolière mais rien n'est traduit, elles sont poussiéreuses. Le resto à une très belle vue mais à l'apéro coca ou bière pas un cocktail de bons fruits frais ou alors pas mis en valeur. Dîner et petits déjeuner qui n'ont rien de vietnamien. Je passe sur le massage cou tordu pendant 1h pas de table pro et la masseuse ne comprenant pas qu'on voulait plus fort même avec. Les signes, interrompant le massage pour réponde au téléphone dommage... Personne dans l'hôtel, mais on a mieux compris. Il manque beaucoup un peu d'entretien et de professionalisme.
hotelName: La Ferme du Colvert Spa Ecolodge

title: Awesome stay
text: The homestay is run by a lovely local couple who were very kind to us during our stay there. Vin did his utmost to satisfy us, he really helped us out especially to book the sleeper bus to Hoi An. He even brought us to the station for free. The room is one of a kind, really authentic, we loved it. The food was also great. Go for it ! Vin if you are reading this, thanks again for the flip flops man 😉

The room is one of a kind, really authentic, we loved it. The food was also great. Go for it ! Vin if you are reading this, thanks again for the flip flops man 😉

title: Two stars to beach
text: The beach and pool was very beautiful, our room was nice. Unique. But. They advertice there is a poolbaar and spa and other things. No there's not. Only one restaurant. Staff don't speak english. And don't go there if you love dogs. They don't treat them well. It really brokes my heart.

title: Pulci
text: Umidità e poca igiene. Letteralmente divorata dalle pulci. Da evitare. Ho dormito nella prima stanza sulla destra rispetto all'ingresso. I bagni sono in comune e poco puliti. Peccato perché il posto è carino e la famiglia molto gentile.
en_review: Umidità e poca igiene. Letteralmente divorata dalle pulci. Da evitare. Ho dormito nella prima stanza sulla destra rispetto all'ingresso. I bagni sono in comune e poco puliti. Peccato perché il posto è carino e la famiglia molto gentile.

title: Bof
text: Prestations, ambiance, décoration ternes. Cette soirée dans cet hôtel et cette ville de SON LA, presque aussi polluée qu’Hanoi, ne laissera pas un souvenir impérissable. Attention pas de petit déjeuner de prévu. En synthèse une douche et un lit (avec un matelas hyper dur) uniquement pour une étape qui sera la plus brève possible.
en_review: Prestations, ambiance, décoration ternes. Cette soirée dans cet hôtel et cette ville de SON LA, presque aussi polluée qu’Hanoi, ne laissera pas un souvenir impérissable. Attention pas de petit déjeuner de prévu. En synthèse une douche et un lit (avec un matelas hyper dur) uniquement pour une étape qui sera la plus brève possible.

title: Tveksamt ställe
text: Läget går inte att klaga på, då hotellet ligger direkt intill stranden. Annars kan man nog klaga på det mesta. Frukosten sög helt enkelt, dessutom fick vi inte det vi beställde. Rummet var slitet, obekväm säng och dessutom var det hål i ytterdörren? Vi hade bokat 3 nätter men valde att lämna hotellet redan efter en natt.
en_review: Läget går inte att klaga på, då hotellet ligger direkt intill stranden. Annars kan man nog klaga på det mesta. Frukosten sög helt enkelt, dessutom fick vi inte det vi beställde. Rummet var slitet, obekväm säng och dessutom var det hål i ytterdörren? Vi hade bokat 3 nätter men valde att lämna hotellet redan efter en natt.

title: Quite bad service
text: Beach is ok, but there is NOTHING in my room except a bed. No flip-flops, no hair dryer, no welcome drink or bottled water or kettle in the room, no towel. I have to go to the beach bar to buy bottled water. So i think it's not a right price. Too expensive for $30/night. I'll find another place next time.

I have to go to the beach bar to buy bottled water. So i think it's not a right price. Too expensive for $30/night. I'll find another place next time.

title: Great location pity about the service
text: The hotel is located 22km from the nearest town...so you are pretty isolated. Little choice if you decide not to eat on the resort!! However, it is situated on a very long stretch of private beach shared with the Banyan Tree next door. The site is spectacular and well kept. The pool was huge and meandered through the grounds to separate areas which was very pleasant. Check in was efficient and personal with the receptionist coming over to you with the welcome drink and little trinket. We booked a room with its own plunge pool. The room was situated close to reception and overlooking the main grounds and pool. It had two rooms, one with the sitting and dining area complete with sink, fridge and microwave oven and the other the bedroom with its comfortable King sized bed. There was a large bathroom with separate shower and bath tub together with his and hers sinks. There was a small plunge pool on the balcony with some patio chairs and table. Overall the rooms were well furnished and clean. There was a turndown service in the evening and they replaced anything that you used that day. There were full amenities in the bathroom including a toilet bag each with things like toothbrush, comb, cotton buds, shaving kit etc. It also had two large pool towels for when you used the plunge pool. We were disappointed that on the first evening, after the turndown service, neither the oil burner or the incense tray was stocked. Although they had left matches, they did not put oil in the burner or leave a tea light. They also did not leave any incense sticks though they did leave the newsletter describing what the day's scent was!! On the second night, when this again did not happen, I called reception to let them know. They said that they would inform housekeeping but nothing happened. On the third day, I spoke to the manager and he arrange for that to happen himself!! Guess, you have to accost the manager if you want anything done. In the plunge pool, of the 4 lights in it, only one worked and one of the balcony lights was blown. What was disappointing was the lack of food and beverage facilities and the service there. When we checked in, we were told that they were 7 restaurants. What they failed to say was that 4 were in the adjacent Banyan Tree and not all of them were open during the separate mealtimes. In fact breakfast was only available in one buffet style restaurant and dinner in two restaurants on site. On the first evening we went to the Rice Bowl. A beautifully decorated restaurant. It was obvious that they were short staffed from the beginning. Service was less than attentive and they tried to serve us someone else's meal. An order for a drink did not materialise. When I eventually cancelled it, there was not apology...probably relieve that they did not have to make and serve it!! After our meal, the table was not cleared until we asked someone to do it 20 minutes later. We asked for our bill and that took another 20 minutes. Unfortunately, my partner left their glasses in the restaurant and when they went to enquire about it, they were told that the staff were too busy to look for it and they would have a look when the restaurant closed!! We resorted to speaking to the duty manager who duly retrieved the glasses!! On the last night, we booked the terrace of the beachside restaurant for 7.30. We were looking forward to a nice meal. The sky was ominous early on in the evening around 6pm and did rain for a short while. When we arrived for our reservation, we were taken to the main dining room downstairs. When we said that we had booked the terrace, we were told that as it had rained earlier, they did not have enough staff to reset the terrace. This thoroughly spoilt our expectation of a nice meal on the terrace. We eventually settled for room service on our balcony...a great let down. Breakfast daily was busy as the hotel was almost full. The dining area was buzzing and noisy. We opted to sit outside in the deck but they lowered the blinds and when asked if they could raise the one by the door, one member of staff said no as it was bright!!! We had to sidle past the blind to get to the door to the deck with plates and glassed. The choice of food was good though mass produced and cold. The queue for the cook to order eggs long with many guests cutting the line. Staff were stretched with many of the dishes empty and slow to be replenished. I had to remove the empty top tiers of the bamboo steamers daily to get to the food below!!! All in all, not a great experience especially when a small boy was seen carrying one of the food tongs, licking it and putting it back. The staff were too busy to notice and no one else cared. That put me off the food if that was the standard of hygiene in the restaurant!! All in all, the location of the hotel is beautiful and the accommodation nice. The staff pleasant enough. Serge the manager was great and couldn't do enough but to have to go to him each time to get anything done was disappointing. Reporting anything to reception or the duty manger was ineffective. We paid a lot of money for the visit and the room and the hotel is supposed to be five stars. I doubt very much that many of the groups that stayed there paid the same. Unfortunately, instead of giving everyone the high standard that you come to expect from a property of that calibre, they dumbed down to suit the mass tourists! All in all, while the location was lovely, the service and the general clientele was disappointing and was definitely not worth the money!! We did get both our evening meals complementary due to the service but I would have preferred to have paid and received excellent service!!

We opted to sit outside in the deck but they lowered the blinds and when asked if they could raise the one by the door, one member of staff said no as it was bright!!! We had to sidle past the blind to get to the door to the deck with plates and glassed. The choice of food was good though mass produced and cold. The queue for the cook to order eggs long with many guests cutting the line. Staff were stretched with many of the dishes empty and slow to be replenished. I had to remove the empty top tiers of the bamboo steamers daily to get to the food below!!! All in all, not a great experience especially when a small boy was seen carrying one of the food tongs, licking it and putting it back. The staff were too busy to notice and no one else cared. That put me off the food if that was the standard of hygiene in the restaurant!! All in all, the location of the hotel is beautiful and the accommodation nice. The staff pleasant enough. Serge the manager was great and couldn't do enough but to have to go to him each time to get anything done was disappointing. Reporting anything to reception or the duty manger was ineffective. We paid a lot of money for the visit and the room and the hotel is supposed to be five stars. I doubt very much that many of the groups that stayed there paid the same. Unfortunately, instead of giving everyone the high standard that you come to expect from a property of that calibre, they dumbed down to suit the mass tourists! All in all, while the location was lovely, the service and the general clientele was disappointing and was definitely not worth the money!! We did get both our evening meals complementary due to the service but I would have preferred to have paid and received excellent service!!

title: Dissappointing. Lousy breakfast.
text: Disliked · the included 'breakfast' was a sick joke! one dish and one drink (incl juice AND coffee). and the one dish was very average. the so-called bar was very average with no outlook. the rooftop and courtyard area which could have been very attractive and relaxing with bar and coffee was closed and in disuse. the room was quiet, and had just been modernised, but too many buttons (and why is it that no-one ever labels buttons and switches when they have a lot together or their function isn't clear?)

title: Lovely host, super quite and wonderful place to relaxe
text: Me and my boyfriend went to Cham Island for a relaxed weekend and we had a super amazing time. Wonderful vegetarian fresh food. The mom is super sweet and we felt like home. We spent 4 days there to relaxe and went home with new friends and a happy stomach. Thank you so much to Oanh and her mother. We looking forward to come again.

We spent 4 days there to relaxe and went home with new friends and a happy stomach. Thank you so much to Oanh and her mother. We looking forward to come again.

title: 見た目だけ
text: 家族で2ベットルームのプール付きのヴィラに宿泊しました。 まずハエがとにかく多い。プールでゆっくりしてるとハエが飛んできて嫌になりました。 それと部屋のプール水が汚すぎ。濁った水は正直入る気がしませんでした。広いプールがこのホテルを選んだポイントだったのに…。 さらには5分に一度停電になり、日中は部屋の中に入れないほどの暑さでした。 部屋でゆっくりしようと思ったのに残念でした。 計画的な停電だったようですが、予約時にもチェックインの時にも何もなし。到着して部屋に入ったら、その旨が記載された紙が置いてあるだけでした。 部屋や敷地内はとても綺麗なのに残念です。 半額くらいで泊まれた別のホテルの方が快適でした。設備よりも中身が大事ですね。リゾートは。

title: Over zealous lifeguards
text: Both my children 7 & 8 are excellent swimmers but I was made to stay within arms reach at all times in the waterpark, most slides are height restricted instead of ability so my daughter was disappointed that she couldn’t go on any slides except toddler ones. The only decent slide my son was allowed on was closed for maintenance for a day, we asked when it would be open, returned the following day as advised and still closed for maintenance, aka someone cleaning it. So empty that it felt we were watched every second.

title: Horrible

title: Thất vọng!
text: Phòng diện tích quá nhỏ. Chờ xe đón quá lâu. Đực biệt T có quên đồ khi check out, 12h check out. 14h gọi điện báo lễ tân mà 3 ngày sau vẫn không tìm được. T chắc chắn 100% đồ tôi quên để trong phong, treo trên mắc đàng hoàng.

title: Hotel tres decevant et tres cher
text: Hotel excessivement cher par rapport au standing proposé. Tout y est hors de prix, de la chambre à la boisson en passant par le restaurant. Restaurant très médiocre, aussi bien pour le buffet petit-déjeuner que pour les repas. Le repas standard n'a de vietnamien que le nom: horrible. Nous n'avons pu finir aucun des plats. Temps d'attente très long. Personnel sous qualifié et constamment débordé. Sous effectif permanent. Personnel apparemment avenant mais en fait ne s'occupant pas des clients. Nous vous déconseillons fortement ce resort, hors de prix pour les prestations proposées.

title: Lo mejor su personal!!
text: Ciertamente habrá sitios con mejores calidades, pero estos bungalows son geniales. Habitaciones algo limitadas para más de dos personas, pero limpias y bien montadas con todo lo necesario. Lo mejor de todo su dueño. Persona muy agradable que se preocupa en todo momento por lo que necesitas. Nos presto scooters para andar por el pueblo, nos busco taxi económico y nos dejo hacer late check out hasta las 19:00 ( para ducharnos al volver de las cuevas) sin coste alguno. Sin duda un anfitrión de 10. Por todos estos detalles se merece el sitio una valoración magnífica!

title: Movenpick resort Phú Quốc
text: Khách sạn tốt, đẹp, có chỗ sống ảo. có lời khen ngợi cho Anh Việt kỉ thuật và team kỉ thuật đã nhiệt tình hỗ trợ hết mình cho chuyến đi Team building lần này của Công ty. Nhân viên phục vụ thân thiện. Thanks.!.

title: Bad customer service at front desk !
text: Cosy hotel .The deluxe garden view room was tidy, nice, clean but no beautiful garden (void area) on this time we stay. Breakfast was ok, but not too much options. I have a compliment with food&beverage staff on 11th floor on morning-friendly , and beef noodle ( phở bò sốt vang)- tasty. One thing I was really disappointed there - customer services at front desk. The front desk clerk girl in the morning, who never have smiles, irritable face. I wonder if I bothered her??? The second thing which made me give the hotel 2 star rating. When I check out, I requested to leave our luggages, It will be have no problem if when We came back to take it. We request to her “ Could I take our luggages ?” - HER RESPOND to my question with a curt answer and NO service : “ Go inside and take it” . She means we have to GO INSIDE THE FRONT DESK COUNTER and take it back ??? I really don’t understand because she is working in a hotel and travel environment - A CUSTOMER SERVICE ENVIRONMENT. I have a advice to manage and GM if you wanna become a great hotel, professional service , Note and focus on the smallest details. One more small thing, the house keeping supervisor should double check more carefully for hotel directory

title: Nice villas, poor service
text: Pros:This place can be a quick getaway from Hanoi for the family- golf course, fishing, lakeside villas, biking, swimming....... We booked a villa with a private pool and it was gorgeous with an open air shower area. Good buffet breakfast Cons: the villas are quite pricey. I paid $600usd for 2 double rooms. Service is really bad. restaurants are filled with day guests. In house guests do not get seating priority.

title: Kỳ nghỉ tuyệt vời
text: Một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời. Khách sạn rất đẹp, đầy đủ tiện nghi. Nhân viên khách sạn rất thân thiện, lịch thiệp. Biển sạch, trong, cát trắng rất mịn. Hồ bơi rộng trải dài từ KS ra tới bãi biển rất rộng, nước trong và sạch. Phòng ốc đầy đủ tiện nghi, đẹp, sang trọng

title: Disappointing experience in  the 1sr day
text: Check-in 29/Jan/22 and checkout on 02/Feb. Bad experience since check in, the bedroom has no hot water and totally unprepared staff. title: Enttäuschend
text: Die Familie ist nett und hilfsbereit und die Lage der Anlage schön. Doch leider war für mich ein Entspannen nicht möglich, da zur gleichen Zeit auf dem Grundstück der Anlage Bauarbeiten vorne am Ufer stattgefunden haben. Des weiteren war der Gockel nachts in der zweiten Hälfte sehr aktiv, so dass ein entspanntes Schlafen auch nicht möglich war. Herr Y bietet außerdem Touren auf dem Mekong in der Umgebung an. Ich war total enttäuscht von dieser Tour und würde sie auch niemandem empfehlen. Alles in allem sehr enttäuschend. Ich wäre gerne länger geblieben, war dann aber doch froh nach 2 gebuchten Nächten wieder abreisen zu können.

title: State Own Hotel Showcase Bất cẩn bởi Nhà nước
text: Nhà nước quản lý rất kém; phòng tắm có mùi thoát nước, may mắn thay nó không chuyển đến toàn bộ căn phòng. Không có xà phòng để tắm và bồn tắm được lắp đặt kém nên nước chảy ra sàn nhà, tạo ra một tình huống nguy hiểm cho một mùa thu; chất lượng khăn kém. Các bữa ăn sáng buffett là ít hơn trung bình và nước cam có vị như từ bột. Thật không may, khách sạn này là khách sạn duy nhất trong thị trấn.

title: Great for just one night
text: We didn't choose this hotel- it was booked for us by our tour company when we cycled from hoi an to hue. When we arrived, they said we could have an upgrade to a beach front villa for $10 which we decline but then thy gave it to us anyway! The whole resort was empty except for one other couple as it's the low season, which is great in some ways as the beach was totally empty but it also meant that breakfast was very limited.plus at night time, there was no lighting around the resort which is a bit disconcerting. Overall, it wa a beautiful place to stay en route but I wouldn't stay any longer. Top tip- get up early to watch the sunrise on the beach!
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng Bãi biển Lăng Cô

title: Tránh khách sạn này
text: Các nhóm của chúng tôi đã ở lại Thái Ninh nhiều lần trong vài năm qua. Nó đang dần trở nên tồi tệ hơn. Không có chi phí nào được thực hiện để bảo trì hoặc cải thiện. Các phòng đã không được làm sạch trong thời gian của chúng tôi, ổ khóa cửa không hoạt động đúng, và dịch vụ nói chung là không tồn tại. Rất ít tiếng Anh được nói. Chúng tôi đã bị tính phí cho loại phòng mà chúng tôi nhận được. Tôi sẽ không ở lại đây nữa.

title: You get what you pay for .................................
text: It's a nice Business Hotel.Internet strong enough, Credit Card payment possible. Parking place for cars, make sure is not a wedding Party when you stay there. Restaurant is good and breakfast too. Food must be order 25 min before you like to dine.

title: bien mais bruyant
text: bien mais bruyant pensez à prendre des boules quies mais comme dans beaucoup d'endroits au vietnam mais l'on profite d'une piscine au bord du mékong le personnel est tres sympathique et les repas sont corrects
en_review: bien mais bruyant pensez à prendre des boules quies mais comme dans beaucoup d'endroits au vietnam mais l'on profite d'une piscine au bord du mékong le personnel est tres sympathique et les repas sont corrects

title: Un hôtel bien placé.
text: L'hôtel est bien placé en centre ville et tout près du marché flottant. chambres moyennes, mobilier de bois verni classique. Salle de bain petite avec baignoire, et pour une fois dans notre voyage au Vietnam la baignoire est très propre, seul problème il n'y a pas de joint par rapport au mur !!! où vont les éclaboussures ? Le restaurant le soir où nous étions était extrêmement bruyant (groupes de jeunes vietnamiens). Cependant la nuit fut calme. Petit-déjeuner essentiellement vietnamien (il faut aimer), servi en terrasse au 6ème étage avec une belle vue sur la ville (centre plutôt moderne).

title: Tốt nhất trong thị trấn, nhưng đắt tiền cho những gì nó là và dịch vụ bữa sáng nghèo
text: Tôi ở đó 2 đêm và nó được cho là khách sạn tốt nhất trong thị trấn, (tôi đánh giá nó ở ba sao) và mặc dù các vấn đề gặp phải vẫn có thể xảy ra. Giá không rẻ, giống như một khách sạn quốc tế ở thành phố hạng hai ở Việt Nam, cho một căn phòng không lớn nhưng vẫn ổn. Phòng tắm đơn giản, vòi hoa sen nhỏ, bồn rửa, đơn vị vệ sinh. Bữa sáng là vấn đề, mặc dù lựa chọn hợp lý cho loại khách sạn và thị trường của nó, nhưng nhân viên không có thói quen kiểm tra xem các món ăn có trống không nên đến sáng không có cà phê, sữa, mứt , nước trái cây hoặc bơ còn lại, mặc dù được cung cấp Trứng lộn ngược kết thúc trong trứng rán cả hai mặt, và khi một quản lý nữ phụ trách đến, mọi thứ không được cải thiện khi cô bắt đầu ăn sau quầy nhà hàng. Kéo dài thời gian lưu trú của tôi, nhân viên quên mở rộng tính hợp lệ của chìa khóa của tôi, kết quả là việc đi lại giữa phòng và tiền sảnh vô ích, luôn gây phiền nhiễu. . . Giường là tốt, không có vấn đề với điều đó. Điều tốt nhất có lẽ là vị trí của nó ngay trước sông, cho phép bạn nhìn thấy vở ba-lê của những chiếc thuyền đi qua trong khi gia súc vất vả và nghỉ ngơi trên những chiếc lá nổi và vào buổi tối cuối tuần, chợ rất gần trong khi có rất nhiều đường phố các nhà cung cấp cung cấp các món ngon địa phương.
en_review: Tôi ở đó 2 đêm và nó được cho là khách sạn tốt nhất trong thị trấn, (tôi đánh giá nó ở ba sao) và mặc dù các vấn đề gặp phải vẫn có thể xảy ra. Giá không rẻ, giống như một khách sạn quốc tế ở thành phố hạng hai ở Việt Nam, cho một căn phòng không lớn nhưng vẫn ổn. Phòng tắm đơn giản, vòi hoa sen nhỏ, bồn rửa, đơn vị vệ sinh. Giường là tốt, không có vấn đề với điều đó. Điều tốt nhất có lẽ là vị trí của nó ngay trước sông, cho phép bạn nhìn thấy vở ba-lê của những chiếc thuyền đi qua trong khi gia súc vất vả và nghỉ ngơi trên những chiếc lá nổi và vào buổi tối cuối tuần, chợ rất gần trong khi có rất nhiều đường phố các nhà cung cấp cung cấp các món ngon địa phương.

title: Trung bình ở mức tốt nhất
text: Chúng tôi đã đặt chỗ ở tại biệt thự An Tâm nơi đây dường như quản lý. Do sự thiếu tiếng Anh của nhân viên tiếp tân, chúng tôi đã kết thúc ở đây. Roon có một ban công mà bạn không thể truy cập. Giường là ok. Phòng tắm xấu. Đã có một công tắc điện trong vòi sen và bồn tắm (vòi sen ở phía trên bồn tắm) bị rò rỉ nặng khiến cho những viên gạch vô cùng trơn và nguy hiểm. Chỉ tích cực là vị trí. Cà phê đá tuyệt vời quanh góc tại quán cà phê Mandi và một trung tâm mua sắm hoàn toàn mới với một siêu thị tốt gần đó.

title: Bello con riserva
text: Bell'hotel con vista fiume, abbiamo preso la penthouse essendo in tre coppie. Costoso ma molto bello, cena in riva al fiume modesta ma buona. La cosa che non mi è piaciuta è che al momento di pagare, pagando in euro, mi hanno applicato un cambio molto sfavorevole ( prima volta in Vietnam) se pagavo con visa commissione 3%. Visto quello che abbiamo pagato, trovo molto squallido lucrare sul cambio.
en_review: Bell'hotel con vista fiume, abbiamo preso la penthouse essendo in tre coppie. Costoso ma molto bello, cena in riva al fiume modesta ma buona. La cosa che non mi è piaciuta è che al momento di pagare, pagando in euro, mi hanno applicato un cambio molto sfavorevole ( prima volta in Vietnam) se pagavo con visa commissione 3%. Visto quello che abbiamo pagato, trovo molto squallido lucrare sul cambio.

title: Never wanted to leave!
text: We had the best time here, staying for two nights. The first day we arrived early and relaxed by the pool and verandah, just coming off a arduous tour in halong bay. The second day we left early at 6am to do the national park tour as it was Vietnamese holidays. Staff are friendly, the rooms are great and air conditioned, food is delicious, there is a pool and live music every night or two nights. Had a lot of fun and was ad to leave. Great value for money, I will definitely return one day for longer. The most comfortable place in the world.

Great value for money, I will definitely return one day for longer. The most comfortable place in the world.

title: Bon séjour
text: Hotel de très bonne qualité, la villa est très spacieuse , très belle vue sur la mer , salle de bain avec jaccuzi et nous avions une piscine privée Le tout pour un prix très resonnable . Je le recommande .
en_review: Hotel de très bonne qualité, la villa est très spacieuse , très belle vue sur la mer , salle de bain avec jaccuzi et nous avions une piscine privée Le tout pour un prix très resonnable . Je le recommande .

title: Au calme...
text: Nous n'avons pas logé sur place, car autre plan pas loin, mais nous avons y passé un peu de temps et franchement, pour qui cherche le vrai calme , du côté de l'île encore authentique, en retrait des foules de touristes , cet endroit respire la paix et le calme. Très bon accueil, bons plats, jardin avec quelques hamacs et transats, et seulement 3 ou 4 bungalows. Petite plage et atmosphère qui appelle le repos. La mer est moins belle que la partie Ouest très fréquentée de l'île, mais l'eau est très agréable et quasi déserte. Il est vrai que des qu'on s'écarte, les problèmes de détritus propre à Phu Quoc subsistent.

title: Un havre de paix
text: L’emplacement de cet hôtel est une merveille, situé au milieu des rizières . Les chambres sont dans des petits bungalows au milieu de la végétation et avec une vue splendide sur les rizières en terrasse. L’hôtel en contre bas n’est cependant pas facile à trouver, il faut se garer en haut sur la petite route et attendre que le personnel viennent récupérer les valises en scooter. Si la chambre est spacieuse et confortable il manque un coffre fort et parfois il y a une odeur venant des canalisations, mais cela reste un détail vu la situation exceptionnelle du complexe. A faire: randonnée à pied dans les rizières et balade dans des villages en circulant au milieu des habitations pittoresques, rencontre avec les habitants qui travaillent à la culture du riz. Un lieu authentique et pour le moment préservé.

title: Paradise
text: Stunningly beautiful resort. Fabulous accommodation with our own small pool and views over the beach. All the staff worked hard to make sure we had a great stay. The food we had was very good but could do with having more variety of menus, for example, snacks and sandwiches at lunchtime.
en_review: Stunningly beautiful resort. Fabulous accommodation with our own small pool and views over the beach. All the staff worked hard to make sure we had a great stay. The food we had was very good but could do with having more variety of menus, for example, snacks and sandwiches at lunchtime.

title: Beautiful location
text: I stayed here with my Mum and we both agreed that Phong Nga-Ke Bang National Park was one of the highlights of our trip. Although the accommodation is pretty basic for the price, the travel service that was offered was fantastic. Ben gave us advice on the next leg of our trip, organised and booked a minivan and motorbike tour for us. We also did the National Park tour and saw Paradise cave which was amazing. Biking back to the farmstay from the village in the evening with all the local kids yelling out "hello" to you is just gorgeous!

title: Очень средне
text: Из минусов: Пляж далеко, бассейн грязный, зал с тренажёрами находится на улице + половина тренажеров сломаны. Соседей не слышно, но когда кто-то на улице шумит или на балконе ( даже просто разговаривает) ооочень все хорошо слышно всем вокруг. Плюсы: кормят хорошо, домики уютные и чистые, рядом куча ресторанов, есть куда сходить вечером. Не знаю плюс это или минус, но лично у нас входная дверь была с щелью внизу, через которую пролезали к нам ящерицы. Они безобидные, но ловить и выпроваживать их на улицу ещё то веселье 😅

title: Faltas graves
text: Es una lástima, porque el hotel está muy bien, tiene unas vistas fantásticas y una piscina cojonuda. Un punto menos por: falta de línea wifi en nuestra habitación. Un punto menos por: no hablan ni papa de inglés, el camarero que nos atendía no sabía el significado de "Water, please". Un punto menos por: preguntamos por excursiones en el Mekong y nos recomendaron una empresa de impresentables que nos estafó.

title: Let go of your stress & relax!
text: An Lam is perfect at the beginning of your holiday to slam dunk you into a relaxed state very quickly. The villa was absolutely beautiful! We had privacy in our plunge pool & basically spent the 3 days eating, reading, swimming & totally unwinding! Highly recommend An Lam

title: Quiet getaway
text: Newly opened so still some improvements to be made. It's a sprawling resort so you get privacy but also means there is a fair bit of walking. The beach is nice but not much shade so gets really hot. Rooms are really suites and are huge - best for long stay. Finishing is not up to the Angsana Phuket but maybe it'll get better. Langco is quite remote so bring your own entertainment or play golf! The Banyan Spa is excellent.

text: Private villa swimming pool dirty I didn't feel kind. I didn't hear any clear explanation at check-in. When I went to the restaurant, they forgot my order and didn't bring it. I do not want to go next time.
hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Managed by Accor

title: Un mix tra una topaia ed un porcile
text: Sul sito e su FB ci sono altre foto del posto e sono ingannevoli, cioè un po’ troppo belle per la realtà. Puzza di umido, chiuso. Se strizzavo il cuscino potevo bere un bicchiere d’acqua fresca. Dio ce ne scampi ad accendere il condizionatore...sudicio. Dieci euro spesi male male, prossima volta starò più attento.

title: NIce place to stay
text: I stayed here 3 days and really love this place with awsome people and services. My room is VIP ROOM was really big and clean, they also have the sofa. They have a service rental bike,very reasonable price. i definitely stay here next time.

title: Agréable séjour mais plus proche d'un hôtel que d'un homestay
text: Résumé : très bel accueil par le propriétaire qui parle très bien anglais, endroit très jolie et confortable ... et surtout repas succulents ! Le propriétaire aide volontiers si on a besoin (cours de vietnamien, resa pour les bus ...) ! Malgré tout, cela fait plutôt hôtel (logements en nombre et séparés du logement de la famille, participation à la préparation au repas mais de façon assez scolaire (très bonnes explications et possibilités de goûters et découvrir beaucoup de choses), partage des repas de notre côté - sans la famille d'accueil....! Bien que les prestations soient de qualité, le prix est assez élevé (nuit pour une personne avec chambre et salle de bains et PDJ = 400000 dg ... soit 800000dg pour 2! ; le repas avec plusieurs plats c'est 150000 dg par personne ... et les boissons sont également onéreuses (bière 30000, coca 20000...). Par ailleurs, le propriétaire propose de venir nous chercher à l'embarcadère du ferry en échange de 20000 dg..... bien dommage ... nous avons donc pris l'option de s'y rendre à pied (pas a côté et direction pas indiquée mais faisable!)! Excursion proposée : 600000 dg pour 2 pers - Tour en bateau sur le delta du Mékong de 4-5 heures, Tour sympathique mais pas indispensable... Ballade en vélo sur l'île (vélos prêtes par la famille) très agréable !
