title: Tốt phòng-chậm serice- rất nghèo thực phẩm
text: Tôi ở lại khu nghỉ mát này trong 1/2 ngày cho một chuyến đi buisness, đặt bởi công ty mà tôi đã gặp ở Nha Trang. Ấn tượng đầu Không có văn phòng phía trước thực sự - ngay bên ngoài bàn kiểu hộp trong một khu vực mái mở - cảm thấy giống như một hành lang Không có khu vực sảnh Không có khu vực quầy bar, nơi bạn có thể đã có một cà phê sau một chuyến bay đêm với bất kỳ phần còn lại hoặc ngủ. Việc nhận phòng bị trì hoãn vì căn phòng không sẵn sàng và sẵn có, không có chỗ tắm và thay đổi cho cuộc họp đầu tiên. Trở về sau 2 giờ, phòng đã sẵn sàng, sạch sẽ và có kích thước đẹp, tầm nhìn tuyệt đẹp ra bãi biển từ trên cao (6 tầng). Áp lực nước thấp để có một vòi sen thư giãn. Trong phòng tiết kiệm quá nhỏ cho một kích thước máy tính xách tay 13 inch trở lên. Ăn trưa buffet, không được duy trì, nhiều món ăn trống rỗng, buffet bẩn, Thực phẩm vẫn trông không đẹp trong bài thuyết trình và bỏ lỡ thiếu thành phần - finess. Không có dịch vụ bồi bàn, bao gồm tất cả! ! ! ! Bồi bàn chỉ làm sạch được sử dụng và bảng lộn xộn. Vì tôi không phải là một phần của những gì họ thích như một khách hàng thị trường đơn lẻ, tôi đã đến nhà hàng ăn nhanh trên bãi biển để ăn. Đến đó, không có khách hàng bên trong, không có bàn thiết lập, nhân viên phục vụ bận rộn trên điện thoại và trò chuyện nhóm. Lựa chọn thực đơn lớn tuy nhiên như tôi đã trễ cho bữa ăn trưa, tôi chỉ định cư cho một bánh sandwich câu lạc bộ, mà hóa ra là okay, tiếc là nó đã được phục vụ với pho mát bên trong! ! ! Bữa tối Buffet được cho là đêm Viễn Đông - nghe rất hay, không may nó trở nên tồi tệ hơn sau đó là bữa trưa tự chọn. Không hấp dẫn lựa chọn thực phẩm, rất bận rộn và số lượng lớn khách đã cho nhà hàng cảm giác của một nhà ga xe lửa, vì vậy tôi chỉ ra lệnh cho dịch vụ phòng. Rất hạn chế lựa chọn, vì vậy tôi chọn một món thịt bò địa phương và mì, là tốt và một số mì xào, ngon nhưng rất nhờn và kích thước nhỏ. Tôi nhớ lại dịch vụ phòng để thu thập các món ăn bẩn sau khi tôi đã hoàn thành, họ không bao giờ đến, gọi lại và đặt các món ăn trống bên ngoài cửa, nơi họ ở lại cả đêm và vẫn ở đó khi tôi đi ăn sáng vào sáng hôm sau. Nói chung không phải là một kỳ nghỉ thực tế

title: Quản lý thấp
text: Căn phòng bẩn thỉu, vẫn còn thùng rác bên ngoài ban công khi tôi bước vào. Tấm ga trải giường cũng bẩn. Nước có màu vàng, tôi hỏi người dân địa phương nếu nước ở Nam có thể có màu vàng, và họ nói không, rõ ràng. Thái độ của nhân viên không tốt lắm. Tôi đã trễ 7 phút cho bữa sáng (9: 07) và họ từ chối phục vụ. Nói chung, tôi khuyên bạn nên ở một nơi khác và kiếm tiền của bạn xứng đáng, giá phòng cũng không rẻ cho Việt Nam.

Nước có màu vàng, tôi hỏi người dân địa phương nếu nước ở Nam có thể có màu vàng, và họ nói không, rõ ràng. Thái độ của nhân viên không tốt lắm. title: Beautiful hotel service so so
text: We are staying at JW marriott and the hotel facility is quite nice but service not so good. F&B takes forever and everything wrong, we understand it s a busy period but the we expect a bit more. We use to go next door for meals as it was at the end more convenient for us, still busy but staffs inform us that is a bit busy and will take a bit more time than usual which is ok when he nicely said and arrive as mentioned time. Next door also have music Dj at the beach in afternoon which gives a very nice casual atmosphere, definitely nice place to chill during the day with friendly people around. The Chemistry bar is very nice decorated and when not busy it s pleasure to spend time over there. Beach service was great and staffs very friendly. Overall this hotel is ok but i think overpriced. Living in Hanoi i will be back in Phu Quoc but probably look at another option
hotelName: JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay Resort & Spa

title: Nice place, but unfriendly owner...
text: The place itself is really nice and normally, this would be easily a 4-star rating, but the atmosphere was really not, what we expected. Since there are no restaurants or shops nearby, you rely on the daily breakfast/dinner, so enjoying your stay depends a lot on the other guests and the employees too. We had the impression, that the owner treated his employees in a commanding and unrespecful way and you could really feel the bad mood among the employees. Since all the huts are close to each other and the place is very remote, you need an intimate and warm atmosphere and we didn't find any of this.
en_review: The place itself is really nice and normally, this would be easily a 4-star rating, but the atmosphere was really not, what we expected. Since there are no restaurants or shops nearby, you rely on the daily breakfast/dinner, so enjoying your stay depends a lot on the other guests and the employees too. We had the impression, that the owner treated his employees in a commanding and unrespecful way and you could really feel the bad mood among the employees. Since all the huts are close to each other and the place is very remote, you need an intimate and warm atmosphere and we didn't find any of this.

title: Đắt tiền với dịch vụ khách kém
text: Chúng tôi đến thăm trong những ngày nghỉ, thuê một biệt thự với 3 phòng ngủ, rất đắt. Những điều tốt: hồ bơi trong nhà với nước suối nóng tự nhiên. Những điều tồi tệ: - nhân viên không chuyên nghiệp: chuỗi chỉ huy rất kém ở nơi này, bạn có thể được nói điều này sau đó khác. nhân viên đưa ra sự rung cảm rằng họ lười biếng và rất không chuyên nghiệp. Một nhóm gồm 5 đến 7 người giúp việc đi khắp nơi để dọn phòng. chúng tôi thậm chí có một số nhân viên cố gắng mở phòng của chúng tôi, nhìn thấy chúng tôi bên trong, la hét và bỏ chạy (??). - họ tính phí cho tất cả mọi thứ: khi chúng tôi mới đến, họ chở chúng tôi đi chơi bằng xe golf và cho chúng tôi xem nhiều dịch vụ của họ (khu vực thân thiện với trẻ em, nhà hát 5 D, đồi trượt cỏ, cho thuê xe đạp ..), Chúng tôi rất phấn khích nghĩ rằng đây là miễn phí vì chúng tôi đã trả giá phòng vô lý. Không, mọi thứ đều được tính phí riêng, vì vậy hãy cẩn thận. - bao gồm bữa sáng tự chọn trung bình nhưng các bữa ăn khác phải được thanh toán. - một nhà hàng duy nhất ngoài cổng không có gì khác trong khoảng cách đi bộ. Nói rằng bạn quên dầu gội / bàn chải đánh răng của bạn và muốn mua một số đồ ăn nhẹ, đi bộ may mắn. Kết luận: suối nước nóng rất tuyệt nhưng nó chắc chắn không đáng với tất cả những rắc rối khác và số tiền mà chúng tôi đã trả. SKIP nơi này.

title: No responding!!!!
text: A few day, I booked with the Flamingo Dai Lai resort and I try to contact them about a car pick up service, they said they have not that service!!!! They gave me a Taxi phone number.(I wonder Why they are not processing for the customer). Then, I try to ask them about my booking, Nobody let's me know about that. It make me surprise with 5 stars hotel 5 stars service. I cancelled my booking already. I think I am not necessary to pay my (high)money for them.

title: Déçu par l acceuil
text: Nous y etions le 31 juillet. A l arrivee vers 17 h c'est un homme completement ivre qui nous a acceuilli dans cette guest house nous avons failli faire demi tour tant il sentait l alcool!!! deux femmes par contre etaient tres souriantes. discussions compliquees pour choisir une chambre avec l 'homme de la maison qui nous a tendu un telephone pour communiquer avec une personne qui parle anglais ( le patron?) le reste se fera avec google traduction francais / vietnamien et une jeune femme à l'acceuil dans une tenue traditionnelle. impossible de commander un diner car on nous annonce à 17h que c est trop tard pour reserver un diner pour 20h00. Nous trouvons par nous mêmes un homestay presque en face qui était parfait pour diner avec un groupe de voyageurs. Accueil et nourriture excellent au Ly Quoc THANG. En rentrant au Dao lodge, l'homme est encore plus et ivre et toujours si peu agréable . En rentrant dans notre chambre on se demande si on va pouvoir s endormir car ses ronflements et sa télé à la réception sont trop forts. C est un manque de respect vis à vis des clients. Bref, l accueil a été très moyen à cause de cet homme. Et l accueil c est souvent plus important pour moi que le reste. Donc pour le reste, les chambres comme l emplacement sont très agréables . Le style et la deco sont très bien.

title: Sterk verouderd hotel
text: Door eerdere beoordelingen op tripadvisor waren onze verwachting niet hooggespannen. In My Tho is waarschijnlijk geen betere accommodatie tegen een redelijke prijs te vinden. De uitstraling van dit hotel zowel aan de buitenkant en binnenkant doet denken aan het oude communisme. Het is waarschijnlijk uit die tijd. De kamer met vloerbedekking is vanwege de hygiëne niet meer wenselijk. De badkamer met toilet is schoon. Alles is gedateerd, niet meer van deze tijd. Het standaard ontbijt kan tegen inlevering van een coupon in het naburige restaurant genuttigd worden. In de omgeving is voor 's avonds genoeg streetfood te vinden.

title: Schönes Resort, aber zu abgelegen und viel zu teuer
text: Wir sind mit einem privaten Fahrer zu diesem Resort gefahren und hatten im Vorfeld beim Resort eine Flussfahrt zu den schwimmenden Märkten gebucht. Bei der Ankunft haben wir diese Tour noch einmal besprochen. Uns wurde gesagt, die Fahrt mit dem Boot zu den Märkten dauert 1 Stunde (und dem nach ist der Rückweg in etwa gleich lang). Da wir keine Candy-Shop und andere Stopps wollten, haben wir die Tour gebucht. Um 6h ging es los. Nach weniger als 10 Minuten (!) waren wir bei den Märkten. Diese sind zwar schön und spannend, aber nichts Spektakuläres. Nach weniger als 45 Minuten waren wir zurück im Resort. Und dafür hätten wir US$38 bezahlen sollen. Eine Verlängerung der Tour war nicht möglich. Das ganze ist hauptsächlich passiert, weil die Angestellten im Resort so gut wie kein Englisch sprechen. Und ausserhalb des Standard-Programmes für Touristen kann man hier nichts machen.Das Essen am Vorabend war sehr schlecht. Wir haben noch nie einen Koch in Vietnam erlebt, welcher einen Fisch mit Chilisauce und Pfeffer ein zweites Mal getötet hat. Den Angestellten an der Reception haben wir gefragt, ob er schon einmal im Restaurant gegessen habe. Er meinte nein. Wir sagten ihm, wir empfehlen ihm das auch nicht. Fazit: Eigentlich ein schönes Resort, aber zu abgelegen und viel zu teuer. Wir können es nicht empfehlen.

text: Dịch vụ tuỵet vời , nhân viêm nhiệt tình vui vẻ , món ăn ngon... khí hâu mát mẻ mọi thứ hoàn hảo bạn nhân viên xa kem vui vẻ và đặt biệt có thêm Casino để trãi nghiệm . Hẹn VinOasis 1 ngày gần nhất !!!

title: decevant
text: A lire les articles des internautes, je me demande si ils ont réellement été Au Jardin du Mékong. j'y ai passe une nuit en octobre cette année et c'était la nuit la plus longue de ma vie. Bruit toute la nuit. Jai cru dormir dans un zoo. Aucune isolation phonique. Une simple paroi de bois sépare le bungalow du logement voisin.et pas jusqu'au plafond. On entend la conversation des voisins.même les toilettes ne sont pas isolées phoniquement. La propreté est très douteuse. Draps avec taches, sanitaires pas nets, douches dans la même pièce que les toilettes. Toiles d'araignées. Bref je ne recommanderait pas cette adresse a un ami.,

title: Ở Vinpearl thật tuyệt vời
text: Giá đình tôi ấn tượng với phòng ốc villa, bố trí rất cân đối và đẹp. Nội thất đầy đủ tiện nghi và hiện đại. Bãi biển sạch, sóng êm và hoàn toàn không có rác. Dịch vụ xe đưa đón cũng làm tôi và gia đình ấn tượng không kém, các bạn luôn nhanh và niềm nỡ. Thái độ nhân viên thì ko phải bàn cải, rất rất tuyệt vời. Cho 10 điểm về thái độ. Nhất là bạn Quân, bạn Sơn và bạn Nga nhiệt tình vô cùng

title: Old and Dirty
text: No restaurant. No pool. No fitness center. VERY old hotel in need of significant upgrades and repairs. The good news is that I could actually see if anyone was outside my door without opening it since there was a large gap between the door and door frame. The saving grace here is that the staff are superb and extremely helpful and friendly. I'm pretty confident they're embarrassed about the condition of the hotel as well.
en_review: No restaurant. No pool. No fitness center. VERY old hotel in need of significant upgrades and repairs. The good news is that I could actually see if anyone was outside my door without opening it since there was a large gap between the door and door frame. The saving grace here is that the staff are superb and extremely helpful and friendly. I'm pretty confident they're embarrassed about the condition of the hotel as well.

title: Nicht Zimmer A1 andrehen lassen
text: Beim Einchecken haben wir (bei einer Ausbilderin, die sehr gut Englisch spricht) um ein ruhiges Zimmer gebeten. Es wurde uns das Zimmer A1 mit dem Hinweis, dass es leise sei, zugeteilt. Dass es zur Strassenseite war und über grosse Fenster mit fingerbreiten Spalten verfügte hat uns noch nicht irritiert, ds es sich um eine Nebenstraße handelt. Die Nacht war auch ruhig, bis um ca. 5:00 der Verkehr mit voller Wucht aller hupenden Mopeds anfing. Wir fühlten uns mitten drinn statt nur dabei. Das Hotel war dabei nur wenig gebucht und einige Zimmer weiter oben und nach hinten heraus waren noch frei. Vielleicht hätten es die Damen aber leicht weiter zum Putzen gehabt :-( Auch hat es in dem Zimmer ab und an nach Kanalisation gestunken, da war wohl auch ein Problem mit der Abwasserinstallation. Der Abschuss war dann das Frühstück, das wenig in der Menge und Auswahl war und genau eine Tasse Kaffee beinhaltete. Die zweite Tasse war dann mit Aufpreis. Es tut mir leid für so ein Projekt, das junge Leute unterstützen möchte, so ein Review schreiben zu müssen.

title: Get rid of this place!
text: All we had there was the feeling of being desperated! Took us a long taxi-drive from Soc Trang to that place, we had to get on a small transfer boat and it took awhile. The bungalows were absolutely terrible. We booked it for around 86 dollars per night for a bungalow that we thought it would be placed by the river, but NOT. There are only 3 bungalows, which are by the very dirty, green lake that they use to grow fish, shrims... for your meal (YUK...)! Especially, the room doesn't have a mini bar, or an aircon,... or what ever. There is just a fan, some lights, a shower room, and a toilet. That's all. By the way, the breakfast that we had was just 2 rolled-bread, 2 fried-eggs. some coffee, some jam, butter. The family there is just working for the business so i can't really blame on them, but the way that the owner's doing is absolutely awful. a bike hire per day is $3. Bike's not suitable for footpaths and roads. Also, there was no where else that we could have a meal, the only place that we had to try was the wife's cooking and it was as expensive as a 3 star hotel but the food was not worth it. If you might read about this "warning", please try not to book a room here!

title: Gorgeous Beach, Spacious Villa
text: The resort has the cleanest beach we have found in Vietnam, with crystal clear water. The beachfront villa with a pool was very spacious. The staff was extremely attentive and helpful. All of our meals at the resort were delicious. Bicycles were provided and were in great working order. We were there during the COVID outbreak so sadly the gym, spa, and restaurants were not open. Meals were served as "room service" from a broad menu. Our days were filled on the gorgeous beach (not a bit of plastic to be found!) and in the calm ocean.
hotelName: Premier Village Phu Quoc Resort - Managed by Accor
en_review: The resort has the cleanest beach we have found in Vietnam, with crystal clear water. The beachfront villa with a pool was very spacious. The staff was extremely attentive and helpful. title: Get out of Hanoi and chill!
text: My friends and I have been there a couple of times and have always had a great time. It's a great place to go to escape the Hanoi chaos for a day and to treat yourself to some great food and some peace and quiet. A nice place to go to bed nice and early too! Nothing to do late at night.

title: Bãi biển tuyệt vời, khu nghỉ dưỡng được bảo dưỡng kém và dịch vụ trung bình
text: Bãi biển tuyệt vời, khu nghỉ dưỡng được bảo trì kém và dịch vụ trung bình. Các phòng có một chút cũ nhưng các khu vực chung đang rơi ở đây và ở đó, rõ ràng là thiếu bảo trì. Bãi biển và cảnh hoàng hôn là tuyệt vời mặc dù!

en_review: Hotel un pò decadente ricco però di suggestive ambientazioni (fatevi dare una camera "on stilt") Vista l'offerta a Dien Bien Phu è il meglio! Pulizia un pò scarsa, qualità altrettanto ma in zona non esiste di meglio, se non altro è in uno stupendo parco.

title: Best hotel in town
text: Probably the best hotel in town. You do see this reflected in the price, but it delivers value for the money. The rooms are comfortable, with big soft beds and a nice shower. Decent city view as well. The staff speaks English, are friendly and can help you with finding your way around town.
en_review: Probably the best hotel in town. You do see this reflected in the price, but it delivers value for the money. The rooms are comfortable, with big soft beds and a nice shower. Decent city view as well. The staff speaks English, are friendly and can help you with finding your way around town.

title: Spacious, clean , with river view
text: We take our chance on this hotel after browsing the reviews from Agoda and spent 3 days there. This is a new hotel right behind the Green Island or River Hotel. We request a room with a double bed and a balcony with a river view and were given a corner room on the 3rd floor. The room is spacious, bright , clean, with AC and wi-fi, a private balcony with a view of the river which is 2 minutes walk across the hotel. The Ha Tien market is about 5 minutes walk and the Huong Bien restaurant, a good restaurant recommended by the staffs , is about a block away. The hotel staff speak english, and are very friendly. At 300000 Vnd ( 15 Usd) a night, this is a good value hotel that I can recommend.
en_review: We take our chance on this hotel after browsing the reviews from Agoda and spent 3 days there. This is a new hotel right behind the Green Island or River Hotel. We request a room with a double bed and a balcony with a river view and were given a corner room on the 3rd floor. The room is spacious, bright , clean, with AC and wi-fi, a private balcony with a view of the river which is 2 minutes walk across the hotel. The Ha Tien market is about 5 minutes walk and the Huong Bien restaurant, a good restaurant recommended by the staffs , is about a block away. The hotel staff speak english, and are very friendly. At 300000 Vnd ( 15 Usd) a night, this is a good value hotel that I can recommend.

title: Искренний отзыв от нашей большой и дружной семьи!!! Мы поехали туда с тремя маленькими детьми!!!
text: Всем привет! Вот и наконец нашла время оставить отзыв об отеле! Мы приехали туда 23 февраля 2018 г в 9 утра, на руках троя детей, 6 месяцев, 2 и 5 лет. При входе в отель нас встретил русскоязычный парень , КНЯЗЬКО, поскольку перелёт был 9 часовой, конечно детки были уставшие, мы просили номер раньше 14 :00 часов, обычно все мы люди и персонал идёт на встречу, но этот КНЯЗЬКО вообще нормально разговаривать и объяснять не умеет. Точнее он дал понять, что если вы заплатите 200$ вас заселять быстрее , а если нет, ждите 14:00 часов. Мы подумали, надо же какая наглость!!! Ждали 14:00. Заселили нас не в номер с видом на море, о котором мы договаривались с тур оператором, а на номер с видом на стройку, шум, и соседи которые пили и курили всю ночь!!! Утром , в 8 утра мы спустились в ресепшн с просьбой поменять нам номер, там курят, шумно и нет моря, никакой красоты не видно, мечта сына не исполнена в честь дня его рождения! Внимание!!! И тут стоял другой русскоязычный парень! Зовут его Анатолий! Как мы жалели что нам не встретился он днём раньше! Это прекрасный! Добрый! Отзывчивый! Понимающий! Просто великолепной души человек!!! Советую всем обращаться к нему! Он невероятно честный!!!! Он на самом деле переживает за каждого туриста которые там отдыхают! Рядом с ним всегда туристы! Потому как он всем ответит и всегда пойдёт на встречу! Чего не скажешь о КНЯЗЬКО! И вот нас переселили в великолепный номер, о котором мы мечтали.... питание!!! Все просто на высшем уровне! Детская комната, бассейны, номера все идеально чисто! Честно, мы вернулись бы туда снова, но так не хочется больше видеть этого КНЯЗЬКО , что теперь ждём когда в камрани достроются новые отели , чтоб вернутся туда вновь ! И да ещё, за несколько часов до вылета мы все оплатили по счету, и тут настирает пять утра, приезжает автобус в аэропорт, на ресепшн проходим за паспортами, там опять этот КНЯЗЬКО , который снова показывает счёт в 1500000 донгов, у нас глаза большие, не понимаем в чем дело, он говорит ребёнок фломастером чиркнул простынь, в она стоит 1 млн 500 000 тыс донгов!!!! Я говорю , а почему вы не сказали вчера? Почему не сказали в тот день когда она была разрисована? Дайте простынь! Покажите! Мы не рисовали! На что глядя в глаза КНЯЗЬКО говорит что звонил нам в номер по телефону, а мы ему не ответили, мы спрашиваем, вы ведь нам вчера конверт под дверь ложили по задолженности , мы ехали с вами в лифте и вы не сказали что мы ещё что то должны!!! На что он ответил, туристов много, всех не запомнишь, платите как хотите! Я не понимаю вьетнамский язык ксожалению, но по-моему он переводил вьетнамской девушке все гораздо грубже и оскорбительней с нашей стороны, он просто понимал что нам он может говорить все что хочет и им переводить как ему интересно. Фу! Прям как вспомню , противно! Впервые столкнулись с таким неприятным человеком который омрачил весь отпуск и только и думает как и где заработать! Подводя итог , скажу, туда мы больше не вернёмся! Осадок неприятный ! Но в целом все шикарно если попробовать не обращать внимание на такого человека! А вот если ты , Анатолий , читаешь нас, то мы от всей души желаем тебе успехов! Карьерного роста! Я думаю у тебя все туристы которые тебя очень полюбили ! Ты очень крутой! Привет тебе от нас! Дай Бог ещё увидимся!!!

title: Das Vaniza hat eine Chance verdient!
text: Wir waren eine Woche im Vaniza Resort auf Phu Quoc. Leider waren wir immer die einzigen Gäste. Allgemein ist die Auslastung sehr schlecht, obwohl es bereits seit Mai 2017 geöffnet ist. Die Mitarbeiter sind sehr bemüht, jedoch bestehen immer noch viele Unsicherheiten nach einem halben Jahr in Betrieb. Die Anlage selber ist aber sehr hübsch und in den Bungalows fühlten wir uns gleich wohl. Das Essen schmeckt und die Menukarte ist für die Grösse des Resorts riesig. Für reinen Strandurlaub ist es aber sicher die falsche Wahl, da das Meer auf dieser Inselseite nicht schön ist. Die Zufahrtsstrasse zum Resort ist noch nicht ausgebaut, was die Fahrt vom Flughafen bzw. der Stadt langwierig und mühsam gestaltet. Trotz noch einiger organisatorischer Verbesserungsmöglichkeiten sollte man dem neuen Resort und seinen Mitarbeitern eine Chance geben!
en_review: Wir waren eine Woche im Vaniza Resort auf Phu Quoc. Leider waren wir immer die einzigen Gäste. Allgemein ist die Auslastung sehr schlecht, obwohl es bereits seit Mai 2017 geöffnet ist. Die Mitarbeiter sind sehr bemüht, jedoch bestehen immer noch viele Unsicherheiten nach einem halben Jahr in Betrieb. Die Anlage selber ist aber sehr hübsch und in den Bungalows fühlten wir uns gleich wohl. Das Essen schmeckt und die Menukarte ist für die Grösse des Resorts riesig. Für reinen Strandurlaub ist es aber sicher die falsche Wahl, da das Meer auf dieser Inselseite nicht schön ist. Die Zufahrtsstrasse zum Resort ist noch nicht ausgebaut, was die Fahrt vom Flughafen bzw. der Stadt langwierig und mühsam gestaltet. Trotz noch einiger organisatorischer Verbesserungsmöglichkeiten sollte man dem neuen Resort und seinen Mitarbeitern eine Chance geben!

title: Not as good as review suggested
text: - The time i got to my room was nearly 3pm. I came there slightly early (11am) since it was a 2d1n trip. Came to a big, well known resort with different facilities, I expected more from their service. First, the receptionists are not welcoming. They checked in for us and kept our passports till check out day, which I found a bit odd, especially as its pay in advance. Then they just told me to wait till the room is ready, without a welcome drink or a suggestion as to what I can do while waiting. I had lunch at the ONE AND ONLY restaurant in the resort - Mermaid Restaurant, even though on their website there are around 6 listed places to go. There were 10 staff standing at that restaurant but no one seemed to be helpful. The restaurant was completely empty, we chose the table near the sea, but one staff came and asked if we can move to a smaller table. Both the restart and cafe charged 5% service fee, but the staff are slow and not attentive (waited 20m for drinks) and took ages for us to pay by card. There wasn’t any benches on their private beach or umbrellas. The pool is just 1,4m deepest. - The location is good and bad. It is right next to the beach but you can’t get any taxi yourself. If you wanna go out, have to ask the receptionist to book for you, and the price is not by miles but by your destination point. - Room on the other hand was spacious and clean. One very good thing here is the pool guys clean the pool area all the time so it is very clean, and there was also a beach guard watching for your safety.

title: The Disgrace of the Emerald Bay...
text: When we arrived at the airport, there were already people waiting to take us back to the hotel. After about a 20 minutes car ride, we finally managed to arrive at the lobby. The lobby was overcrowded and we couldn’t find ourselves a seat until someone vacated theirs. It’s was already 2 but we had wait for another 2 hours until we could get our rooms. One disturbing fact when we checked in to our room is that it was not thoroughly cleaned. Especially in these times of the pandemic, it is crucial that every facility must be dealt with delicacy and precision. We found a dirty diaper in our trash and it is disgusting to know that this is what a 5 star hotel had to offered— dirtiness. After that I went to Fugit Tempus (a hotel restaurant) and I ordered the tenderloin. The tenderloin is cooked well to my liking which is medium rare. However, the sides are quite disappointing because it was a small pile of mash potatoes and some strands of green beans. The beach was the highlight of the day— after a stressful day at the hotel. The beach is wonderful because of the assistance that the staffs provided. All the beach equipments such as paddle boats are free to use. At the end of the first day, we enjoyed ourselves at the Department of Chemistry bar... The atmosphere there at the bar was amazing, especially the colors. However, there were a lot of problems presented. I don’t know if the waitress was not fluent in English or something else but she mixed all of my orders up and it took 40 minutes for food to reach my table. I ordered a Singapore Sling but they mixed it up with Alba water. When I reaffirmed that I did not order, they forced me to drink the water but I denied politely. I also ordered 2 s’mores but they gave it to some else instead. At the end they could only serve us one s’mores. It was a disappointing first day. Off to the second day, another disaster struck me early in the morning. I arrived late for breakfast at Fugit Tempus and realized that the buffet is not available anymore so I asked for a a la carte menu. The waiter politely gave me the menu, but he did not inform me about the restaurant not serving food until later. I confirmed all of the food to find out that the restaurant does not take orders anymore. I asked for another restaurant’s (F&C) menu but it took him 13 minutes. When the menu arrived, I ordered a ginger ale and a signature Long banh mi. It took them 40 minutes for the banh mi to arrive and 41.5 minutes for the ginger ale to arrive. It was annoying and disappointing at the same time and it was not worth the wait. It was a disgrace. The food tasted average; however, it was not worth the price. I get that there are a lot of seafood in the banh mi but it is still not worth the price. The banh mi lacked some sauce which made the bread dry. Kudos to the hotel for the presentation. I think that I will stop the review here even if I’m staying here for another 2 days. I would recommend this place as the hotel is really beautiful for taking photos and enjoying a relaxing vacation. Anyone who plans to visit here should not have high expectations as I did. But I will never forget this experience as one of the worst. This is the second time that I come to this hotel... the first time was when the hotel has not open (2017) but I got invited to the hotel to experience the new place. That time was amazing and everything was in its place but this time I thought it would be better. It is a hotel’s goal to thrive for development but this trip was a downgrade. I don’t get the rhetoric that somehow the service of when it has not opened is better than 3 years service and experience. There should be some major changes to the service and customer care at this hotel or it will lead to heinous consequences. Overall, good atmosphere, good architecture,.... otherwise, it was a disappointment. I will continue to stay here for the next few days and add to the review as I go. I did not spend $500 per room for the service like this.
hotelName: JW Marriott Phu Quoc Emerald Bay Resort & Spa

title: Très beau resort au calme
text: Tout d'abord, le resort est très bien implanté dans son environnement naturel, ici pas d'immeubles défigurant le paysage, mais de petits bungalows indépendants et discrets. La plage est belle et très propre, et la piscine à débordement très agréable. Le service est bon, le personnel aux petits soins. Les chambres sont spacieuses. La salle de bain avec petit jardin privatif et en plein air est originale. Il manque un peu d'animation le soir, le bar restaurant fermant à 22h, et il manque surtout un bar de soir sur la plage. Idéal pour se reposer, dans un très beau cadre, et se laisser prendre en charge par le personnel attentif. Seul bémol c'est un peu loin du centre ville. Prévoir un taxi pour un allé-retour (pas donné).
hotelName: Khu nghỉ dưỡng Phú Quốc Eco
en_review: Tout d'abord, le resort est très bien implanté dans son environnement naturel, ici pas d'immeubles défigurant le paysage, mais de petits bungalows indépendants et discrets. La plage est belle et très propre, et la piscine à débordement très agréable. Le service est bon, le personnel aux petits soins. Les chambres sont spacieuses. La salle de bain avec petit jardin privatif et en plein air est originale. Il manque un peu d'animation le soir, le bar restaurant fermant à 22h, et il manque surtout un bar de soir sur la plage. Idéal pour se reposer, dans un très beau cadre, et se laisser prendre en charge par le personnel attentif. Seul bémol c'est un peu loin du centre ville. Prévoir un taxi pour un allé-retour (pas donné).

title: Great getaway.
text: Our first trip to Vietnam & we love quiet beach resorts. Angsana Phuket left us a fruitful impression. We gave Angsana Lang Co a try. Stayed: Premier Room Package: Romance package Airport transfer: Our package came with return airport transfer by the hotel's vehicles. There was a pleasant hotel staff awaiting for us once we cleared immigration and she promptly showed us our way to the nice, large SUV waiting for us. Vehicle was comfortable, spacious and came with on board wifi and an iPad to keep u entertained for the 1 hour journey to the resort. Also available were complimentary mineral water and scented towels in the SUV. Drivers were skillful, yet cautious in navigating various roads & terrains. Our driver on pickup from the airport was nice to stop by various scenic sites along the way to capture pictures for us and also bring us to the bank to change VND. Check-in / Check-out: Fast and efficient and friendly service. Did not have any issues and compliments to Ms An Tran and team who planned and booked my spa and dining sessions prior to arrival. Was also able to pay the bill in mix of cash and credit card. Exchange rate at hotel was decent, at bank-rate; and not a rip-off. Niceties include a welcome drink and scented towels presented during check in at the lobby. Premier room: Chose this room type to match the Romance package and absolutely no regrets. No doubt not a 'full-sized' villa, it had good space. The living room was tastefully decorated with a large LCD TV. Selection of mini bar items was decent, together with an automated coffee machine, microwave and a mini open-concept kitchen (utensils provided but no stove). Bedroom was of a good size with a comfortable king size bed and own LCD TV; the bedroom conveniently opens out to the private pool. Ensuite bathroom was fabulous with double sinks, great toiletries, a long bath, standing shower closet and a powerful rain shower. The room also has both in-room and alfresco dining tables for your liking. Package came with a large platter for fresh, local fruits and a bottle of red wine. Nice touches indeed. Very clean and elegantly, thoughtfully designed room with more than enough space and good privacy for a couple. Dining & shopping options: If you came to DaNang wanting to go shopping and venturing into many local restaurants, this is not the place for you. There is no shopping malls or provision shops around the resort. So you'd better get all the snacks you need prior to arrival. Complimentary daily shuttle provided by Angsana to Hoi An, Ancient Town is a bonus but the journey takes ~2hours from Angsana to Hoi An. So for guests, I recommend that you set aside 1 full day as you'll be probably spend ~ 4 hours travelling to and fro and the time between drop-off and pick-up at Hoi An is ~ 6 hours. Worth a trip to this UNESCO heritage site; great local food and products on sale. Do try 'Mai Fish' and 'Mango Rooms' group of restaurants there. Angsana restaurants: - Rice Bowl: had a packaged candlelit dinner. Food quality and presentation good; generous portions. Warm and friendly staff and a great lady chef (sorry i forgot her name). - Moomba: open for lunch, very quiet, by-the-sea, restaurant; good local and international delights. We had a meal prior to check out and sort of regretted not trying the food there earlier. - Market place: decent breakfast but spread is quite limited. Usual western variety and some local vietnamese dishes. It's ok with you are not particular about food. Angsana's breakfasts are never raved about. Banyan tree restaurant: - Saffron: a unique, hill-top dining experience serving authentic Thai food, prepared by a lady chef from Bangkok. Great service, wonderful food and presentation. If there's once place you MUST go when in the Laguna resort cluster (Banyan and Angsana), this is the place! Reasonably priced too! Staff: Generally friendly staff who go the extra mile to help. Thanks to the staff who came immediately to fix my LCD TV and unlock the safe which was left locked by the previous guest, on check-in. Great staff at all dining outlets and reception. Only little issue was that some staff had difficulty understanding english - guess some courses should rectify this. Facilities: The highlight would certainly be the twisting pools around the whole resort; it looked good and sure was great to swim in. However, this was experienced was tarnished by the cold weather, which made the pool impossibly cold to swim in. We decided to soak up in the outdoor Jacuzzi which had nicely warmed water but to our dismay, the Jacuzzi jets gave way after 2 attempts at restarting it. The jets auto-offed after 5 mins, which made it utter frustrating. We gave up after staff told us they could not get the jets working. The private pool in the premier room was similarly cold and it's only good for skinny dipping (which was ok for us). I prefer if the hotel cold provide heated pools especially in the cold weather. Angsana spa was meeting of Angsana spa standards, reasonably priced. We had a pakaged 1 hour massage for 2; didnt have enough of it, and paid for another 2hour long session. No regrets, although you can get an as good if not better spa and massage at Angsana Phuket. (Masseurs there originate from Thailand anyway). Overall, a great and relaxing short trip with this resort having lots of potential. Good job to all and god bless all of you back there.

title: vietnam 2016
text: NEGATIVO = Credo che un paio di stelle sian cadute dal cielo. Assolutamente NON un 4 stelle. Stanze abbastanza oiccole, sia la standard che la de luxe. Piscina senza sdraio. Esterno piscina, inteso come docce, spogliatoi, ombrelloni ecc. ecc molto vecchio,sporco e molto mal tenuto. POSITIVO = Posizione centrale (vicino stazione dei bus, per andare a visitare Son My (My Lai). Colazioneabbondante ma prevalentemente asiatica. Personale gentile.

title: 서비스 만족
text: 친철한 서비스에 만족합니다. 한국어를 잘 하셔서 여행에 불편없이 이용했음. 시설도 깨끗하고 직원들이 친절함. 호스트직원이신 Huyen Tran, Hong Thuy의 친절한 서비스에 감사합니다.
en_review: 친철한 서비스에 만족합니다. 한국어를 잘 하셔서 여행에 불편없이 이용했음. 시설도 깨끗하고 직원들이 친절함. 호스트직원이신 Huyen Tran, Hong Thuy의 친절한 서비스에 감사합니다.

title: Не соответствует звездности и стоимости.
text: Начну с приезда - всех гостей отель встречает в аэропорту: у Vinpearl своя стойка прямо на выходе из здания аэропорта. Отправляют довольно быстро на автобусах типа Ford Transit почему-то без багажного отделения - наши чемоданы запихивали прямо в салон. Дорога занимает около 40 минут, за которые наш водитель посигналил больше раз, чем я за прошедшие 5 лет. Я, конечно, понимаю, что он тем самым спасает жизни безумным мотопедистам, но 40 минут непрерывного гудения действуют на нервы... ЗАСЕЛЕНИЕ. в отель приехали около 12.30, отдали паспорта и расположились в лобби. Минут через 15 выдали ключи, но сказали, что вилла не готова, нужно ждать до 14:00. С формальной точки зрения они правы, но о времени приезда отель был информирован за 2 месяца. Учитывая, что более 50% вилл пустуют, можно было сподобиться подготовить одну виллу на час раньше. Решили пойти пообедать, но сюрприз, «в день прилета обед не положен». Серьезно? За 350 долларов в сутки нельзя покормить людей обедом? Тем более ТАКИМ обедом (об этом ниже). Ладно, пообедали за 1,500,000 донгов на семью 2+2. (Примерно 4000 рублей). ВИЛЛА. К 14.00 вилла была готова. К самой вилле придраться невозможно - все новое, чистое. А вот бассейн очень маленький, плюс в нашем бассейне не работает стстема фильтрации - весь бассейн в растительности и с непонятной масляной пленкой на поверхности. Многократные просьбы проверить систему очистки пока ни к чему не приводят - персонал абсолютно не понимает английский, поэтому максимум присылают человека с сачком, который вылавливает крупные листья. Вообще, незнание английского огромная проблема в этом отеле. Объяснить что-либо персоналу просто невозможно и выполнение простейшей просьбы превращается в проблему. РЕСТОРАН(ы). Ресторанов на территории несколько, но еда везде одинаковая.везде одинаково нет выбора. С формальной точки зрения есть курица/рыбо/мясо, но все, в основном тушеное и невкусное. Десерты ограничены желейными мини-тортами, мороженым и фруктами. Официантов мало, со столов не убирают вообще. Чтоб подлили воды приходится идти и звать официанта. Чай/кофе -самостоятельно. Для 5* в моем понимании все вышеописанное - нонсенс. Территория большая и бестолковая - бесконечные ряды вилл, разделенные речушками и дорожками. Передвижения пешком или на электрокарах. ПЛЯЖ Пляж хороший и чистый, как песок, так и вода в море. Маловато лежаков, что опять же, учитывая уровень отеля и его недозаселенность удивляет. РАЗВЛЕЧЕНИЯ Их просто нет. Совсем. Абсолютно. Делать вечером в отеле нечего, до ближайшего населенного пункта минут 40 езды. Есть шатл из отеля. Резюмируя все сказанное - единственный плюс отеля это действительно хорошая вилла, но несоответствующее позиционированию отеля питание, полное отсутствие вечерних развлечений, абсолютное непонимание персоналом элементарного английского плюс удаленность отеля от цивилизации делают его выбор в качестве места отдыха крайне малопривлекательным. Проще прилететь на Пхукет прямым рейсом, снять виллу в Лагуне и пользоваться всей близлежащей инфраструктурой. Природа там такая же.

title: Giá quá cao
text: Bạn không nhận được những gì bạn đã trả tiền ở đây. Ngoại trừ tầm nhìn và trải nghiệm nhà gỗ trên gỗ, bạn có thể tìm thấy bất cứ nơi nào ở Việt Nam với giá tốt hơn và dịch vụ tốt hơn, mọi thứ khác chỉ ở mức tối thiểu. Thực phẩm chỉ có thể ăn được, phòng tắm có thể sử dụng được với những chiếc khăn trông bẩn thỉu, một vài thứ nhất định bị thiếu trong phòng của chúng tôi như móc treo quần áo hoặc không đủ và nhân viên tiếp tân nói với chúng tôi rằng không có con muỗi nào (spoiler: có rất nhiều , đặc biệt là vào ban đêm) . Chưa kể chúng tôi đã phải đi qua một con đường dài gập ghềnh như vậy chỉ để đến đây. Tất cả trong tất cả, chỉ cần đi đến một nơi khác, đối xử với chính mình một chút, đừng để những bức ảnh lạ mắt trên các trang web đặt phòng đánh lừa bạn.

title: Worst place we stayed in 7 weeks
text: View from the pool is nice, but unfortunately it was the only good thing. Pool looked little bit dirty and the hole hotel needs renovation. Room smelled bad and we had to change room, same thing. Mould? There were tiny ants in the bathroom and in the closet (blankets it the closet, also ants) . We had pool view, you dont see pool if you dont oven window, next to toilet. Aircon did not work very well. Sorry, but we can not recommend this place. Stayed two nights and after one night were pretty close to change.

We had pool view, you dont see pool if you dont oven window, next to toilet. Aircon did not work very well. Sorry, but we can not recommend this place. Stayed two nights and after one night were pretty close to change.

title: So would I go back?
text: We loved it!! First the bad news: swimming pool only 2/3 full and not clean, the place seems to have started off with a real vision but went downhill with apparent non-management; the young staff hardly speak English, and certainly are not trained to give western tourists what they might expect from a beach resort holiday. Expensive - but if you book through eg Booking.com, you'll get better deals that if you just walk in off the beach. And the good: location is fantastic, room views to dream of, young staff are very friendly and desparate to please, food excellent, rooms quiet with good a/c. So would I go back? On balance, yes!!!

title: Strand und pool
text: Für Strand und Pool war das Resort in Ordnung. Sonst gibt es hier eigentlich nichts. Wir haben uns etwas fehl am Platz gefühlt, es waren sehr wenige Gäste da, aber sogar unsere Bestellung am Abend hat die Angestellten dann überfordert. Und es gab sehr unfreundliche andere Gäste, aber dafür kann das Hotel nichts.

title: Don't fire up the chimney
text: Although furniture matches the style of the property and the staff is very friendly, seeing my room smoky after firing up the chimney is an experience i won't forget. Indeed, it has probably never been swept properly although staff said it could be used. It screwed up the whole evening as all our clothes smell smoke and we had to wait 2 hours before we could use our room again. After the mishap, hotel staff said it happened already, nothing has been done to fix the issue obviously as i read a similar comment on Tripadvisor. Besides, i am not fan of sharing the same villa with 5 others clients. There is no isolation and one can hear everything in other rooms, even from the living room. On the good side, i would list the heat swimming pool and the wine cellar that bring something special. Just don't use the chimney even if it sounds good for honey mooners,

title: Самостоятельно из Нячанга
text: Отдыхали в отели Doclet Resort and Spa 2* в май .Бронировали за месяц на сайте booking.com.Стоимость номера с видом на море немного дороже 1926 руб , но очень приятно посидеть на веранде, как днем в самое жаркое время ,так и вечером . По условиям бронирования должны были списать 50% предоплаты , не списывали 2 дня, с указанной карты сняли 100% оплаты, с пересчетом по текущему курсы 750 000 VND или 2000 руб. Утром, в отели Нячанга, на reception показали распечатку брони с сайта и нам отдали наши паспорта, забрали ключи от номера и попросили вернуть их по приезду. Подошли на остановку согласно расписанию автобуса (фото нашли в ВК, спасибо) к ресторану «Луизиана» подъехал микроавтобус и за 30 000 VND с человека доехали до Зоклета. Сразу скажу, не понравилось, кондиционер не работал, собирал по всему Нячангу теток с корзинами и авоськами, набились битком. Еще нас остановила полиция ,минут 10 ждали пока оформляли протокол. Обратно ехали в 11-30 на рейсовом автобусе 26 000 VND намного удобнее. И там и там кондуктор оповещает о вашей остановке . Микроавтобус останавливается около кафе у Тэна ,можно выйти прямо там и вы окажитесь перед воротами TTC DOCLET RESORT PREMIUM ,если ехать до конечной остановки придется либо вернутся назад, либо идти через пляж до белых зонтиков с такой же надписью отеля. Заселили быстро полотенца , лежаки для гостей отеля бесплатно , если приехать просто на пляж заплатите 70 000 VND. Номер очень простой ,полотенце только большое на все случаи, на пляже у охранника пляжные полотенца. Кондиционер очень громко работает, сейф на reception. WiFi только рядом с reception. С 10 утра и до 16 часов пляж кишит китайцами, охранник на пляже пытается следить за порядком. Завтрак скромный , но перекусить есть чем.Два дня достаточно отдохнуть и покупаться.

title: Không hiểu khách sạn làm ăn kiểu gì ?
text: Khách sạn nói free ăn sáng, mà chỉ có vài lát bánh mỳ. Ăn hết khách phải hỏi xin mới được cho thêm. Buổi sáng tắm không có nước nóng. Không hiểu sao mình cũng trả tiền như mọi người mà lại bị đối xử như thế ???

title: Good value hotel for short stay, clean
text: I stayed for one night in the Hoan My hotel during a brief visit to Tra Vinh. The location is a bit off the centre, but still doable (15 min walk to central market). My room was clean, relatively spacious and had airco, a fridge and TV. It also had a hot water shower. The staff didn't speak much English. There is a lift. Breakfast is not served at the hotel, however, the hotel is located opposite to the government-run Cuu Long hotel, where I had breakfast. It was buffet Vietnamese style, and nothing really special. But the price was ok and it was filling. Elsewhise you can head into town, there are cafes and a market. Alltogether the hotel is good value and clean, perfect for a short stay.

title: super Anlage aber Renovierungsstau
text: Wir waren von der schönen eingewachsenen, wie ein botanischer Park, und dem unendlichen Strand angenehm überrascht. Die Anfahrt dort hin (2h von Saigon) ist akzeptabel und für einen Kurzurlaub geeignet. Die Anlage liegt im Nirgendwo. Eine kleine Stadt liegt 15Km entfernt, ist lohnenswert zu sehen wegen eines großen bunten Marktes. Sonst gibt es nichts, auch wenig Aktivitäten. Kein Lärm, keine Animation - super ruhig. An Wochenenden allerdings gut besucht und etwas lauter am Pool und Beach. Wir hatten eine Beach Front suite. Sehr geräumig über 2 Etagen mit 2 Bädern. Im Bed room 1.OG gab es eine Freiluft Dusche mit Natursteinboden die uns überhaupt nicht gefallen hat. Macht einen unhygienischen Eindruck. Holzbrille auf dem WC unmöglich! Im EG Bad sah es besser aus , aber Armaturen und Wanne renovierungsbedürftig. WC auch mit Holzbrille ? Wären die Bäder neu wäre die Bewertung besser ausgefallen. Das Essen ist gut und die Preise moderat. Empfehle HP , Getränke nicht inclusive

title: Not worth the money
text: The Sanctuary seems like an amazing community resort of modern villas. Yet, when visiting the stay is somewhat disappointing in light of the prices charged. Rates (and expectations) are high-end yet the villas are full of cracks, switches and buttons fall off and have an overall poor quality to them. A bit of maintenance work is needed. The breakfast was a huge disappointment, very poor selection and bad quality of the food that was available. The hotel seems to attract a Russian contingent which means you'll get to enjoy that disappointing breakfast in a cloud of smoke. Lastly, it's a "community" resort meaning there is not even the availability to order drinks on the beach. If you want something you'll have to walk up to the mini-mart and buy it. Extremely underwhelming when paying $7-800 a night for a villa.

title: Give it time...
text: We stayed at this resort for a couple of nights and found the staff to be very willing and accommodating, although as others have pointed out there are a few glitches, however, the standard of the food was good and Mr Williams who is their chef works very hard to bring it all together and is keen to get your feedback to make this huge resort first class. The room we stayed in was clean if a little cramped but the pool is huge and staff work hard to keep the area clean and accommodate all your needs. The beach area is attractive and open, although the sea was rough whilst we stayed it is not overcrowded and beautiful to walk along without coming across anyone. We were aware that this is a hotel in progress and as such there are areas of building work still going on but nothing to ruin a peaceful stay. We wish them well with their vision of a bespoke resort.

We wish them well with their vision of a bespoke resort.

title: 2 nuits 1 jour trop court
text: Un service irréprochable. Chambre climatisée mais une humidité visible sur mur d entrée de la chambre. Merci au service de nettoyage pour le linge et l ouverture de la sécurité box. Petit déjeuner très complet , on y trouve de tout.service excellent.le dîner en soirée au bord de la piscine était très bien. Je recommande pour le service et la disponibilité des hôtesses malgré notre anglais rudimentaire. Cadre extérieur agréable .

title: Rubbish aircon
text: It's paining me to write a bad review. Granted the rooms and villas are beautiful and you have a pick of 3 pools to choose from however to many things just niggled away forcing me to give this resort 2*. I'm not a tough customer. Nor are the 5 other backpackers I am traveling with. However after staying in hostels and sleeping on night buses we thought we deserve a beautiful room right on the beach (costing around $87US for 3 people). At first I must admit I was impressed but when you scratch away the surface you soon notice that your $87 could have been spared and best spent on some ice cold beers at the bar. I don't want to nag so a brief overview of the issues that all 6 of us found. The food .... Terrible. We have had better local $2 meal, that are way better quality... And the worst thing is you can't really go anywhere else to eat, your pretty secluded.The main pool is in the middle of the beach. No bar, no staff, no music and was very dirty. You have to literally walk the Sahara Desert (very very hot sand no direct path) trek to the bar to get water. Most of our plugs didn't work( we stayed in a double/turned treble deluxe room). the place was just half done still mid way through doing rooms and making it all click together. but the worst one has to be the aircon. Outside is colder. The staff insisted I had sunburn and that's why I'm hot. They gave us two industrial strength fans and the manager explained that the room is to big to be cooled by such a little aircon machine. Great. I've stayed in $3 hostel rooms that cool 20 people down in one room. For $100 I wasn't a happy traveller.

title: Nice home feeling
text: Very nice place to stay. It doesn't feel like a hotel at all. Lesley took care of us very well and knew what we wanted to do before we did. Felt like we were talking to a friend rather than a staff member. Suitable for couples and family. The rooms are good but not like a luxury resort, it's more about the atmosphere and you spend most of your time lazing on the veranda, in the pool, playing pool or watching a movie on an outdoor projector with the other travellers. We did a cave tour and spent an afternoon riding to the pub with cold beer. Their website says most people wish they had more time here, it's true. Of all the places we visited in Vietnam I wish we spent more time here.

We did a cave tour and spent an afternoon riding to the pub with cold beer. Their website says most people wish they had more time here, it's true. Of all the places we visited in Vietnam I wish we spent more time here.

title: Excellent
text: Biển đẹp đẹp rất thích Villa rất đẹp, thích villa 3 Nhân viên rất nice. Nhà hàng đầy cảm hứng Một trải nghiệm rất wow Rate bạn Minh Thư with excellent service Tôi chắc chắn sẽ quay lại vào lần sau nhé

title: Jamais été aussi mal reçus dans un restaurant
text: Lors de notre arrivée, le restaurant était désert. Une serveuse est venue nous accueillir et nous lui avons dit que nous souhaitions déjeuner. Elle nous a alors installés, remis les menus..... puis elle s'est installée à une table pour jouer avec son téléphone portable !! Après plus d'une demi-heure d'attente, nous avons pris la décision de nous lever et de quitter le restaurant ! Nous aurions compris qu'elle nous dise qu'il n'était pas possible de manger car nous étions les seuls clients, mais certainement pas qu'on nous installe pour nous ignorer par la suite. Le client ne doit pas être traité comme un roi, mais un minimum de respect ne gâche rien ! C'est dommage car le cadre est très agréable. Apprenez le respect et le savoir-vivre et vous pourrez rendre cet endroit sympathique !!!

Après plus d'une demi-heure d'attente, nous avons pris la décision de nous lever et de quitter le restaurant ! Apprenez le respect et le savoir-vivre et vous pourrez rendre cet endroit sympathique !!!

title: Definitely not worth 5 stars
text: The positive things can be read on their website. Here's our disappointing reality: - Roughly spoken, about 75% of the staff is not very friendly and/or doesn't seem happy. A huge difference with the staff at the Safari park, where everyone is super friendly! - The first morning we were declined access to the breakfast area as we only brought 1 card. We were in a rude way told several times that we should have read the cardholder which was given to us (by the way, there is no information about this on the cardholder) and just go back to our room to get the second card if we wanted to get into the breakfast area. I have never heard about bringing both cards to breakfast, we were not told to do so during check in and especially never been given such a rude attitude/answer about it. They should know which room has how many customers. Each hotel does that.... After 1 minute of loud discussing we told them our room number and went inside and to go figure it out with the colleagues at the reception. - Each day we woke up because of the same loud music on the hallway. Why so loud or why so poorly isolated doors? - We have mentioned 2x that the refrigerator didn't cool. Nothing has been done about it. - A 5 star hotel without any handsoap...?? Seriously? - Bath gel and shampoo were not filled/exchanged during cleaning and these bottles are almost impossible to open by hand. Half a bottle for 2 people is not enough... - Concierges (3 in total) had no idea where to rent a scooter in this area. They sent us off in a taxi so the taxi driver could take over the problem. Of course he was very willing to just drive us around without having a clue where to go. After 20 minutes he drove us back without having found anything. Wasted time and money. But all of the above is most likely related to management instruction, so maybe the worst of all is that this information was sent to their management and after explaining to us what we saw wrong here all they agreed to was that the hallway music would be turned down. All other things were mainly our own problem in their eyes...... Obviously, never again for us!

Why so loud or why so poorly isolated doors? - We have mentioned 2x that the refrigerator didn't cool. Nothing has been done about it. - A 5 star hotel without any handsoap...?? Seriously? - Bath gel and shampoo were not filled/exchanged during cleaning and these bottles are almost impossible to open by hand. Half a bottle for 2 people is not enough... - Concierges (3 in total) had no idea where to rent a scooter in this area. They sent us off in a taxi so the taxi driver could take over the problem. Of course he was very willing to just drive us around without having a clue where to go. After 20 minutes he drove us back without having found anything. Wasted time and money. But all of the above is most likely related to management instruction, so maybe the worst of all is that this information was sent to their management and after explaining to us what we saw wrong here all they agreed to was that the hallway music would be turned down. All other things were mainly our own problem in their eyes...... Obviously, never again for us!

title: Fijne plek met matige kamers
text: We hadden de plek gezien via booking.com maar niet via hen geboekt maar gewoon heen gegaan. Dat scheelde een flink stuk, de kamer was gelijk 400.000 VND per nacht goedkoper. Voor de prijs die we nu betalen is het wel ok. Het is echt een fijne verblijfplek, met een zwembad,een restaurantje aan het water en een pooltafel. De kamers zijn wel echt een stuk minder (klein en muf) en de gezamenlijke badkamer/toilet is niet altijd even schoon. Die twee dingen staan zover van elkaar af dat echt vanaf hangt waar je naar op zoek bent hoe je het kunt beoordelen. Alleen om te slapen is het onvoldoende, als verblijfplek prima. Alhoewel voor de booking.com prijs hadden we het echt bekocht gevoeld.

title: This place is awesome!
text: We stayed here at the end of August for the recommended 3 nights and wished we could have stayed longer. It is not for travelers who enjoy city life and luxury only but if you're looking for rural adventures this is your place. While booking this stay via email all I inquired about transportation needs and tour needs. The staff were more then accommodating and very quick to answer my emails. Upon arrival we were created by a manager who kindly carried our bags to reception and we offered a beverage while we checked in. All of the staff were friendly and willing to help. We booked one of the upstairs rooms which I found spacious, clean and comfortable. We especially enjoyed lounging in the hammocks outside the room. Upon one of the managers recommendations we booked the Phong Nha national park tour which was fun, especially the dark cave. The reception also helped us book our train tickets and transportation to our next destination. The food was delicious and the only thing that could be improved is the bar service, the staff behind the bar had a more difficult time understanding orders but pointing at the menu sufficed :) We would love to come back here next time we're in Vietnam.

It is not for travelers who enjoy city life and luxury only but if you're looking for rural adventures this is your place. Upon arrival we were created by a manager who kindly carried our bags to reception and we offered a beverage while we checked in. All of the staff were friendly and willing to help. We booked one of the upstairs rooms which I found spacious, clean and comfortable. We especially enjoyed lounging in the hammocks outside the room. Upon one of the managers recommendations we booked the Phong Nha national park tour which was fun, especially the dark cave. The reception also helped us book our train tickets and transportation to our next destination. The food was delicious and the only thing that could be improved is the bar service, the staff behind the bar had a more difficult time understanding orders but pointing at the menu sufficed :) We would love to come back here next time we're in Vietnam.

title: Bãi biển đẹp, khu nghỉ mát khủng khiếp.
text: Ý tưởng của tôi về một khu nghỉ mát bãi biển và spa là rất khác với họ. Không có dịch vụ spa. Các bungalow rất mệt mỏi, một cánh cửa không khóa đúng cách và cửa sổ không có màn hình nên muỗi rất nhiều. Nhân viên đã rất hữu ích, và chứa phòng phun và sửa chữa các khóa, tuy nhiên một vai xô tốt và cánh cửa sẽ mở ra. Giường là đá cứng không có lưới, tôi có vùng áp lực trên hông và đầu gối của tôi khi thức dậy. Có lẽ nếu bạn còn trẻ, điều này có thể không phải là vấn đề như vậy. Chúng tôi đã được đặt cho ba đêm nhưng còn lại sau một. Nhà hàng rất bẩn thỉu, quần áo bàn nhăn nheo và nhuộm màu, tôi nghi ngờ họ đã từng được rửa sạch. Thực phẩm được phục vụ có chất lượng kém. Nhân viên nhà hàng thô lỗ và vô ích. Nhân viên ở quầy bar mở và trước nhà đẹp hơn và hữu ích. Bãi biển là vinh quang và ghế xếp trong điều kiện hợp lý. Rất thất vọng tổng thể.

title: Disappointing stay
text: Sorry for the length of this review. I am torn... I REALLY wanted to love this resort but found there were too many shortcomings during our stay to give more than 3 stars. The grounds and landscaping, architecture and design are stunning. The Ocean Front Pool Villa was lovely and the villa pool was excellent. I booked The Anam in the (mistaken) belief it is a more adult-oriented hotel, offering serenity and peaceful ambience; however, it appears to cater more toward tour groups and families. Breakfast was a chaotic experience: a cacophony of kids yelling, babies crying, and the tinny tunes of games on iPads. Not a relaxing way to start the day. A similar experience was had at the Indochine restaurant for the buffet dinner. I’m not sure if we ate there on a Chinese food themed night, but it would have been great to have more Vietnamese dishes as options – I don’t go to Vietnam to eat Chinese food. Housekeeping : The glass I used on the first night had my lipstick smear on it for the duration of our 4-day stay. I believe it had been rinsed in the bathroom sink. Other glassware and crockery remained on the table where I left them. We paid nearly US$400.00 a night and for that price I would expect used glasses and dishes to be taken away to be washed properly, and clean replacements brought in. No milk provided for coffee. Shampoo or shower gel levels weren’t checked and eventually ran out. Cotton buds/Q-tips weren’t provided. First world problems, I know, but at the price point we paid I expected greater value for money and attention to detail. I book ocean front hotels and ocean front villas to take advantage of the sea, the views, and fresh air. But the design of the resort does everything to guide you AWAY from the beach. Two restaurants are set well back into the property so they're very hot and get no sea breeze, and the Beach Club is set perpendicular to the beach. We visited the Sports Bar and were excited to see a couple of tables set up on the sand, but were told they don’t serve wine or food. Back to Saigon Bar we went for dinner, which is, you guessed it, located right by the children’s pool. Then there was the grass cutting that went on for two days. I understand that grass has to be cut, but using up to four strimmers at once – for two days straight – was enough to drive me batty. We generally spent our afternoons swimming and reading by our villa pool but eventually we took refuge inside to get away from the racket. Surely a ride-on mower would have been more efficient and less intrusive for guests? All I really wanted to do was sit and have peaceful breakfast/lunch/dinner with my feet in the sand, breathing fresh sea air, and listening to the waves hit the shore. There is nowhere to do this, which is such a shame as the sand on the beach is the softest I have felt anywhere, and the beach itself is beautiful. I appreciate the effort the staff made to communicate in English and how lucky I am to have locals try to speak in my language when I’m in THEIR country. All the staff I chatted with were smiley, friendly and helpful, and we had some laughs with my dreadful pronounciation of Vietnamese words. Xin loi for destroying your language :) I’m aware that everyone wants different things from their vacation and it’s totally subjective. For the reasons above, The Anam didn’t provide the quiet and calm retreat we craved. In summary, if you’re looking for a harmonious and peaceful getaway, I recommend you stay elsewhere. But if you’re away with the kids/family and want space where they can play and run amok, then this is the hotel for you.

title: Reiview
text: Khách sạn hotel là một khách sạn rất tuyệt vời, dịch vụ rất nổi bật, các món ăn rất ngon, nhân viên phục vụ nhiệt tình và các bạn bellman hướng dẫn khách rất tận tâm. Cảm ơn khách sạn vì một chuyển đi lý tưởng.

title: Beautiful hotel!
text: We spent our 30th wedding anniversary here and the hotel could not have been better. The staff and service throughout were first class and very personalised. The choice of pools is great as you can enjoy the main pool in a quiet setting. The breakfast is excellent as well as the restaurant food. Golf is expensive and not that scenic at one of the nearby courses but still good fun. There is a complimentary shuttle bus that takes you into Hoi An. All in all we wouldn't hesitate to recommend a stay here!

title: If you are looking for something very different, this is it!
text: We sadly only stayed one night here but we were really impressed at how different the Ana Mandara Villas were. Each one is individual and all the villas are set amongst trees, making it look like a town from a past era. The room we had was spacious with a large bedroom, living room and big bathroom (with a roll top bath). We had access to another living room and dining room with some minimal cooking facilities. This was shared by another room downstairs in the villa. Our room was simply furnished, but very in keeping with the period. There were two open fires that could be lit as it can be chilly in this area. All in all, a very individual and different place!
hotelName: Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa

There were two open fires that could be lit as it can be chilly in this area. All in all, a very individual and different place!

title: Beautiful and relaxing
text: After leaving the hustle and bustle of Hanoi, we chose to come to Elwood for some much needed relaxation and this resort didn't disappoint. The tropic bungalows are gorgeous and clean, not too far away from the swimming pool. The swimming pool is a lovely area for chilling. Moji bar has happy hour from 7pm until 8pm (by happy it is free) with no watered down drinks. The food is very good. Due to a party happening with loud music in the garden on the first night - we were invited for a three course meal for free on the second night which was amazing! The staff are lovely and willl take good care of you, especially Peter who gave us some pointers on our upcoming stay in Saigon. We did have an issue after a thunderstorm knocked our wifi out, but reception sorted that within 24 hours. The golf cart to the beach was novelty but there's not much to do down the beach so we had a drink and walked back. There are some countryside tracks at the back of the hotel, through the gate by the volleyball pitch, I would thoroughly recommend taking a bicycle or scooter down these tracks as they are beautiful. We saw mention of outside showers connected to the bungalows, I don't think this is the case with the tropic ones as the door appeared to be locked, there is a shower in the main bathroom but it is placed a little low for my husband and the temperature was either freezing or nuclear, so be very careful with young kids as the hot water is enough to scald. If we hadn't already booked our Saigon stay, we would have extended our stay here for another couple of nights. Would definitely recommend, although not for ppl who want to be out and about in the town.

title: Zimmer Buchung
text: Ich wollte ein zimmer Buchen, wurde weitergeleitet an „Tram“ die dame war sehr unhöflich und hatte einfach aufgelegt. Ich hatte nach einen Zimmer gefragt. Ihre antwort war sie habe keine mehr. Dann hatte ich ihr gesagt dass ich aber Bei Agoda sehe dass Sie noch Zimmer habe. Sie hatte mir recht gegeben und mir den Zimmerpreis gesagt. Dann hatte Sie einfach aufgelegt.

title: EXCELLENT in BABE LAKE
text: Mr Linh's homestay is a breathe of fresh air for those of you who live in the cities. They are in the midst of mountains and facing a huge lake. Mr Linh's homestay was by far the best I've stayed during my 12 days in Hanoi , the rooms were cosy and most importantly the beds were good for sleeping, the blanket was decked in "ROBINSONS" alike sheets (if u know what i meant for singaporeans), heater was new and u could see the temperature of water u were bathing in and the place was CLEAN.. I must emphasize on the next good thing was the FOOD. It feels like home , the food were awesome especially dinner, food were fresh and sumptuous, enjoying the cool breeze of the fresh alpines, a can of "BIA 333" is a luxury when you were in Hanoi. The homestay also provides services like the Lake tour on a boat, the lake tour was amazing and the scenery was breathtaking and mountains were a magnificent view that you will never get to see if u live in cities like Singapore. Mr Linh's homestay is definitely a good choice while you are in BABE LAKE, a 5 Star definitely as compared to all the hotels u see along "BABE LAKE" . the only disadvantage is that if u went by foot, it could be rather difficult to get there, people riding rented motorcycles or cycling could get there easier as Mr Linh's father will guide u the way personally himself

text: Không có chỗ để xe, phòng chất lượng không tốt. Nhân viên phục vụ không nhiệt tình. Đường vào khách sanh khó đi. Giá thành cao hơn so với chất lượng, phòng tầng hai không có view. Thấy lãng phí vì để nghỉ ở đây.

title: pas terrible du tout
text: grand hôtel par sa taille mais pas par son confort ! salle de bain plus que médiocre, vétuste. Ménage très approximatif. au centre de la ville donc bruyant. Petit déjeuner non engageant. Ascenseur en panne ! bref tout juste bon pour faire une étape.

title: Great place to stay
text: This farmstay is not really a farm, but a relaxed place to stay in really beautiful surroundings!! The view is spectacular and life is very easy here. The rooms are simple but adequate, the food is okay (not great for veggies) but the atmosphere is very nice. Everything is okay here and Mike finds solutions for everything, even if tours have to be postponed due to weather. It is helpful if one appreciates Aussie laid backness as it seems that this place attracts a lot of fun loving Aussies! We especially appreciated the 'guide-helper' Dean for his excellent explanations and informations on tours we took. Thanks!

The rooms are simple but adequate, the food is okay (not great for veggies) but the atmosphere is very nice. Everything is okay here and Mike finds solutions for everything, even if tours have to be postponed due to weather. It is helpful if one appreciates Aussie laid backness as it seems that this place attracts a lot of fun loving Aussies! We especially appreciated the 'guide-helper' Dean for his excellent explanations and informations on tours we took. Thanks!

title: If you're willing to spend a little more, why not go luxurious?
text: Best CM Hotel was a poor stay for my family and I. We are a 4 person and an infant travelling around Ca Mau so we needed the extra space in a room. The staff were nice enough to upgrade our 2 Double Bed room to one with suite layout but the condition of the hotel was poor. There's a need for an update and the main lobby still allows smoking indoors. It just wasn't our cup of tea as we later found out that there's a NEW 4 star hotel for about $10 CAD more close by - if lot closer to downtown. You get your money's worth and more staying there as we left the next morning ASAP. The room was not sound proof, lots of traffic and voices outside our door, someone attempted to come inside our room and we had to tell "OCCUPIED" and one toilet paper in a family room is not enough. It was nice that there was a water tank in the room though... And that's about it.

It just wasn't our cup of tea as we later found out that there's a NEW 4 star hotel for about $10 CAD more close by - if lot closer to downtown. You get your money's worth and more staying there as we left the next morning ASAP. The room was not sound proof, lots of traffic and voices outside our door, someone attempted to come inside our room and we had to tell "OCCUPIED" and one toilet paper in a family room is not enough. It was nice that there was a water tank in the room though... And that's about it.

title: "Отличный" отель, НО НЕ ВЕРНУЛИ ДО СИХ ПОР ДЕПОЗИТ!!!!
text: Добрый день. Отдыхали в отеле с 11.01.2020 года по 23.01.2020 года. Отдыхали с тремя маленькими детьми, отдыхом остались очень довольны. Отель просто шикарен. Но! выезжали с ресепшн Дискавери 2, а заезжали через ресепшн Дискавери 3. На Дискавери 3 с нас сняли депозит с карты 15 000 000 донгов. При выезде с другого ресепшн с анекс тура молодой человек жутко торопил всех и отказался доехать с нами до ресепшн Дисквавери 3 для точного возврата депозита по номеру. При том, что на Дискавери 2 обещали, что деньги зачислятся в любом случае. Траты в отеле в ресторане оплатили отдельно. Сабина - "супер помощник в отеле" - врагу такого не пожелаешь, сказала через 2 недели ожидания нам, что деньги возвращаются в течение 45 дней. Ждем до сих пор с моря погоды или 41 000 рублей на наши деньги. Поэтому если Вы готовы заплатить в итоге поездки на 41 000 рублей больше, то отель рекомендую! А если все же Вам есть куда потратить эти деньги семьей, то выберите другой отель и, возможно, другой сети с другим оператором.

title: Great place to relax
text: We spent our last days in a pool villa here. Everything was perfect. This is a great place to come and relax and I can recommend it to everyone. The villas are very private so you can have your own pool party without bothering anyone
hotelName: Khu Nghỉ Dưỡng Chen Sea & Spa
en_review: We spent our last days in a pool villa here. Everything was perfect. This is a great place to come and relax and I can recommend it to everyone. The villas are very private so you can have your own pool party without bothering anyone

title: Decent Hotel near to airport
text: Quick overnight stay as had very early flight, booked last minute and got good rate as always via Agodo. Took entry level Chic suite as such a short stay, very decent size with nice garden. Grounds immaculately kept. Nice outdoor reception area. All furnishings and fitting looking good. Pool area nice. Lovely stretch of beach which Hotel maintains well. Only issue is there is a lot of construction on this patch of Can Ranh so not particularly picturesque with cranes and diggers etc. Nothing going on in the vicinity of the hotel. Spa treatments good and very good value in room rate. Room service dinner ok. Overall very pleasant one night stop. I would rate this hotel a 4 star by EU/US standards. All staff very helpful and courteous.
en_review: Quick overnight stay as had very early flight, booked last minute and got good rate as always via Agodo. Took entry level Chic suite as such a short stay, very decent size with nice garden. Grounds immaculately kept. Nice outdoor reception area. All furnishings and fitting looking good. Pool area nice. Lovely stretch of beach which Hotel maintains well. Only issue is there is a lot of construction on this patch of Can Ranh so not particularly picturesque with cranes and diggers etc. Nothing going on in the vicinity of the hotel. Spa treatments good and very good value in room rate. Room service dinner ok. Overall very pleasant one night stop. I would rate this hotel a 4 star by EU/US standards. All staff very helpful and courteous.

title: Khách sạn cũ, không giống hình
text: Tollet rất tệ, phòng thiếu sáng, máy lạnh cũ nhận phòng đến tối mới mát. hàng lang lót thảm dơ. còn hỗ bơi cũ gạch men ở đáy hồ bị bể không vá, làm cắt chân của mấy cháu chảy máu không hỏi lý do gì. Làm mấy cháu mất vui.

title: Very friendly and good hotel - Muong Thanh Grand Ha Tinh
text: Caravan Vietnam & Unesco Travel Club organised a inspection trip to Central Vietnam for a week, we stayed here and we had a good service here, the Muong Thanh Grand Ha Tinh had friendly BOD and staffs, good food and we enjoyed the trip. We recommend this hotel for your trip coming to visit Ha Tinh.
hotelName: Khách sạn Mường Thanh Grand Hà Tĩnh
en_review: Caravan Vietnam & Unesco Travel Club organised a inspection trip to Central Vietnam for a week, we stayed here and we had a good service here, the Muong Thanh Grand Ha Tinh had friendly BOD and staffs, good food and we enjoyed the trip. We recommend this hotel for your trip coming to visit Ha Tinh.

title: Perfect Hotel
text: We had such a fantastic time over 4 nights. The hotel is a luxurious oasis from the hustle and bustle of island and Vietnamese life. The pool and private beach are beautiful, the rooms immaculate and the restaurant and beach bar delivers great food at reasonable prices. All topped off by really friendly and attentive staff. Couldn’t recommend it more highly.
hotelName: Khu Nghỉ Dưỡng Chen Sea & Spa
en_review: We had such a fantastic time over 4 nights. The hotel is a luxurious oasis from the hustle and bustle of island and Vietnamese life. The pool and private beach are beautiful, the rooms immaculate and the restaurant and beach bar delivers great food at reasonable prices. All topped off by really friendly and attentive staff. Couldn’t recommend it more highly.

title: Sent to another place after booking with them
text: We booked on the internet and when we arrived they pretended they had a wooking problem and sent us to another resort, where we met other tourists in the same situation. Clearly they had been using their good ratings to fill out their friends' hotels... and it was not great, either : the room we had was dirty, we had to ask for another, we also had to ask for services which were supposed to be free at Ba Dahn. Eventually we got what we asked for, except sleep in Ba Dahn! Overall an unpleasant experience.
en_review: We booked on the internet and when we arrived they pretended they had a wooking problem and sent us to another resort, where we met other tourists in the same situation. Clearly they had been using their good ratings to fill out their friends' hotels... and it was not great, either : the room we had was dirty, we had to ask for another, we also had to ask for services which were supposed to be free at Ba Dahn. Eventually we got what we asked for, except sleep in Ba Dahn! Overall an unpleasant experience.

title: 前台小哥态度超级好
text: 当时看中了这家酒店的环境 立志要来住一晚 当一天的小公主 事实证明 这个决定太正确了 我们是凌晨3,4点到的酒店 由于没房 所以拜托前台小哥让我们先去了酒店客厅休息 第二天朋友不舒服 酒店给我们提供了药品 而且很关心事情 下次一定还会再来的
hotelName: Ana Mandara Villas Dalat Resort & Spa
en_review: 当时看中了这家酒店的环境 立志要来住一晚 当一天的小公主 事实证明 这个决定太正确了 我们是凌晨3,4点到的酒店 由于没房 所以拜托前台小哥让我们先去了酒店客厅休息 第二天朋友不舒服 酒店给我们提供了药品 而且很关心事情 下次一定还会再来的

title: Very relaxed, beach resort
text: Had a great time here, not really big into resorts but the bunglow style rooms gave this resort a nice quaint feel unlike those highrise resort/hotels you see everywhere. They had a little golf cart service to take you from reception to your room and back uf you needed it. Friendly staff. Even though the place booked out the pool never felt too crowded, I think because theres the beach right there to swim in too. My only critique is there is No pool bar! Theres an area that looks like a bar thats not stocked or set up at all which I found a little annoying. You can still get drinks and food ordered from the main building, but its just a little annoying given theres a place for the bar but its yet to be set up.
